34a7('bum): rnam par mi rtog go/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin du mi
34b1('bum): rtog rnam par mi rtog go/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go//
34b2('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/sa'i khams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/sa'i khams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi
34b3('bum): rtog go/sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/chu'i khams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/chu'i khams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/chu'i
34b4('bum): khams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/me'i khams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go//me'i khams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/me'i khams kyi rang bzhin
34b5('bum): du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/rlung gi khams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/rlung gi khams kyi mtshan mor mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog
34b6('bum): rnam par mi rtog go/nam mkha'i khams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go//nam mkho'i khams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin du mi
34b7('bum): rtog rnam par mi rtog go/rnam par shes pa'i khams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/rnam par
35a1('bum): shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/ma rig par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go//ma rig pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go//
35a2('bum): ma rig pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/'du byed du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/'du byed kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/'du byed kyi rang bzhin du
35a3('bum): mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/rnam par shes par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/rnam par shes pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin
35a4('bum): du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/ming dang gzugs su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/ming dang gzugs kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go//ming dang gzugs kyi rang
35a5('bum): bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/skye mched drug tu mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/skye mched drug gi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/skye mched drug gi rang bzhin du
35a6('bum): mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/reg par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/reg pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/reg pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/
35a7('bum): tshor bar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/tshor ba'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/tshor ba'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/srid par mi rtog rnam par mi
35b1('bum): rtog go/sred pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go//sred pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/len par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/len pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog
35b2('bum): rnam par mi rtog go//len pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/srid par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/srid pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go//srid pa'i rang
35b3('bum): bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/skye bar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/skye ba'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/skye ba'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/rga shi
35b4('bum): mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/rga shi'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/rga shi'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/'dod pa'i khams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go///
35b5('bum): 'dod pa'i khams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/'dod pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go//gzugs kyi khams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go//gzugs
35b6('bum): kyi khams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/gzugs kyi khams kyi rang bzhin du myi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/gzugs med pa'i khams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go//
35b7('bum): gzugs med pa'i khams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/gzugs med pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par mi rtog
36a1('bum): rnam par mi rtog go/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go//
36a2('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang
36a3('bum): bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/bzod
36a4('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan mar
36a5('bum): mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/bsam
36a6('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam por mi rtog go/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
36a7('bum): par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog/
36b1('bum): go/nang stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go//nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/bya stong pa
36b2('bum): nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/phyi stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/phyi stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/phyi nang stong pa nyid du mi rtog
36b3('bum): rnam par mi rtog go/phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go//phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam
36b4('bum): par mi rtog go/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/chen po stong pa nyid du mi rtog
36b5('bum): rnam par mi rtog go/chen po stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/chen po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/don dam pa stong pa nyid du mi
36b6('bum): tog rnam par mi rtog go//don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar me tog rnam par mi rtog go/don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/'dus byas stong
36b7('bum): pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go//'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go//'dus
37a1('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du/
37a2('bum): mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/mtha' las 'dras pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go//mtha'
37a3('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/thog ma dang tha mu med pa stong pa nyid
37a4('bum): kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi
37a5('bum): rtog go/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/rang bzhin stong pa nyid du mi
37a6('bum): rtog rnam par mi rtog go//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/chos thams
37a7('bum): cad stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam
37b1('bum): par mi rtog go/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi
37b2('bum): rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/mi
37b3('bum): dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam
37b4('bum): par mi rtog go/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog
37b5('bum): rnam par mi rtog go/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
37b6('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams su
37b7('bum): mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog
38a1('bum): go//yang dag par spong ba rnams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go//yang dag par spong ba rnams
38a2('bum): kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go//
38a3('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/dbang po rnams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/dbang po rnams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go//
38a4('bum): dbang po rnams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/stobs rnams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/stobs rnams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/stobs rnams
38a5('bum): kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog
38a6('bum): go/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyud par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/'phags pa'i lam yan
38a7('bum): lag brgyad pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams su mi
38b1('bum): rtog rnam par mi rtog go/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go//bsam
38b2('bum): gtan rnams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/bsam gtan rnams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/bsam gtan rnams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/tshad
38b3('bum): med pa rnams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/tshad med pa rnams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/tshad med pa rnams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/gzugs
38b4('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/gzugs med pa'i
38b5('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/rnam par thar pa brgyad du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi
38b6('bum): rtog go/rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgur mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/mthar gyis gnas
38b7('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/rnam par
39a1('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /
39a2('bum): smon pa med pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go//
39a3('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/mngon par shes pa rnams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/mngon par shes pa rnams kyi rang bzhin du mi
39a4('bum): rtog rnam par mi rtog go/ting nge 'dzin rnams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi rang
39a5('bum): bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/gzungs kyi sgo rnams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/gzungs kyi sgo
39a6('bum): rnams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcur mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi mtshan mar mi
39a7('bum): rtog rnam par mi rtog go/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/mi 'jigs pa bzhir mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/mi 'jigs pa'i
39b1('bum): mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/mi 'jigs pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/sa so yang dag par rig pa bzhir mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go//so so yang dag
39b2('bum): par rig pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/so so yang dag par rig pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/byams pa chen por mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go//
39b3('bum): byams pa chen po'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/byams pa chen po'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/snying rje chen por mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go//snying rje
39b4('bum): chen po'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go//snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad du mi rtog rnam par mi
39b5('bum): rtog go/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi rang bzhin du ma rtog rnam par mi rtog
39b6('bum): go/thams cad shes pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/thams cad shes pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/thams cad shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi
39b7('bum): rtog rnam par mi rtog go/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/lam gyi rnam pa
40a1('bum): shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
40a2('bum): mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar
40a3('bum): gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab bo//tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab bo//'du shes bsam gyis mi khyab bo//'du byed bsam gyis mi khyab bo//rnam par shes pa
40a4('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab bo//mig bsam gyis mi khyab bo//rno ba bsam gyis mi khyab bo//sna bsam gyis mi khyab bo//lce bsam gyis mi khyab bo//lus bsam
40a5('bum): gyis mi khyab bo//yid bsam gyis mi khyab bo//gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab bo//sgra bsam gyis mi khyab bo//dri bsam gyis mi khyab bo//ro bsam gyis mi khyab
40a6('bum): bo//rog bsam gyis mi khyab bo//chos bsam gyis mi khyab bo//mig gi rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo//rna ba'i rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo///
40a7('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab po//lce'i rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo//lus kyi rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo//yid kyi rnam
40b1('bum): par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo//mig gi 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo//sna'i 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo//
40b2('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa bsami gyis mi khyab bo//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo//mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
40b3('bum): gyis tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab bo//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab do//sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab bo//lce'i
40b4('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab bo//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab bo//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsam
40b5('bum): gyis mi khyab bo//sa'i khams bsam gyis mi khyab bo//chu'i khams bsam gyis mi khyab bo//me'i khams bsam gyis mi khyab bo//rlung gi khams bsam gyis mi khyab
40b6('bum): bo//nam mkha'i khams bsam gyis mi khyab bo//rnam par shes pa'i khams bsam gyis mi khyab bo//ma rig pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo//'du byed bsam gyis mi khyab bo///
40b7('bum): rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo//ming dang gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab bo//skye mched drug bsam gyis mi khyab bo//reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo//tshor ba bsam
41a1('bum): gyis mi khyab bo//sbed pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo//len pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo//srid pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo//skye ba bsam gyis mi khyab bo//rga shi
41a2('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab bo//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis
41a3('bum): mi khyab bo//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam
41a4('bum): gyis mi khyab bo//nang stong pa nyid bsamau gyis mi khyab bo//phyi stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab bo//phyi nang stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab bo//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bsam
41a5('bum): gyis mi khyab bo//chen po stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab bo//don dam pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab bo//'dus byas stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab bo//'dus ma
41a6('bum): byas stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab bo//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab bo//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab bo//dor ba
41a7('bum): med pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab po//rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab bo//chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab bo//rang gi mtshan nyid stong
41b1('bum): pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab bo//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab bo//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab bo//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab
41b2('bum): bo//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab bo//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab bo//yang dag par spong ba rnams bsam gyis mi khyab
41b3('bum): bo//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab bo//dbang po rnams bsam gyis mi khyab bo//stobs rnams bsam gyis mi khyab bo//byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bsam gyis
41b4('bum): mi khyab po//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab bo//bsam gtan rnams bsam gyis mi
41b5('bum): khyab bo//tshad med pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab bo//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab bo//rnam par thar pa brgyad bsam gyis mi khyab
41b6('bum): /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bsam gyis mi khyab bo//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa bas mo gyis
41b7('bum): mi khyab bo//mngon par shes pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab bo//ting nge 'dzin rnams bsam gyis mi khyab bo//gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsam gyis mi khyab bo//de bzhin gshegs
42a1('bum): pa'i stobs bcu bsam gyis mi khyab bo//mi 'jigs pa bzhi bsam gyis mi khyab bo//so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi bsam gyis mi khyab bo//snying rje chen
42a2('bum): po bsam gyis mi khyab bo//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bsam gyis mi khyab bo//thams cad shes pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab bo//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa
42a3('bum): nyid bsam gyis mi khyab bo//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab bo//rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug
42a4('bum): la spyad pa dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang /sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur ba dang /dego ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su gzung ba yin no///
42a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa//bam po nyes brgya lnga pa//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab bo//bcom
42a6('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor gzugs zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor tshor ba zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
42a7('bum): zab bo//rab 'byor 'du shes zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor 'du byed zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor
42b1('bum): rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor mig zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor rna ba zab pa'i phyir shes
42b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor sna zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor lce zab po'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab
42b3('bum): 'byor lus zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor yid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor gzugs zab pa'i phyir shes
42b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor sgra zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor dri zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab
42b5('bum): 'byor ro zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor reg zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor chos zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi
42b6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa thob bo//rab 'byor mig glo rnam par shes pa zab po'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor rna ba'i rnam par shes pa zab po'i phyir shes rab
42b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor sna'i rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor lce'i rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir shes rab
43a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor lus kyi rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor yid kyi rnam par shes pa zab
43a2('bum): pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor mig gi 'dus te reg pa zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa zab
43a3('bum): pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor sna'i 'dus te reg pa zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor lce'i 'dus te reg pa zab pa'i
43a4('bum): phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zab
43a5('bum): pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor rna ba'i
43a6('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
43a7('bum): pa zab bo//rab 'byor lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zab
43b1('bum): pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor sa'i khams zab pa'i phyir
43b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor chu'i khams zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor me'i khams zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
43b3('bum): zab bo//rab 'byor rlung gi khams zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor nam mkha'i khams zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor rnam
43b4('bum): par shes pa'i khams zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor ma rig po zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor 'du byed zab pa'i phyir
43b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor ming dang gzugs zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha
43b6('bum): rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor skye mched drug zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zlab bo//rab 'byor reg pa zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab
43b7('bum): 'byor tshor ba zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor sred pa zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor len pa zab pa'i phyir shes
44a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor srid pa zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor skye ba zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu
44a2('bum): phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor rga shi zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab
44a3('bum): bo//rab 'byor tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha
44a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i
44a5('bum): phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid zab pa'i
44a6('bum): phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor phyi stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor phyi nang stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir shes
44a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor stong pa nyid stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor chen po stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir shes
44b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor don dam pa stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor 'dus byas stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha
44b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir shes
44b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor dor ba med pa stong pa nyid zab
44b4('bum): pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob bo//rab 'byor rang bzhin stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor chos thams cad stong pa nyid
44b5('bum): zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob bo//rab 'byor mi dmigs pa
44b6('bum): stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor dngos po med pa stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor ngo bo nyid
44b7('bum): stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab
45a1('bum): 'byor dran pa nye bar bzhag pa thub pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor yang dag par spong ba zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab
45a2('bum): bo/rab 'byor rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor dbang po zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor
45a3('bum): stobs zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor byang chub kyi yan lag zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor 'phags pa'i lam
45a4('bum): yan lag brgyad pa zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor 'phags pa'i bden pa zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor bsam
45a5('bum): gtan zab pa'i phyi ra shes rab kyi pha rol tu phan pa zab bo//rab 'byor tshad med pa zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor gzugs med pa'i snyoms
45a6('bum): par 'jug pa dgu zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor rnam par thar pa brgyad zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor
45a7('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa
45b1('bum): dang /smon pa med pa zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor mngon par shes pa zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor ting nge
45b2('bum): 'dzin zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor gzungs kyi sgo zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i
45b3('bum): stobs zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor mi 'jigs pa zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor so so yang dag par rig
45b4('bum): pa zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor byams pa chen po zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor snying rje chen po zab pa'i phyir
45b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos mo 'dres pa bco brgyad zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor thams cad shes pa
45b6('bum): nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rab 'byor rnam pa thams
45b7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rin po che'i phung po ste/chos rin po che'i phung
46a1('bum): po rnams sgrub pa'o//'di lta ste/dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam sgrub pa'o//bsam gtan bzhi sgrub pa'o//tshad med pa bzhi sgrub pa'o//gzugs med pa'i snyoms
46a2('bum): par 'jug pa bzhi sgrub pa'o//mngon par shes pa lnga sgrub pa'o//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi sgrub pa'o//yang dag par spong ba bzhi sgrub pa'o//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi sgrub pa'o///
46a3('bum): dbang po lnga sgrub pa'o//stobs lnga sgrub pa'o//byang chub kyi yan lag bdun sgrub pa'o//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgrub pa'o//'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi sgrub pa'o//
46a4('bum): rnam par thar pa brgyad sgrub pa'o//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu sgrub pa'o//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa sgrub
46a5('bum): pa'o//mngon par shes pa rnams sgrub pa'o//ting nge 'dzin rnams sgrub pa'o//gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgrub pa'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu sgrub pa'o//mi 'jigs pa
46a6('bum): bzhi sgrub pa'o//so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi sgrub pa'o//byams pa chen po sgrub pa'o//snying rje chen po sgrub pa'o//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sgrub pa'o//rgyun du
46a7('bum): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sgrub pa'o//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sgrub pa'o//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sgrub pa'o//dgra bcom pa nyid sgrub pa'o//rang byang chub sgrub pa'o//
46b1('bum): thams cad shes pa nyid sgrub pa'o//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid sgrub pa'o//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sgrub pa'o//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos
46b2('bum): kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'o//bcom ldan 'das gzugs dag pa dang /tshor ba dag pa dang /'du shes dag pa dang /'du byed dag pa dang /rnam par shes pa dag pa dang /mig
46b3('bum): dag pa dang /rna ba dag pa dang /sna dag pa dang /lce dag pa dang /lus dag pa dang /yid dag pa dang /gzugs dag po dang /sgra dag pa dang /dri dag pa dang /ro dag pa dang /
46b4('bum): reg dag pa dang /chos dag pa dang /mig gi rnam par shes pa dag pa dang /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dag pa dang /sna'i rnam par shes pa dag pa dang /lce'i rnam par shes
46b5('bum): pa dag pa dang /lus kyi rnam par shes pa dag pa dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa dag pa dang /mig gi 'dus te reg pa dag pa dang /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dag pa dang /sna'i
46b6('bum): 'dus te reg pa dag pa dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa dag pa dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dag pa dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dag pa dang /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
46b7('bum): tshor ba dag pa dang /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dag pa dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dag pa dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dag pa dang /
47a1('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dag pa dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dag pa dang /sa'i khams dag pa dang /chu'i khams dag pa dang /
47a2('bum): me'i khams dag pa dang /rlung gi khams dag pa dang /nam mkha'i khams dag pa dang /rnam par shes pa'i khams dag pa dang /ma rig pa dag pa dang /'du byed dag pa dang /
47a3('bum): rnam par shes pa dag pa dang /ming dang gzugs dag pa dang /skye mched drug dag pa dang /reg pa dag pa dang /tshor ba dag pa dang /sred pa dag pa dang /len papo dag pa dang /srid
47a4('bum): pa dag pa dang /skye ba dag pa dang /rga shi dag pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dag pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dag pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dag
47a5('bum): pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dag pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dag pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dag pa dang /nang stong pa nyid dag pa dang /
47a6('bum): phyi stong pa nyid dag pa dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dag pa dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dag pa dang /chen po stong pa nyid dag pa dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dag pa dang /'dus byas
47a7('bum): stong pa nyid dag pa dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dag pa dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dag pa dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dag pa dang /dor ba med pa
47b1('bum): stong pa nyid dag pa dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dag pa dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dag pa dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dag pa dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dag pa dang /
47b2('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dag pa dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dag pa dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dag pa dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dag pa dang /yang dag par
47b3('bum): spong ba dag pa dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dag pa dang /dbang po dag pa dang /stobs dag pa dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dag pa dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
47b4('bum): dag pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa dag pa dang /bsam gtan dag pa dang /tshad med pa dag pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag pa dang /rnam par thar pa
47b5('bum): dag pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag pa dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dag pa dang /mngon par
47b6('bum): shes pa dag pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dag pa dang /gzungs kyi sgo dag pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dag pa dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dag pa dang /so so yang
47b7('bum): dag par rig pa bzhi dag pa dang /byams pa chen po dag pa dang /snying rje chen po dag pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag pa dang /thams cad shes pa nyid
48a1('bum): dag pa dang /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dag pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dgra pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dag pa'i phung po'o///
48a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo de lta bu bstan pa'i tshe/bar chad mang du mi 'byung ba ni ngo mtshar che'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab
48a3('bum): 'byor de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la bar chad mang po 'byung ste/de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab
48a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /klog pa dang /ston pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba dang /bsgom par bya ba la bar chad du mi 'gyur bar 'dri na'ang myur du
48a5('bum): 'dri bar bya'o//klog na'ang myur du klog go/ston na'ang myur du ston no//tshul bzhin du yid la bya na'ang myur du tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o//bsgom na'ang myur du bsgom mo//
48a6('bum): rab 'byor de bas na gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di zla ba gcig gis 'dri bar bya na'ang des de bzhin du 'dri bar bya'o//gal
48a7('bum): te zla ba gnyis sam/gal te zla ba gsum mam/gal te zla ba bzhi'am/gal te zla ba lnga 'am/gal te zla ba drug gam/gal te lo'i bar gyis 'dri bar bya na'ang de
48b1('bum): bzhin du 'dri bar bya'o//gal te zla ba gcig gis ston pa dang /lung dbog pa dang /kha ton bya ba dang /tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba dang /bsgom par bya na'ang de bzhin du bsgom
48b2('bum): par bya'o//gal te lo'i bar gyis bsgom par bya na'ang de bzhin du bsgom par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de ni nor bu rin po che chen po la bar chad mang du 'byung ngo //gsol/
48b3('bum): pa/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ci nas kyang mi 'dri ba dang /me klog pa dang /mi ston pa dang /kha ton mi bgyi ba dang /yid la mi bgyi ba dang /
48b4('bum): mi bsgom pa'i slad du bdud sdig to can dag bar chad mi bgyid pa ngo mtshar che'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
48b5('bum): 'di la ci nas kyang mi 'dri ba dang /mi klog pa dang /mi ston pa dang /kha ton mi bya ba dang /tshul bzhin du yid la mi bya ba drang /mi bsgom pa'i slad du bdud sdig to can bar chad
48b6('bum): mi byed pa'ang ma yin mod kyi/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shos rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /klog pa dang /kha ton du byed pa dang /
48b7('bum): bsgom pa rnams la bar chad bya bar mi nus so//de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ci'i mthus na//
49a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /klog pa dang /kha ton du bgyi ba dang /tshul bzhin du
49a2('bum): yid la bgyi ba dang /bsgom pa la bdud sdig to can bgegs bgyid par mi 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu sangs rgyas kyi mthus
49a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /klog pa dang /kha ton du byed pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /
49a4('bum): bsgom pa dag la bdud sdig to can gyis bar chad bya bar mi nus so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams ngag na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang
49a5('bum): ji snyed cig bzhugs shing /'tshe skyong ba dang /chos ston pa de dag gi mthus kyang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di
49a6('bum): 'dri ba dang /klog pa dang /ston pa dang /kha ton du byed pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /bsgom pa de dag la bdud sdig to can gyis bar chad bya bar mi nus so//
49a7('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la dgongs shing yongs su 'dzin pa mdzad de/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
49b1('bum): de dag gis yongs su bzung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab myi 'di 'dri b+ha dang /klog pa dang /smyon pa dang /khat+kon du
49b2('bum): byed pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /bsgom pa de dag la bdud sdig to can gyis bar chad bya bar mi nus so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shA ra dwa ti'i bu sangs rgyas kyis
49b3('bum): yongs su zin po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i chos yongs su btsal ba la/bdud sdig to can gyis bar chad bya bar mi nus so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu
49b4('bum): de ni gang de ltar phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med
49b5('bum): grangs med pa bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /chos ston pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba la dgongs pa mdzad/
49b6('bum): pa dang /klog cing ston pa dang /kha ton du byed pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /bsgom pa la dgongs pa mdzad pa ni chos nyid kyis de bzhin te/shA ra dwa ti'i bu rigs
49b7('bum): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri zhing klog pa dang /ston cing tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /bsgom pa des kyang bdag ni sangs rgyas
50a1('bum): kyi mthus shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri'o//klog go/ston to//kha ton du byed do//tshul bzhin du yid la byed do//bsgom mo zhes bya bar
50a2('bum): khong du chud par bya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang su'ang rung ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /klog pa
50a3('bum): dang /ston pa dang /kha ton du bgyid pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa dang /bsgom mo 'tshal kun kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthu lags sam/kun kyang sangs
50a4('bum): rgyas kyi gzungs lags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no//dri de bzhin te/ji skad du smras pa bzhin te/rigs kyi bu 'am
50a5('bum): rigs kyi bu mo gang su'ang rung ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri zhing klog pa dang /ston cing kha ton du byed pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing
50a6('bum): bsgom pa de thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthu yin par rig par bya'o//de thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi gzungs yin par rig par bya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan
50a7('bum): 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri zhing klog pa dang /ston cing kha ton du bgyid pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la
50b1('bum): bgyid cing bsgom pa de dag ni shar phyogs nas phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad dang grangs ma mchis pa na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad dang grangs ma mchis
50b2('bum): pa bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /chos ston pa de dag gis mkhyen te/gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri zhing klog pa dang /ston cing kha ton du bgyid pa dang /
50b3('bum): tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid cing bsgom pa de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs so//thugs su chud do//bcom ldan 'das
50b4('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zang mo 'di 'dri zhing klog pa dang /ston
50b5('bum): cing kha ton du byed pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing bsgom pa de dag ni/shar phyogs dang /lho phyogs dang /nub phyogs dang /byang phyogs dang /byang shar gyi
50b6('bum): phyogs mtshams dang /shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang /lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang /nub byang gi phyogs mtshoms dang /'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas
50b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das tshad med grangs med pa de dag gis mkhyen to//sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs shing thugs su chud do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i theg
51a1('bum): pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /kun chub
51a2('bum): par byed pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /bsgom pa dang /de bzhin nyid du nan tan du byed pa de dag gis kyang 'di ltar bdag cig ni bla na med pa yang dag
51a3('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar gyur to zhes bya bar rig par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes
51a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri zhing glegs bam du byas te/'chang ba de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos pa mang bar 'gyur te/de dag
51a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la me tog dang /phreng ba dang /spos dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan
51a6('bum): mang pos rim gror byed bkur stir byed/phu dud du byed/mchod par byed do//de ltar rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
51a7('bum): 'di 'dri zhing 'chang ba de dag kyang don che ba dang /legs pa che ba dang /'bras bu che ba dang /rnam par smin pa che bar 'gyur te/shA ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang rigs
51b1('bum): kyi bu mo de dag ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sa yongs su non gyi bar du dge ba'i rtsa ba des nam yang ngan song du skye bar mi 'gyur ro//nam yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang bral
51b2('bum): bar mi 'gyur ro//shA radwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang //rigs kyi bu mo de dag bla na med pa yang dag por rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du dge
51b3('bum): ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro//bzod pa'i pha rol
51b4('bum): tu phyin pa dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang nam yang bral
51b5('bum): par mi 'gyur ro//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro//nang stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro//phyi stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral
51b6('bum): bar mi 'gyur ro//phyi nang stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang nAm yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro//chen po stong pa nyid dang nu ma yang bral
51b7('bum): bar mi 'gyur ro//don dam pa stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro//'dus byas stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
52a1('bum): dang num yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro//thog ma dang rnga ma med pa stong pa nyid dang nam yang
52a2('bum): bral bar mi 'gyur ro//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro//rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro//chos thams cad stong
52a3('bum): pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur
52a4('bum): ro//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
52a5('bum): dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro//yang dag par spong ba rnams dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur
52a6('bum): ro//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro//dbang po rnams dang nAm yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro//stobs rnams dang nam yang bral bar mi
52a7('bum): 'gyur ro//byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro//'phags
52b1('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro//bsam gtan rnams dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro//tshad med pa rnams dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro//
52b2('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro//rnam par thar pa brgyad dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
52b3('bum): par 'jug pa dgu dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro//
52b4('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro//ting nge 'dzin rnams dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro//gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur/
52b5('bum): ro//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro//mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro//so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang
52b6('bum): nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro//byams pa chen po dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro//snying rje chen po dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
52b7('bum): brgyad dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro//thams cad shes pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro//rnam
53a1('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro//shA ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di de bzhin gshogs pa 'das nas/lho phyogs/
53a2('bum): kyi rgyud na spyod par 'gyur te/de ni byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i dge slong dang /dge slong ma dang /dge bsnyen dang /dge bsnyen ma dag mos pa dam pas/shes rab kyi pha
53a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri bar 'gyur/'dzin par 'gyur/'chang bar 'gyur/klog par 'gyur/kun chub par byed par 'gyur/tshul bzhin du yid la byed par 'gyur te/me
53a4('bum): tog dang /phreng ba dang /spos dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan mang pos rim gror byed /bkur stir byed/phu dud
53a5('bum): du byed/mchod par byed par 'gyur ro//de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba des nam yang ngan sdong du log par ltung bar mi 'dong ste/de dag gis lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa myong zhing
53a6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis mngon par 'phags par 'gyur ro//de dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis mngon par 'phags par gyur nas/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
53a7('bum): rnams la rim gro dang /bkur sti dang /phu dud dang /mchod pa byed cing /nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
53b1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/theg pa gsum pas rim gyis mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro//shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di lho phyogs kyi rgyud nas
53b2('bum): yul bar ta ni na stod par gyur te/de na'ang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i dge slong dang /dge slong ma dang /dge bsnyen dang /dge bsnyen ma dag mos pa ngom pas shes rab
53b3('bum): kyipha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'od 'dra bar 'gyuraro/'dzin par 'gyur/'chang bar 'gyur/klog par 'gyur/kun chub par byed par 'gyur/tshul bzhin du yid la byed par 'gyur te/
53b4('bum): me tog dang /phreng ba dang /spos dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /bai dan mang pos rim gror byed/bkur stir byed/phu dud du
53b5('bum): byed/mchod par byed par 'gyur te/de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba des nam yang ngan song log par ltung bar mi 'dong ste/de dag gis lha dang mi'i phun sum tshegs pa myong zhing /
53b6('bum): rol tu phyin pa drug gis mngon par 'phags par 'gyur ro//de dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis mngon par 'phags par gyur nas/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
53b7('bum): rnams la rim gro dang /bkur sti dang /phu dud dang /mchod par byed cing /nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'am/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
54a1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/theg pa gsum pos rim gyis mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro//shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di
54a2('bum): yul bar ta ni nas byang phyogs kyi rgyud na spyod par 'gyur te/de na'ang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i dge slong dang /dge slong ma dang /dge bsnyen dang /dge bsnyen ma dag
54a3('bum): mos pa dam pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri bar 'gyur/'dzin par 'gyur/'chang bar 'gyur/klog par 'gyur/kun chub par byed par 'gyur/tshul
54a4('bum): bzhin du yid la byed par 'gyur te/me tog dang /phreng ba dang /spos dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan mang pos rim
54a5('bum): gror byed/bkur stir byed/phu dud du byed/mchod par byed par 'gyur te/de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba des nam yang ngan song log par ltung bar mi 'dong ste/de dag gis lha dang
54a6('bum): mi'i phun sum tshogs pa myong zhing /pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis mngon par 'phags par 'gyur ro//de dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis mngon par 'phags par gyur
54a7('bum): nas/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim gro dang /bkur sti dang /phu dud dang /mchod pa byed cing /nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/bla
54b1('bum): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/theg pa gsum pos rim gyis mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro//shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
54b2('bum): zab mo 'di lho phyogs kyi rgyud dang /byang phyogs kyi rgyud na phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe/lnga brgya tha ma la sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byed par 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ni 'di
54b3('bum): ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa'o//
54b4('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos dang 'dul ba dar la bab pa'i tshe/dam pa'i chos nub par mi 'gyur te/chos de'ang gang zhe na/'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'o//shA ra dwa ti'i
54b5('bum): bu rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par byed pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa
54b6('bum): dang /de bzhin nyid du nan tan du byed pa de dag la ni ngas dgongs so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri zhing bris
54b7('bum): nas kyang /me tog dang /phreng ba dang /spos dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan mang pos rim gror byed/bkur stir
55a1('bum): byed/phu dud du byed/mchod par byed pa de dag kyang ngas dgongs te/shA ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba des nam yang ngan
55a2('bum): song log par ltung bar mi 'dong ste/de dag lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa myong zhing /pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis mngon par 'phags par 'gyur ro//de dag pha rol tu
55a3('bum): phyin pa drug po de dag gis mngon par 'phags par gyur nas/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim gro dang /bkur sti dang /phu dud dang /mchod pa byed cing /nyan
55a4('bum): thos kyi theg pa'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/theg pa gsum pos rim gyis mya ngan las 'da'
55a5('bum): bar 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shA ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs so//shA ra dwa ti'i
55a6('bum): bu rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas brjod do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas bstod do//
55a7('bum): bsngags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shar phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
55b1('bum): bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs so//
55b2('bum): rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis brjod do//bstod do//bsngags so//rigs
55b3('bum): kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni lho phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /chos ston pa'i de
55b4('bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs so//rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de
55b5('bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis brjod do//bstod do//bsngags so//rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni nub
55b6('bum): phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho stong ba dang /chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
55b7('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs so//rigs kyi bu dong rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
56a1('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis brjod do//bstod do//bsngags so//rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni byang phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa
56a2('bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
56a3('bum): de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs so//rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
56a4('bum): de dag gis brjod do//bstod do//bsngags so//rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
56a5('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang sangs
56a6('bum): rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs so//rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis brjod do//
56a7('bum): bstod do//bsngags so//rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
56b1('bum): bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs so//rigs
56b2('bum): kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis brjod do//bstod do//bsngags so//rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi
56b3('bum): bu mo de dag ni lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /chos ston pa'i de bzhin
56b4('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs so//rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs/
56b5('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis brjod do//bstod do//bsngags so//rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi de
56b6('bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom po yang dag par rdzogs
56b7('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs so//rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
57a1('bum): rgyas de dag gis brjod do//bstod do//bsngags so//rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni 'og gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
57a2('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi
57a3('bum): sman gyis gzigs so//rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis brjod do//bstod do//
57a4('bum): bsngags so//rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni steng gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba
57a5('bum): dang /chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs so//rigs kyi bu dang rigs
57a6('bum): kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis brjod do//bstod do//bsngags so//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das
57a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di slad ma'i dus slad ma'i tshe na byang phyogs su rgyas par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no//
57b1('bum): dri de bzhin te/shA radwa tI'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe na byung phyogs su rgyas par 'gyur te/de la shA ra dwa ti'i bu phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe nA
57b2('bum): rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan par 'gyur te/thos nas kyang mos par 'gyur ro//mos par byas nas kyang 'dri ba dang /'dzin
57b3('bum): pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par byed pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing /de bzhin nyid du nan tan du byed par 'gyur ro//shA rAdwa ti'i bu byang chub
57b4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan cing thos nas mos par byed pa dang /mos par byas nas 'dri zhing 'dzin pa dang /'chang zhing
57b5('bum): klog pa dang /kun chub par byed cing /tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa de dag ni yun ring po nas theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa dang /sangs
57b6('bum): rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur po dang /dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par rig par bya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das slad
57b7('bum): ma'i dus srad ma'i tshe na byang gi phyogs cha der byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gong shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan cing thos
58a1('bum): nas mos par bgyid pa dang /mos par bgyis nas 'dri zhing 'dzin pa dang /'chang zhing klog pa dang /kun chub par bgyid cing /tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid
58a2('bum): pa dang /de bzhin nyid du nun tan du bgyid pa de lta bu ji snyed cig 'byung bar 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu phyi ma'i dus phye ma'i tshe na byang/
58a3('bum): gri phyogs cha der byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo ni meng du 'byung ste/shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang
58a4('bum): rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe mi 'dzum yongs su mi 'dzum/mi 'jigs mi dngang /skrag par mi 'gyur ba de lta bu ni mang ngo //de
58a5('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mang po'i rjes su 'brangs pa dang /
58a6('bum): rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mang po la yongs su zhus/yongs su dris pa'i phyir te//
58a7('bum): de'ang ci'i phyir zhe na/rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bsam
58b1('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//rigs
58b2('bum): kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
58b3('bum): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag
58b4('bum): ni nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de
58b5('bum): dag ni phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu dang
58b6('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//
58b7('bum): rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su
59a1('bum): rdzogs par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo
59a2('bum): de dag ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur
59a3('bum): ro//rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid
59a4('bum): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo
59a5('bum): de dag ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro///
59a6('bum): rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni dngos po med po'o ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
59a7('bum): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag
59b1('bum): ni yang dag par spong ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu
59b2('bum): mo de dag ni dbang po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni stobs yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni byang
59b3('bum): chub kyi yan lag yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu
59b4('bum): dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni 'phags pa'i bden pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bsam gtan yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//rigs
59b5('bum): kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa yongs su rdzogs par
59b6('bum): 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
59b7('bum): par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa yongs
60a1('bum): su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni mngon par shes pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni
60a2('bum): ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni gzungs kyi sgo yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag
60a3('bum): ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//
60a4('bum): rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni byams pa chen po yongs su/
60a5('bum): rdzogs par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
60a6('bum): 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//shA ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa bas nye bar brtan par 'gyur te/bla na med pa yang dag
60a7('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi don du skye bo mang po'i don byed par 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar shA ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la ni ngas rnam pa
60b1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i gtam brjod do//'das pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig byung ba'i
60b2('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i gtam brjod do//de dag tshe 'das nas
60b3('bum): kyang 'di lta ste/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi don du spyod pa nyid du 'gyur te/de dag gzhan lo'ang 'di lta ste/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
60b4('bum): chub kyi don du rnam pa de lta bu nyid brjod par 'gyur ro//shA ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur te/de dag ni bdud dam bdud kyi
60b5('bum): ris kyi lha rnams kyis kyang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las bzlog par mi nus na/sdig tol mos pa dang /sdig to'i spyod pa can shes rab kyi pha rol
60b6('bum): tu phyin pa zab myo 'dri la spong ba gzhan gyis lta ci smos/shA ra dwa tI'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol
60b7('bum): tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas/dga' zhing nyams bde ba rgya chen po skye bar 'gyur ro//'di ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi don du skye bo mang po'ang dge
61a1('bum): pa'i chos la 'god par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis ni nga'i mdun du 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das bdag cag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad
61a2('bum): pa spyod pa'i tshe/srog chags brgya phrag mang po dang /srog chags stong phrag mang po dang /srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po byang chub tu rab tu dgod par bgyi'o//yang dag par
61a3('bum): bstan par bgyi'o//yang dag par bskul bar bgyi'o//yang dag par gzengs bstod par bgyi'o//yang dag par dga' bar bgyi'o//phyir mi ldog par lung bstan par
61a4('bum): bgyi'o zhes bya ba'i tshig smras so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shA ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi tshig ni sems la sems kyis rnam par blta ste/ngas
61a5('bum): rjes su dgyes par mdzad do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar yang /rigs kyi
61a6('bum): bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis 'di skad du bdag cag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/srog chags brgya phrag mang po dang /srog tshogs stong phrag mang po dang /
61a7('bum): srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po byang chub tu dgod par bgyi'o//yang dag par bstan par bgyi'o//yang dag par bskul bar dgyi'o//yang dag par gzengs bstod
61b1('bum): par dgyi'o//yang dag par dga' bar bgyi'o//phyir mi ldog par lung bstan par bgyi'o zhes bya ba'i tshig smras so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
61b2('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi cho ga ni sems la thugs kyis rnam par gzigs te/rjes su dgyes
61b3('bum): par mdzad do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i spad pa spyod pa'i tshe/srog chags brgya phrag mang po dang /srog chags stong phrag mang po
61b4('bum): dang /srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu rab tu 'god par 'gyur/yang dag par ston par 'gyur/yang dag par bskul bar
61b5('bum): 'gyur/yang dag par gzengs bstod par 'gyur/yang dag par dga' bar byed par 'gyur/phyir mi ldog par lung ston par 'gyur ro//shA ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang
61b6('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/gzugs dang /sgra dang /dri dang /ro dang /reg la mos pa rlobs po cher 'gyur te/de dag sbyin pa rlabs po che gtong bar 'gyur ro//sbyin pa rlabs po che
61b7('bum): gtang zhing /dge ba'i rtsa ba rlabs po che mngon par 'du byed par 'gyur ro//de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba rlabs po che mngon par 'du byas nas/rnam par smin pa rlabs po che yongs su 'dzin
62a1('bum): par 'gyur te/rnam par smin pa rlabs po che yongs su bzung nas/sems can de dag nyid kyi don du rnam par smin pa rlabs po che las de bas kyang ches rlabs che
62a2('bum): ba'i rnam par smin pa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro//'di ltar phyi 'am nang gi dngos po de dag kyang /sems can de dag nyid la yongs su gtong bar 'gyur te/de dag dge
62a3('bum): ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan gang na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang //
62a4('bum): 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid kyi chos ston pa mngon du gyur pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag la brten par 'gyur ro//de dag gi de bzhin gshegs
62a5('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de rnams las/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di mngon sum du thos nas/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu'ang srog
62a6('bum): chags brgya phrag mang po dang /srog chags stong phrag mang po dang /srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par ston
62a7('bum): par 'gyur ro//yang dag par bskul bar 'gyur ro//yang dag par gzengs bstod par 'gyur ro//yang dag par dga' bar byed par 'gyur ro//gsol pa/bcom
62b1('bum): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis 'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams las/chos gang thugs su
62b2('bum): ma chud pa de lta bu gang yang ma mchis te/de bzhin nyid dang /chos nyid gang thugs su ma chud pa de lta bu gang yang ma mchis so//sems can rnams kyi sems thugs su ma chud pa
62b3('bum): de lta bu gang yang ma mchis pa ni ngo mtshar che ste/'di ltar 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen to//'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang
62b4('bum): yongs su mkhyen to//'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang nyan thos rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen to//ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi
62b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen to//ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang nyan thos rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen to//da ltar byung
62b6('bum): ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang nyan thos rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen to//phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/de bzhin gshogs pa dgra bcom
62b7('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
63a1('bum): de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen to//sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang nyan thos rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen to//bcom ldan 'das gang yang byang
63a2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag gi slad du brtson par bgyid cing /pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag 'tshol ba dang yongs su 'tshol ba'i tshe//
63a3('bum): rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag 'tshol ba dang /yongs su 'tshol ba las kyang la las ni btsal ba las pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag thob par
63a4('bum): 'gyur/la las ni thob par mi 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ni de lta ma yin te/rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo brtson 'grus mi gtong ba
63a5('bum): de dag kun gyis kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag pa
63a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag gi don du brtson par byed pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa ci lags/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis mdo sde zab mo zab mo pa
63a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa 'di dag kun kyang 'grub par 'gyur ram/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis mdo
63b1('bum): sde zab mo zab mo pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa 'di dag mi 'grub par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gnas med skabs med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar bla na med pa yang dag
63b2('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems can rnams yang dag par ston cing /yang drag par bskul ba dang /yang dag par gzengs bstod pa dang /yang dag par dga' bar byed pa
63b3('bum): dang /'god cing rab tu gzhog pa las kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/shA ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo tshe 'das nas kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag 'grub par
63b4('bum): 'gyur ro//de dag ni nam sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par ma byas/sems can yongs su smin par ma byas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
63b5('bum): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par ma gyur gyi bar du ji skad du bstan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag las brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
63b6('bum): stong phrag brgya pa las/le'u sum cu da pa'o////shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa//bam po nyis brgya drug pa//de nas tshe dang ldan pa
63b7('bum): rab 'byor gyis/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
64a1('bum): zhugs pa/pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa/sems can yongs su smin par bgyid pa/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin par bgyid pa de dag gi
64a2('bum): yon tan yongs su brjod pa ni 'di dag legs na/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spyod pa de dag la bar
64a3('bum): chad du 'gyur ba ji lta bu dag mchis/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor spobs pa ha cang 'phyi skye skye na/rab 'byor de ni byang chub semos dpa' sems
64a4('bum): dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du spobs pa ha cang 'phyi ste skye bar 'gyur/de ni ci'i slad du byang chub sems
64a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
64a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la smod pa'i tshe/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dka' bar yongs su rdzogs par byed/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dka' bar yongs su rdzogs
64a7('bum): par byed/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dka' bar yongs su rdzogs par byed/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dka' bar yongs su rdzogs par byed/tshul khrims kyi
64b1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa dka' bar yongs su rdzogs par byed/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dka' bar yongs su rdzogs par byed na/rab 'byor rnam grangs des shin tu 'phyi ste skyo bar 'gyur/
64b2('bum): ro//de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po so bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang shin tu myur bar spobs pa skye na/byang chub sems dpa'
64b3('bum): sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du shin tu myur bar spobs pa skye bar 'gyur/de ni ci'i slad du byang chub sems
64b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i
64b5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa
64b6('bum): dang /bsam gtani gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas ha cang myur bar spobs pa skye la des rlom sems
64b7('bum): su byed na/rab 'byor rnam grangs des na spobs po ha cang myur bar skye ba ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang
65a1('bum): glal cing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dri 'dri na/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//rab 'byor
65a2('bum): gzhan yang dgod cing 'dri na/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//rab 'byor phan tshun steg cing 'dri na/rab
65a3('bum): 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//sems g.yeng zhing 'dri na/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems
65a4('bum): dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//yi ge gzhan la chags shing tshig gi don mi shes par 'dri na/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
65a5('bum): pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//'di'i ro ma myong nas stan las langs te 'gro na/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig
