65a6('bum): par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang glal cing lung 'bog na/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi lus su rig par bya'o//glal cing kha
65a7('bum): ton byed dam/'dzin tam klog gam/ston pa dang /glal cing tshul bzhin du yid la byed na/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su
65b1('bum): rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang phan tshun dgod cing 'dzin tam/'chang ngam/klog gam/kun chub par byed dam/tshul bzhin du yid la byed na/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub
65b2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang phan tshun steg cing 'dzin tam/'chang ngam/klog gam/kun chub par byed dam/tshul
65b3('bum): bzhin du yid la byed na/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang sems g.yeng bas 'dzin tam/'chang /
65b4('bum): ngam/klog gam/kun chub par byed dam/tshul bzhin du yid la byed na/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//rab 'byor/
65b5('bum): gzhan yang yi ge gzhan dang gzhan la chags shing 'dzin tam/'chang ngam/klog gam/kun chub par byed dam/tshul bzhin du yid la byed na/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub
65b6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
65b7('bum): to//bcom ldan 'das kyis gang 'di skad du 'di'i ro ma myong nas stan las langs te 'gro na/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig
66a1('bum): par bya'o zhes bka' stsal na/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du 'di'i ro mi myong bar 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal bya/rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar
66a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sngon shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
66a3('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ma spyad pa de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan
66a4('bum): pa'i tshe/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las bdag cag lung ma bstan to zhes ma dad pa'i yid kyis stan los langs shing 'dong ste/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems
66a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las lung ma bstan pa de dag
66a6('bum): stan las langs shing mchi bar 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skyon med par ma chud pa ni/bla
66a7('bum): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung mi bstan to//de la bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las mi 'byung ngo //bdag gi ming yang yongs su ma
66b1('bum): brjod do zhes dad par ma gyur na/rab 'byor de'adra byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/shes
66b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi ming yongs su ma brjod pa logs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor
66b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhung ma bstan pa rnams kyi ming ni yongs su mi brjod de/de la bdag gi ming yang 'di las mi 'byung /bdag grang du skyes pa'i grong
66b4('bum): ngam/grong khyer ram/grong rdal gyi ming 'di'ang mi 'byung ngo zhes/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi mnyan to snyam byed cing /'khor de nas 'gro bar sems na/sems
66b5('bum): bskyed pa des ji lta ji ltar 'gro bar sems shing gom pa ji snyed cig bor ba de snyed kyi bskal pa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur te/de dag la bzod pa la brtson par bya dgos so//de
66b6('bum): shos rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bor zhing mdo sde gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes yongs su mi sgrub pa de dag kun chub par bya bar sems te/des na byang chub sems
66b7('bum): dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shing gi rtsa ba spangs te de nyid kyi yan lag dang /'dab ma dang /lo ma la 'ju bar
67a1('bum): sems par gyur pa dag ste/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das rnam
67a2('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes yongs su mi sgrub pa'i mdo sde kun chub par bgyi bar sems par 'gyur ba de gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/mdo
67a3('bum): sde gang nyan thos dang ldan pa'am/rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa de dag ste/'di ltar dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
67a4('bum): pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
67a5('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa rnams te/de dag la gnas shing rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo dag rgyan du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob pa dang /lan cig phyir
67a6('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid 'thob pa dang /rang byang chub 'thob par 'gyur gyi/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
67a7('bum): chub 'thob par mi 'gyur ba ste/rab 'byor de dag ni nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde gang la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bor zhing kun chub par bya bar
67b1('bum): sems pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes yongs su mi sgrub pa'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
67b2('bum): tu phyin pa las byung ba ni 'jig rten pa dang /'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams kyis 'byung bar 'gyur te/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa'i byang
67b3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni 'jig rten pa dang /'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams la slob pa yin no//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/khyi la la zhig rje bo'i
67b4('bum): zan nar ma bor te las mi las zan btsal bar sems pa dang 'dra ba de bzhin du/rab 'byor ma 'ongs pa'i dus na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /rigs
67b5('bum): kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rtse bar gyur pa 'di bor te/yal ga dang /lo ma dang /'dab ma lta bu'i mdo sde nyan thos
67b6('bum): dang /rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa dag la brten par sems pa 'byung ste/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o///
67b7('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bor nas
68a1('bum): khe dang bkur sti'i phyir nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde rnams kun chub par bya bar sems pa 'byung ste/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub
68a2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/mi la lo zhig glang po 'dod la des glang po rnyed nas glang po'i rjes
68a3('bum): btsal bar sems pa yod na/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/skyes bu de mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lugs so//
68a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bor zhing mdo sde
68a5('bum): gang nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa de dag btsal bar sems pa dag kyang dpe de dang 'dra bar rig par bya ste/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems
68a6('bum): dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/mi zhig rgya mtsho chen po blta bar 'dod la/ba lang gi rjes btsal bar sems shing
68a7('bum): des ba lang gi rjes mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du rgya mtsho chen po'i tshad 'di dang mnyam mam mi mnyam snyam na/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/skyes bu da mkhas pa'i
68b1('bum): dang tshul can+da yin nam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//byud bar go shugs pa de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab
68b2('bum): 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa po'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bris shing rnyed kyang /shes rab kyi
68b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa zab mo bor zhing stangs te/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag gzung ba dang kun chub par bya bar sems pa de dag kyang rnam pa de ltar ri
68b4('bum): par bya ste/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/sgyu mkhyen nam phywa mkhan gyi slo ma
68b5('bum): rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa'i tshang du khang pa zhig dbub cing bslang bar 'dod de nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzhal med khang yongs su btsal bar sems shing /nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzhal med
68b6('bum): khang las ched blang bar sems na/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/skyes bu des nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzhal med khang gi tshad kyis rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa'i tshad dang dpe tshul
68b7('bum): bzung ste/de dang 'dra bab bang po dbub par nus sam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das doni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam
69a1('bum): du sems/phywa mkhan nam/phywa mkhan gyi slob ma de mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das skyes bu de ni byis pa'i ngang tshul
69a2('bum): can du rig par bgyi ste/mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na byang chub sems
69a3('bum): dpa theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos shing rnyed nas kyang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo bor zhing
69a4('bum): spangs te/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag las rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su btsal bar sems pa 'byung na/rab 'byor de ji snyam
69a5('bum): du sems/byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni me lags
69a6('bum): so//bde bar gshegs pa de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las
69a7('bum): su rig par bya'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/skyes bu la la zhig 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mthong bar 'dod la/des khams kyi rgyal phran mthong nas/'di snyam
69b1('bum): du 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de kha dog dang /dbyibs ci 'dra ba zhig yod ces des khams kyi rgyal phran mthong ba'i kha dog dang dbyibs kyi mtshan ma bzung bar bsams te/'di skad
69b2('bum): du 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de'i kha dog dang /dbyibs dang tshul dang mtshan ma'ang sa'i bdag po 'di 'dra ba zhig yod grang zhes zer na/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/skyes
69b3('bum): bu de mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bde bar gshegs pa de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
69b4('bum): pa/rab 'byor de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos shing
69b5('bum): rnyed kyang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo bor zhing spangs te/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag las/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su
69b6('bum): btsal bar sems pa 'byung na/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/
69b7('bum): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma legs so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig
70a1('bum): par bya'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/skyes bu shin tu bkres pa la la zhig gis ro brgya dang ldan pa'i kha zas rnyed kyang drug cu pa'i kha zas btsal bar sems
70a2('bum): shing /des kha zas ro brgya dang ldan pa de bor nas drug cu po'i kha zas la bza' bar bsams na/rab 'byor de rje snyam+ba du sems/skyes bu de mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can+da yin nam/
70a3('bum): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de bzhin du ma 'ongs po'i dus na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa
70a4('bum): pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos shing rnyed kyang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo bar zhing spangs te/nyan thos
70a5('bum): dang /rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag las rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su btsal bar sems pa 'byung na/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/byung
70a6('bum): chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das do ni ma lags so//bcom
70a7('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/
70b1('bum): skyes bu la la zhig gis nor bu rin po che rin thang med pa rnyed nas/nor bu mching bu dang bskrun par bsams na/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/skyes bu de mkhas pa'i ngang tshul
70b2('bum): can yin nam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/byang chub sems
70b3('bum): dpa' theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos shing rnyed nas kyang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo bor zhing
70b4('bum): spangs te/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag las/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su btsal bar sems pa 'byung na/rab 'byor de la ji snyam
70b5('bum): du sems/byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//
70b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang rigs kyi bu
70b7('bum): dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba'i tshe/spobs pa mang po gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba'i dkrugs mar
71a1('bum): 'gyur ba de lta bu skye bar 'gyur ba ste/'di ltar gzugs kyi spobs pa dang /sgra'i spobs pa dang /dri'i spobs pa dang /ro'i spobs pa dang /reg gi spobs pa
71a2('bum): dang /chos kyi spobs pa dang /smyon pa'i spobs pa dang /tshul khrims kyi spobs pa dang /bzod pa'i spobs pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi spobs pa dang /bsam gtan gyi
71a3('bum): spobs pa dang /shes rab kyi spobs pa dang /'dod pa'i khams kyi spobs pa dang /gzugs kyi khams kyi spobs pa dang /gzugs med pa'i khams kyi spobs pa dang /
71a4('bum): lung dbog pa dang /kha ton bya ba'i spobs pa dang /rim gror bya ba'i spobs pa dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang /yang dag par spong ba'i spobs pa dang /
71a5('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i spobs pa dang /dbang po'i spobs pa dang /stobs kyi spobs pa dang /byang chub kyi yan lag gi spobs pa dang /lam gyi spobs pa dang /bsam gtan
71a6('bum): gyi spobs pa dang /rnam par thar pa'i spobs pa dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi spobs pa dang /snyoms par 'jug pa'i spobs pa dang /nang stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang /phyi stong
71a7('bum): pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang /chen po stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid
71b1('bum): kyi spobs pa dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi stobs pa dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi spobasdu pa dang /thog mo dang thom
71b2('bum): med pa stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang /rang gi
71b3('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang /myi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang /
71b4('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi spongs pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spobs pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spobs pa dang /bzod pa'i pha
71b5('bum): rol tu phyin pa'i spobs pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spobs pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spobs pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
71b6('bum): spobs pa dang /stobs bcu'i spobs pa dang /mi 'jigs pa'i spobs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa'i spobs pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i spobs pa dang /
71b7('bum): rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i spobs pa dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i spobs pa dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i spobs pa dang /dgra bcom pa'i spobs pa dang
72a1('bum): rang byang chub kyi spobs pa dang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi spobs pa skye bar 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha
72a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa ni spobs pa med pas rnam par byang ba'o//rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o//rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
72a3('bum): ni sems med pa'o//rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni skye ba med cing 'gag pa med pa'o//rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni kun nas nyon mongs pa med
72a4('bum): cing rnam par byang ba med pa'o//rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'khrug pa med pa'o//rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni brjod du med pa'o//rab 'byor
72a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rnam par byang ba med pa'o//rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dmigs pa med pa'o//rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/chos de dag ni
72a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la med cing mi dmigs te/rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab
72a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba'i tshe/chos de dag gis 'khrug par gyur na/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa po'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo
72b1('bum): de dag gi bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das
72b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bri bar nus sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de lta ma yin no//rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/shes rab kyi pha rol
72b3('bum): tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
72b4('bum): ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid yod
72b5('bum): pa ma yin te mi dmigs so//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so//nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so///
72b6('bum): phyi stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so//phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma
72b7('bum): yin te mi dmigs so//chen po stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so//don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so//'dus byas
73a1('bum): stong pa nyid kyang za nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so//'dus ma byas stong ba nyid kyang ba nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so//mtha' las 'das pa/
73a2('bum): stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi
73a3('bum): ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmigs so//chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa mu
73a4('bum): yin te mi dmigs so//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi
73a5('bum): dmigs so//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so//dngos po
73a6('bum): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so//yang dag par
73a7('bum): spong ba rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so//dbang po rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa/
73b1('bum): ma yin te mi dmigs so//stobs rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so//byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so//'phags
73b2('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so//bsam gtan
73b3('bum): rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so//tshad med pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
73b4('bum): kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so//rnam par thar pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
73b5('bum): rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs
73b6('bum): so//mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so//ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so//gzungs kyi sgo rnams
73b7('bum): kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so//mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi ngo bo
74a1('bum): nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so//so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so//snying rje chen po'i ngo bo nyid yod
74a2('bum): pa ma yin te mi dmigs so//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so//thams cad shes pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin
74a3('bum): te mi dmigs so//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi
74a4('bum): dmigs so//ngo bo nyid mi dmigs pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/dngos po med pas
74a5('bum): dngos po med pa bri bar mi nus so//rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di dngos
74a6('bum): po med ces bya bar 'du shes na/de'ang bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//gsol pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigos kyi bu 'am rigs
74a7('bum): kyi bu mo gang la les shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger bris nas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bdag gis bris so zhes mchin//
74b1('bum): dri ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la yi ger mngon par chags pa lags te/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//bsam gtan
74b2('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//tshul khrims kyi
74b3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//bcom ldan 'das gzugs ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//tshor ba ni yi ge ma
74b4('bum): mchis pa'o//'du shes ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//'du byed ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//rnam par shes pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//mig ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//rna ba ni
74b5('bum): yi ge ma mchis pa'o//sna ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//lce ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//lus ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//yid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//gzugs ni yi ge ma
74b6('bum): mchis pa'o//sgra ni yi ge mi mchis pa'o//dri ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//ro nI yi ge ma mchis pa'o//reg ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//chos ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//mig gi
74b7('bum): rnam par shes pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//sna'i rnam par shes pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//lce'i rnam par shes pa ni yig ma
75a1('bum): mchis pa'o//lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni yi ge
75a2('bum): ma mchis pa'o//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//lus kyi 'dus
75a3('bum): te reg pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//rna ba'i 'dus te
75a4('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nI yi ge ma
75a5('bum): mchis pa'o//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//sa'i khams ni
75a6('bum): yi ge ma mchis pa'o//chu'i khams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//me'i khams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//rlung gi khams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//nam mkha'i khams ni
75a7('bum): yi ge ma mchis pa'o//rnam par shes pa'i khams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//ma rig pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//'du byed ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//rnam par shes
75b1('bum): pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//mr-ing dang gzugs ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//skye mched drug nI yi ge ma mchis pa'o//reg pa nI yi ge ma mchis pa'o//tshor ba nI yi ge ma mchis
75b2('bum): pa'o//sred pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//len pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//sbrid pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//skye ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//rga shi ni yi ge ma mchis
75b3('bum): pa'o//nang stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//phyi stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//phyi nang stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma
75b4('bum): mchis pa'o//chen po stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//don dam pa stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//'dus byas stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//'dus ma
75b5('bum): byas stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//dor ba
75b6('bum): med pa stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//rang gi mtshan nyid stong
75b7('bum): pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma
76a1('bum): mchis pa'o//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//yang dag par spong
76a2('bum): ba rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//dbang po rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//stobs rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o///
76a3('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis
76a4('bum): pa'o//bsam gtan rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//tshad med pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis
76a5('bum): pa'o//rnam par thar pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
76a6('bum): dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//mngon par shes pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//ting nge 'dzin rnams ni yi ge ma mchis
76a7('bum): pa'o//gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//mi 'jigs pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o///
76b1('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//byams pa chen po ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//snying rje chen po ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
76b2('bum): pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//thams cad shes pa nyid na yi ge ma mchis pa'o//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
76b3('bum): nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo yi ge ma mchis pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
76b4('bum): la mngon par chags par bgyid la/yi ge ma mchis pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags par bgyid cing /yi ge ma mchis pa'i brtson 'grus kyi
76b5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /yi ge ma mchis pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /yi ge ma mchis pa'i
76b6('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /yi ge ma mchis pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /yi ge
76b7('bum): ma mchis pa'i nang stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /yi ge ma mchis pa'i phyi stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /yi ge ma mchis pa'i
77a1('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /yi ge ma mchis pa'i stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /yi ge ma
77a2('bum): mchis pa'i chen po stong pa nyid lnga mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /yi ge ma mchis pa'i don dam pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /yi ge ma
77a3('bum): mchis pa'i 'dus byas stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /yi ge ma mchis pa'i 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /yi ge
77a4('bum): ma mchis pa'i mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /yi ge ma mchis pa'i thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags
77a5('bum): par bgyid pa dang /yi ge ma mchis pa'i dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /yi ge ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin stong pa nyid la mngon par
77a6('bum): chags par bgyid pa dang /yi ge ma mchis pa'i chos thams cad stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /yi ge ma mchis pa'i rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
77a7('bum): la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /yi ge ma mchis pa'i mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /yi ge ma mchis pa'i dngos po med pa
77b1('bum): stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /yi ge ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /yi ge ma mchis pa'i dngos po med pa'i
77b2('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /yi ge ma mchis pa'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /yi ge ma mchis
77b3('bum): pa'i yang dag par spong ba rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /yi ge ma mchis pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /yi ge
77b4('bum): ma mchis pa'i dbang po rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /yi ge ma mchis pa'i stobs rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /yi ge ma mchis pa'i byang
77b5('bum): chub kyi yan lag rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /yi ge ma mchis pa'i 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /yi
77b6('bum): ge ma mchis pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /yi ge ma mchis pa'i bsam gtan rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /
77b7('bum): yi ge ma mchis pa'i tshad med pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /yi ge ma mchis pa'i gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mngon par chags par
78a1('bum): bgyid pa dang /yi ge ma mchis pa'i rnam par thar pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /yi ge ma mchis pa'i mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
78a2('bum): par 'jug pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /yi ge ma mchis pa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa la
78a3('bum): mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /yi ge ma mchis pa'i mngon par shes pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /yi ge ma mchis pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams la
78a4('bum): mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /yi ge ma mchis pa'i gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /yi ge ma mchis pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i
78a5('bum): stobs rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /yi ge ma mchis pa'i mi 'jigs pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /yi ge ma mchis pa'i so so
78a6('bum): yang drug par rig pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /yi ge ma mchis pa'i byams pa chen po la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /yi ge ma mchis
78a7('bum): pa'i snying rje chen po la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /yi ge ma mchis pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /yi ge ma
78b1('bum): mchis pa'i thams cad shes pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /yi ge ma mchis pa'i lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la mngon par chags par 'gyid pa dang /yi ge
78b2('bum): ma mchis pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid na/de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//bcoms
78b3('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi/
78b4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /kha ton byed pa dang /zhu ba dang /'dzin pa dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par byed pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /bsgom
78b5('bum): pa'i tshe yul gyi yid la bya ba mang po skyed na/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub
78b6('bum): sems dpa'i theg pa po'i rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /kha ton byed pa dang /zhu ba dang /'dzin pa dang /klog pa
78b7('bum): dang /kun chub par byed pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang bsgom pa'i tshe/grong gi yid la bya ba dang /grong rdal gyi yid la bya ba dang /khams kyi yid la bya ba
79a1('bum): dang /rgyal ba'i pho brang 'khor gyi yid la bya ba dang /khyim gyi yid la bya ba dang /b+h+ra ma dang /mkhan po'i yid la bya ba dang /ma dang ldan pa'i yid la
79a2('bum): bya ba dang /pha dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /phu nu dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /sring mo dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /gnyen bshes dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /
79a3('bum): rkun po dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /phyag dar ba dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /'jig rten pa dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /smad 'tshong ma dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
79a4('bum): dang /bud med dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /yid la bye ba gzhan mang po skye na/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /'chang ba dang //
79a5('bum): klog pa dang /lung dbog pa dang /kha ton byed pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i tshe/bar chad bya ba'i phyir bdud sdig to can 'khrug par 'gyur ba nye bar sbyor te/de
79a6('bum): dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhon yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs
79a7('bum): kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba'i tshe/khe dang bkur sti dang /tshigs su bcad pa dang /chos gos dang zas dang /mal cha dang /nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang
79b1('bum): yo byad mang po byung la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang lung dpog pa dang /kha ton byed pa dang ///
79b2('bum): tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i tshe/de dag gi ro myong bar byed na/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya ste/shes rab
79b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /lung dbog pa dang /kha ton byed pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i tshe/bar chad de lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro//rab 'byor
79b4('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /lung dbog pa dang /kha ton byed pa dang /
79b5('bum): tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /bsgom pa'i tshe bdud sdig to can dag mdo sde zab mo zab mo gang nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa
79b6('bum): rnams dang /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /dbang po rnams dang /stobs rnams dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /'phags
79b7('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dag nye bar bsnyen par byed de/de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i
80a1('bum): theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo thabs mkhas pas bdud kyis bsnyen pa'i mdo sde zab mo zab mo de dag la 'dod pa mi skyed do//rab 'byor de
80a2('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/de dag na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed pa ma yin no//rab 'byor de la byang chub sems dpa' thabs mi mkhas pa dag ni/shes rab
80a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas spang bar sems te/de la ngas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la thabs mkhas pa'ang rgya cher bstan te/
80a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las kyang thabs mkhas pa rgya cher btsal bar bya'o//rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /rigs
80a5('bum): kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bor zhing /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag las thabs mkhas pa btsal bar sems pa yod na//
80a6('bum): rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/le'u sum
80a7('bum): cu rtsa gcig pa'o////shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa//bam po nyis brgya bdun po//rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni
80b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dri bri ba dang /lung dbog pa dang /kha ton bya bar dga' la chos smra ba ni phyi shol byed na/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa'
80b2('bum): sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bri ba dang /lung dbog pa dang /kha
80b3('bum): ton bya bar phyi shol mi byed la/chos nyan pa ni yul gzhan du 'gro na/rab 'byor de'ing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//rang
80b4('bum): 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bri ba dang /lung dbog pa dang /kha ton bya bar 'dod la/chos smra bA ni yul gzhan du 'gro na/rab 'byor de'ang
80b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni khe dang bkur sti dang /tshigs su bcad pa lhur len cing
80b6('bum): gos dang /zas dang /mal cha dang /nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang /yo byad lhur len la chos nyan pa ni 'dod pa nyung zhing chog shes la rab tu dben zhing brtson 'grus brtsams pa/dran
80b7('bum): pa nye bar bzhag pa mi g.yeng ba sems rtse gcig tu 'dus pa shes rab dang ldan pa zhig ste/khe dang bkur stis 'jigs na/rab 'byor de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
81a1('bum): pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /lung 'bog pa dang /kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen dang mi ldan pa ste/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/
81a2('bum): bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni 'dod pa chung zhing chog shes la rab tu dben zhing brtson 'grus brtsams pa/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa mi
81a3('bum): g.yeng ba/sems rtse gcig tu 'dus pa/shes rab dang ldan pa zhig ste/khe dang bkur stis 'jigs la chos nyan po ni 'dod pa che zhing sdig to 'dod la/khe dang
81a4('bum): bkur sti dang /tshigs su bcad pa lhur len cing /gos dang /zas dang /mal cha dang /nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang /yo byad lhur len na/rab 'byor de'ang shes rab kyi
81a5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'od 'dri ba dang /lung 'bog pa dang /kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
81a6('bum): bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni dgon pa pa/bsod snyoms pa/phyag dar khrod pa/zas phyis mi len pa/stan gcig pa/ci thob
81a7('bum): pa'i bsod snyoms len pa/dur khrod pa/bla gab med pa/shing drung pa/cog bu pa/gzhi ji bzhin pa/chos gos gsum par gyur la/chos nyan pa ni dgon pa pa
81b1('bum): ma yin/bsod snyoms pa ma yin/phyag dar khrod pa ma yin/zas phyis mi len pa ma yin/snyun gcig pa ma yin/ci thob pa'i bsod snyoms len pa ma yin/dur khrod pa ma
81b2('bum): yin/bla gab med pa ma yin/shing drung pa ma yin/cog pu pa ma yin/gzhi ji bzhin pa ma yin/chos gos gsum pa ma yin na/rab 'byor de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
81b3('bum): pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /lung 'bog pa dang /kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o///
81b4('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni dgon pa pa/bsod snyoms pa/phyag dar khrod pa/zas phyis mi len pa/stan gcig pa/zas ci thob pa'i bsod snyoms len pa/dur khrod pa//
81b5('bum): bla gab med pa/shing drung pa/cog pu pa/gzhi ji bzhin pa/chosu gos gsum par gyur la/chos smra ba ni dgon pa pa ma yin/bsod snyoms pa ma yin/phyag dar khrod pa ma
81b6('bum): yin/zas phyis mi len pa ma yin/stan gcig pa ma yin/ci thob pa'i bsod snyoms len pa ma yin/dur khrod pa ma yin/bla gab med pa ma yin/shing drung pa ma yin/cog
81b7('bum): bu pa ma yin/gzhi ji bzhin pa ma yin/chos gos gsum pa ma yin na/rab 'byor de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /lung 'bog pa dang /kha ton
82a1('bum): byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang chos
82a2('bum): nyan pa ni dad cing bsam pa dag la/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bri bar 'dod/lung dbog par 'dod/kha ton byed par 'dod la/chos smra ba ni ma dad pa//
82a3('bum): tshul khrims ngan pa can/sdig pa'i chos can zhig ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bri bar mi 'dod/lung dbog par mi 'dod/kha ton byed par mi 'dod
82a4('bum): na/rab 'byor de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dri ba dang /lung 'bog pa dang /kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems
82a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba na dod cing bsam pa dag la/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
82a6('bum): 'di bri bar 'dod/lung dbog par 'dod/kha ton byed par 'dod la/chos nyan pa ni ma dad ni/rab 'byor de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang //
82a7('bum): lung 'dog pa dang /kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//rab 'byor/
82b1('bum): gzhan yang chos smra ba ni/bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong zhing sems la chags pa med la/chos nyan pa ni ser sna can chags pa'i sems dang ldan zhing 'jungs par gyur
82b2('bum): na/rab 'byor de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /lung 'bog pa dang /kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems
82b3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong zhing sems la chags pa med
82b4('bum): la/chos smra ba ni ser sA can rdzogs pa'i sems dang ldan zhing 'jungs par gyur na/rab 'byor de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /lung 'bog pa
82b5('bum): dang /kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang chos
82b6('bum): nyan pa ni chos smra ba la gos dang /zas dang /mal cha dang /nod kyi rkyen rtsi dang /yo byad yongs su gtong bar 'dod la chos smra ba ni len par mi 'dod na/rab 'byor de'ang shes
82b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /lung 'bog pa dang /kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
83a1('bum): bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni glengs pa tsam gyis shes la/chos nyan pa ni bkri dgos shing tshig lhur len par gyur na/
83a2('bum): rab 'byor de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /lung 'bog pa dang /kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems
83a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni glengs pa tsam gyis shes la/chos smra ba ni bkri dgos shing tshig
83a4('bum): lhur len par gyur na/rab 'byor de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /lung 'bog pa dang /kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyeni mi ldan pa ste/rab 'byor de'ang
83a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni mdo dang dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang /lung bstan pa
83a6('bum): dang /tshigs su bcad pa dang /ched du brjod pa dang /gleng gzhi dang /'di ltar 'das pa dang /skyes pa'i rabs dang /shin tu rgyas pa dang /chos rmad du byung ba
83a7('bum): dang /rtogs pa brjod pa dang /gtan la bab pa bstan pa'i chos kyi khyad par shes la chos nyan pa ni mdo dang dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang /lung bstan pa dang /
83b1('bum): tshigs su bcad pa dang /ched du brjod pa dang /gleng gzhi dang /'di ltar 'das pa dang /skyes pa'i rabs dang /shin tu rgyas pa dang /chos rmad du byung ba dang /rtogs pa
83b2('bum): brjod pa dang /gtan la bab pa bstan pa'i chos kyi khyad par mi shes ni/rab 'byor de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /lung 'bog pa dang /khya
83b3('bum): tonyon byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni mdo
83b4('bum): dang /dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang /lung bstan pa dang /tshigs su bcad pa dang /ched du brjod pa dang /gleng gzhi dang /'di ltar 'das pa dang /skyes pa'i rabs dang /
83b5('bum): shin tu rgyas pa dang /chos rmad du byung ba dang /rtogs pa brjod pa dang /gtan la bab pa bstan pa'i chos kyi khyad par shes la/chos smra ba ni mdo dang dbyangs kyis bsnyad
83b6('bum): pa dang /lung bstan pa dang /tshigs su bcad pa dang /ched du brjod pa dang /gleng gzhi dang /'di ltar 'das pa dang /skyes pa'i rabs dang /shin tu rgyas pa dang /chos
83b7('bum): rmad du byung ba dang /rtogs pa brjod pa dang /gtan la bab pa bstan pa'i chos kyi khyad par mi shes na/rab 'byor de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba
84a1('bum): dang /lung 'bog pa dang /kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//
84a2('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan la/chos nyan pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang mi ldan na/rab 'byor de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa za
84a3('bum): mo 'di 'dri ba dang /lung 'bog pa dang /kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/rab 'byor do'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par
84a4('bum): bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan la/chos smra ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang mi ldan na/rab 'byor de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
84a5('bum): phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /lung 'bog pa dang /kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las
84a6('bum): su rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug la thabs mkhas la/chos nyan pa n-i pha rol tu phyin pa drug la thabs mi mkhas na/rab
84a7('bum): 'byor de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /lung 'bog pa dang /kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa'
84b1('bum): sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug la thabs mkhas la/chos smra ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug la
84b2('bum): thabs mi mkhas na/rab 'byor de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /lung 'bog pa dang /kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/rab 'byor de'ang
84b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni gzungs thob par gyur la/chos nyan pa ni gzungs ma thob
84b4('bum): na/rab 'byor de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /lung 'bog pa dang /kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems
84b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni gzungs thob par gyur la/chos smra ba ni gzungs ma thob na/rab 'byor
84b6('bum): de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /lung 'bog pa dang /kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
84b7('bum): chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni bri bar 'dod/klag par 'dod/lung dbog par 'dod/kha ton bya bar 'dod/bsgom par
85a1('bum): 'dod la/chos nyan pa ni bri bar mi 'dong /klag par mi 'dod/lung dbog par mi 'dod/kha ton bya bar mi 'dod/mnyan par mi 'dod/bsgom par mi 'dod na/
85a2('bum): rab 'byor de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /lung 'bog pa dang /kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems
85a3('bum): dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni bri bar 'dod/klag par 'dod/lung dbog par 'dod/kho ton bya bar 'dod/mnyan par
85a4('bum): 'dod la chos smra ba ni bri bar mi 'dod/klog par mi 'dod/lung dbog par mi 'dod//kha ton bya bar mi 'dod/bsgom par mi 'dod par gyur na/rab 'byor de'ang shes
85a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zang mo 'di 'dri ba dang /lung 'bog pa dang /kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
85a6('bum): bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni 'dod pa'i sred pa dang bral/gnod sems dang /sbom po dang /gnyid dang 'gyod pa dang bral/the tshom
85a7('bum): dang bral la/chos nyan pa ni 'dod pa'i sred pa dang bcas/gnod sems dang /snyom pa dang /gnyid dang /'gyod pa dang bcas the tshom dang bcas par gyur na/rab 'byor
85b1('bum): de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /lung 'bog pa dang /kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
85b2('bum): bos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni 'dod pa'i sred pa dang bral/gnod sems dang /snyom pa dang /gnyid dang 'gyod pa dang bral/
85b3('bum): tshom dang bral la/chos smra ba ni 'dod pa'i sred pa dang bcas/gnod sems dang /snyom pa dang /gnyid dang /'gyod pa dang bcas/the tshom dang bcas par gyur na/rab
85b4('bum): 'byor de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /lung dbog pa dang /kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems
85b5('bum): dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /klog pa dang /lung 'bog pa dang /kha ton byed pa
85b6('bum): dang /'chang ba dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i tshe/la la zhig der 'ongs te/sems can dmyal ba'i mi snyan pa brjod/byol song gi skye gnas dang /gshin rje'i 'jig
85b7('bum): rten dang /yi dgas kyi yul gyi mi snyan pa brjod cing /sems can dmyal ba ni 'di ltar sdug bsngal lo//byol song gi skye gnas ni 'di ltar sdug bsngal lo//gshin rje'i
86a1('bum): 'jig rten ni 'di ltar sdug bsngal lo//yi dgas kyi yul ni 'di ltar sdug bsngal lo//khyod kyis sdug bsngal 'di nyid du mthar phyin par gyis shig/gang
86a2('bum): la sdug bsngal stong phrag mang po nyams su myong bar 'gyur bas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis khyod la ci zhig bya/khyod yun ring por 'khor ba na
86a3('bum): 'khor bar gyur ta re zhes zer na/rab 'byor de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /lung 'bog pa dang /khwa ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/
86a4('bum): rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba
86a5('bum): dang /klog pa dang /lung 'brog pa dang /kha ton byed pa dang /'chang ba dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i tshe/la la zhig der 'ongs te/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi
86a6('bum): lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod cing /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/mtshe ma'i lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi legs pa
86a7('bum): brjod/'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod//tshangs
86b1('bum): lha nye phan gyi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/tshangs chen gyi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/snang ba'i lha rnams kyi legs
86b2('bum): pa brjod/chung snang gi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/dge ba'i lha rnams
86b3('bum): kyi legs pa brjod/chung dge'i lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/che ba'i lha rnams
86b4('bum): kyi legs pa brjod/chung che'i lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/tshad med che ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/mi che ba'i lha
86b5('bum): rnams kyi legs pa brjod/mi gdung ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod//
86b6('bum): 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams kyi legs pa
86b7('bum): brjod/cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod cing /'dod pa'i khams
87a1('bum): ni 'dod pa la longs spyod pas 'di ltar bde'o//gzugs kyi khams ni bsam gtan dang snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis 'di ltar badre'o//gzugs med
87a2('bum): pa'i khams ni snyoms par 'jug pa zhi ba rnams kyis 'di ltar bde ste/de dag kyang mi rtag cing sdug bsngal la bdag med pa'o//rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can zad pa'i
87a3('bum): chos can/'jigs pa'i chos can/skye ba'i chos can/'gag pa'i chos can yin gyis/khyod kyis 'di nyid du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyis shig/lan
87a4('bum): cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyis shig/'di nyid du rang byang chub thob par gyis shig/phyin chad 'khor
87a5('bum): ba na ma 'khor bar gyis shig ces zer na/rab 'byor de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /lung 'bog pa dang /kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan
87a6('bum): pa ste/rab 'byor de 'dra byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni gcig pu ste/zla med
87a7('bum): cing bdag gis byed pa yin la chos nyan pa ni 'khor gyi nang na gnas na/rab 'byor de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /lung 'bog pa dang /
87b1('bum): kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni gcig pu
87b2('bum): ste/zla med cing bdag gis byed pa yin la/chos spro ba ni 'khor gyi nang na gnas na/rab 'byor de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dre ba dang /lung 'bog pa dang
87b3('bum): kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni gcig
87b4('bum): pu ste/zla med cing bdag gis byed pa yin la/chos nyan pa ni tshogs yongs su sdud na/rab 'byor de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /lung 'bog pa
87b5('bum): dang /kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan
87b6('bum): pa ni gcig pu ste/zla med cing bdag gis byed pa yin la/chos smra ba ni tshogs yongs su sdud na/rab 'byor de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /
87b7('bum): lung 'bog pa dang /kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//rab 'byor
88a1('bum): gzhan yang chos smra ba ni 'di skad du/su nga'i phyi bzhin 'brang ba de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'drir sbyin no zhes zer la/chos nyan pa ni phyi bzhin mo/
88a2('bum): 'drang na/rab 'byor de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /lung 'bog pa dang /kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/rab 'byor de'ang byang
88a3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni chos smra ba'i phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'dod la chos smra ba ni
88a4('bum): drung du 'gro ba'i skabs mi 'byed na/rab 'byor de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /lung 'bog pa dang /kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/
88a5('bum): rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni zang zing cung zad kyi phyir shes rab kyi
88a6('bum): pha rol tu phan pa zab mo 'di 'drir gzhug par 'dod/klog tu gzhug par 'dod/lung dbog par 'dod/kha ton byed du gzhug par 'dod la/chos nyan pa ni zang zing
88a7('bum): cung zad kyi phyir drung du 'gro bar ma mos na/rab 'byor de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /lung 'bog pa dang /kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa
88b1('bum): ste/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni zang zong cung zad kyi phyir/shes rab
88b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bri bar 'dod/klog par 'dod/lung dbog par 'dod/kha ton bya bar 'dod/bsgom par 'dod/nyan par 'dod la chos sla ba ni zar zing cung zad kyi phyir/
88b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin par mi 'dod/'drir gzhug par mi 'dod/klog tu gzhug par mi 'dod/lung 'bog par mi 'dod/kha ton byed du gzhug par mi 'dod//
88b4('bum): sgom du gzhug par mi 'dod/nyan du gzhug par mi 'dod na/rab 'byor de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /lung 'bog pa dang /kha ton byed pa'i
88b5('bum): rgyu rkyen ma ldan pa ste/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni gang du srog gi
88b6('bum): bar chad du 'gyur ba'i phyogs der 'gro bar 'dod la/chos nyan pa ni der 'gro bar mi 'dod na/rab 'byor de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /lung
88b7('bum): 'bog pa dang /kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan
89a1('bum): yang chos nyan pa ni gang du srog gi bar chad du 'gyur ba'i phyogs drir 'gro bar 'dod la/chos smra ba ni der 'gro bar mi 'dod na/rab 'byor de'ang shes rab
89a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /lung 'bog pa dang /kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
89a3('bum): bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni gang na zas dkon pa dang /gang na chu dkon pa'i phyogs der 'gro bar 'dod la/chos nyan pa ni der
89a4('bum): 'gro bar mi 'dod na/rab 'byor de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /lung 'bog pa dang /kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/rab 'byor de'ang
89a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni gang na zas dkon pa dang /chu dkon pa'i phyogs der
89a6('bum): 'gro bar 'dod la/chos smra ba ni der 'gro bar mi 'dod na/rab 'byor de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /lung 'bog pa dang /kha ton byed pa'i
89a7('bum): rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni gang na zas
89b1('bum): mod pa dang /chu mod pa'i phyogs der 'gro bar 'dod la/chos nyan pa'ang rjes su 'byung na/des de la 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod zang zing gi don du song ste ci rung /legs par
89b2('bum): bsam pa sems par gyis shig/zas thob ma thob dang bsod mi bsod kyis 'gyod par gyur ta re zhes zer na/de'i phyir chos ston pa des kyang /thabs phra mos chos la spang
89b3('bum): ba byas par 'gyur te/de'ang mi dga' zhing 'di snyam du 'du shes te/'di ni sbyin par 'dod pa'i mtshan ma ma yin gyi/spong ba'i mtshan ma yin no snyam na/rab 'byor
89b4('bum): de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /lung 'bog pa dang /kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems
89b5('bum): dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang dge slong chos smra ba ni gang na rkun po'i 'jigs pa dang /chom po'i 'jigs pa dang /rngon pa'i
89b6('bum): 'jigs pa dang /gcan gzan khro bo'i 'jigs pa dang /sbrul gyi 'jigs pa dang /'brog dgoni pa'i 'jigs pa yod pa der 'gro bar 'dod la/chos nyan pa dag kyang
89b7('bum): chos kyi don du chos kyis skom zhing rjes su 'brang na/dge slong chos smra bas chos nyan pa de dag la 'di skad smras te/rigs kyi bu dag khyod gang na rkun po'i 'jigs pa
90a1('bum): dang /chom po'i 'jigs pa dang /rngon pa'i 'jigs pa dang /gcan gzan khro bo'i 'jigs pa dang /sbrul gyi 'jigs pa dang /'brog dgon pa'i
90a2('bum): 'jigs pa yod pa der dong ste/ci rung zhes de ltar dge slong chos smra ba des chos mi bskrun pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'drir gzhug par mi 'dod/klog
90a3('bum): tu gzhug par mi 'dod/lung 'bog par mi 'dod/kha ton byeng du gzhug par mi 'dod/nyan du gzhug par mi 'dod par gyur la/de dag gis dge slong chos smra
90a4('bum): ba'i tshig de dag thos nas/mi dga' zhing mi dga' ba'i tshul can du gyur te/dge slong chos smra ba gang na ba der 'gro bar mi 'dod na/rab 'byor de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol
90a5('bum): tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /lung 'bog pa dang /kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi
90a6('bum): las su rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang dge sbyong chos smra ba ni bsod snyoms gtong ba'i grong khyer gtso bor byed par gyur te/de bsod snyoms gtong bya'i
90a7('bum): grong khyer gtso bor gyur pas bsod snyoms gtong ba'i grong khyer de dag yang dang yang blta bar sems shing /der yang dang yang blta bas chos nyan pa phyir bzlog
90b1('bum): cing /tshe dang ldan pa dag ngas ni bsod snyoms gtong ba'i grong ba lta dgos te/bsod snyoms gtong ba'i grong du 'gro dgos so zhes zer nas/des chos nyan pa de dag phyir bzlog
90b2('bum): pa'i phyir 'dod na/rab 'byor de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /lung 'bog pa dang /kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub
90b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dge slong gi cha byad du byas shing /ci nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol
90b4('bum): tu phyin pa zab mo 'di su'ang 'dri bar mi 'gyur ba dang /lung 'bog par mi 'gyur ba dang /kha ton byed par mi 'gyur ba dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed par mi 'gyur ba de lta
90b5('bum): de ltar thabs sbyor ro//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du bdud
90b6('bum): sdig to can dag dge slong gi cha byad du bgyis shing /ci nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di su'ang 'dri bar mi 'gyur ba dang /lung 'bog par mi 'gyur ba dang /
90b7('bum): kha ton byed par mi 'gyur ba dang /tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid par mi 'gyur ba de lta do ltar thabs sbyor ba lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di la
91a1('bum): bdud sdig to can dag dge slong gi cha byad du byas shing /'di skad du nged kyis ji ltar khong du chud pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yin te/ji skad
91a2('bum): du khyed klog pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no zhes dbyen byed cing bzlog la mos pa med par byed do//rab 'byor de la bdud sdig to can gyis de ltar dbyen byas
91a3('bum): pa'i tshe/byang chub sems dpa' gang lung ma bstan pa de dag ni the tshom skye bar 'gyur te/de dag the tshom du gyur nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di mi 'dri
91a4('bum): bar 'gyur/mi klog par 'gyur/lung mi 'bog par 'gyur/kha ton mi byed par 'gyur/mi sgom par 'gyur/tshul bzhin du yid la byed par mi 'gyur te/
91a5('bum): rab 'byor de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /lung 'bog pa dang /kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems
91a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi los su rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to tsan dag dge slong gi cha byad du byas nas/byang chub sems dpa'
91a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs shing 'di skad du/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa de ni yang
91b1('bum): dag pa'i mtha' mngon du byed par 'gyur te/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob par 'gyur ro//de ni lhan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra/
91b2('bum): bcom pa'i 'bras bu 'thob par 'gyur ro//de ni rang byang chub 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes zer na/des tshig de thos nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod na/rab 'byor
91b3('bum): de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /lung 'bog pa dang /kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
91b4('bum): chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ston pa'i tshe/bar chad du 'gyur ba'i bdud kyi las mang du 'byung
91b5('bum): ste/bdud kyi las de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//rig par byas nas rnam par spang bar bya'o//de skad ces bka'
91b6('bum): stsal pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdud kyi las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
91b7('bum): chen pos rig par bgyi ste/spang bar bgyi ba de dag gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan
92a1('bum): ni bdud kyi las/rab 'byor bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ni bdud kyi las/rab 'byor brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs
92a2('bum): brnyan ni bdud kyi las/rab 'byor bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ni bdud kyi las/rab 'byor tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ni
92a3('bum): bdud kyi las/rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ni bdud kyi las te/de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rig par bya ste/rnam
92a4('bum): par spang bar bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang nyan thos kyi theg pa dang ldan pa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems
92a5('bum): dpa' chen pos rig par bya ste/rnam par spang bar bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong
92a6('bum): pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
92a7('bum): dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong
92b1('bum): pa nyid dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa
92b2('bum): bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan
92b3('bum): lag brgyad pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa
92b4('bum): gang gis/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob par 'gyur ba dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang byang
92b5('bum): chub 'thob par 'gyur ba de dag kyang bdud sdig to can dag dge slong gi cha byad du byas shing /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la nye bar bsnyen te/de'ang de la dga'
92b6('bum): ba skyed na/rab 'byor de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /lung 'bog pa dang /kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems
92b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du lus gser gyi kha dog dang /mi chen po'i mtshan
93a1('bum): sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /'od 'dom gang ba dang ldan par byas shing /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs te/de la byang chub sems dpa'
93a2('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i mos pa skyed do//des mos pa bskyed nas/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las yongs su nyams par 'gyur te/rab 'byor de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
93a3('bum): phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /lung 'bog pa dang /kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig
93a4('bum): par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i mdun du sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun nye bar ston te/des de
93a5('bum): la 'dod pa bskyed cing /bdag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'di lta bur shog cig/ji ltar
93a6('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa 'dis tshegs yongs su bsdus pa de bzhin du bdag gis kyang tshogs yongs su bsdu bar bya'o//de bzhin gshegs pa 'dis chos ji ltar ston pa
93a7('bum): de bzhin du bdag gis kyang chos bstan par bya'o zhes de de la 'dod pa bskyed pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su nyams par 'gyur te/rab 'byor de'ang shes
93b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /lung 'bog pa dang /kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las
93b2('bum): su rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag byang chub sems dpa' brgya phrag du ma/byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag du ma/byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong phrag
93b3('bum): du ma/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
93b4('bum): la spyod pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de lta bu dag nye bar ston te/de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de
93b5('bum): dag la 'dod pa skyed par 'gyur ro//des de dag la 'dod pa bskyed nas/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las yongs su nyams par 'gyur te/rab 'byor de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol
93b6('bum): tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /klog pa dang /lung 'bog pa dang /kha ton byed pa dang /bsgom pa dang tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/rab 'byor de'ang byang
93b7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la gzugs med do//tshor ba
94a1('bum): med do//'du shes med do//'du byed med do//rnam par shes pa med do//mig med do//rna ba med do//sna med do//lce med do//lus med do//yid med
94a2('bum): do//gzugs med do//sgra med do//dri med do//r-i med do//reg med do//chos med do//mig gi rnam par shes pa med do//rna ba'i rnam par shes pa med do//sna'i rnam
94a3('bum): par shes pa med do//lce'i rnam par shes pa med do//lus kyi rnam par shes pa med do//yid kyi rnam par shes pa med do//mig gi 'dus te reg pa med do//rna ba'i
94a4('bum): 'dus te reg pa med do//sna'i 'dus te reg pa med do//lce'i 'dus te reg pa med do//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa med do//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa med do//mig gi 'dus te
94a5('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med do//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med do//sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med do//lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
94a6('bum): med do//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med do//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med do//sa'i khams med do//chu'i khams med do//me'i khams
94a7('bum): med do//rlung gi khams med do//nam mkha'i khams med do//rnam par shes pa'i khams med do//ma rig pa med do//'du byed med do//rnam par shes pa med do//
94b1('bum): ming dang gzugs med do//skye mched drug med do//reg pa med do//tshor ba med do//sred pa med do//len pa med do//srid pa med do//skye ba med do//rga shi med do//sbyin pa'i pha
94b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa med do//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med do//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
94b3('bum): pa med do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//nang stong pa nyid med do//phyi stong pa nyid med do//phyi nang stong pa nyid med do//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid med do//chen po stong
94b4('bum): pa nyid med do//don dam pa stong pa nyid med do//'dus byas stong pa nyid med do//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid med do//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid med do//thog ma dang
94b5('bum): tha ma med pa stong pa nyid med do//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid med do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid med do//chos thams cad stong pa nyid med do//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid med
94b6('bum): do//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid med do//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid med do//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med do//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med do//dran pa nye bar
94b7('bum): bzhag pa rnams med do//yang dag par spong ba rnams med do//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams med do//dbang po rnams med do//stobs rnams med do//byang chub kyi yan
95a1('bum): lag rnams med do//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa med do//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams med do//bsam gtan rnams med do//tshad med pa
95a2('bum): rnams med do//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams med do//rnam par thar pa brgyad med do//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu med do//rnam
95a3('bum): par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa med do//mngon par shes pa rnams med do//ting nge 'dzin rnams med do//gzungs kyi sgo
95a4('bum): rnams med do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu med do//mi 'jigs pa bzhi med do//so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi med do//byams pa chen po med do///
95a5('bum): snying rje chen po med do//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad med do//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu med do//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu med do//phyir
95a6('bum): mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu med do//dgra bcom pa nyid med do//rang byang chub med do//thams cad shes pa nyid med do//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid med do//rnam
95a7('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med do//rab 'byor gang la gzugs med pa de la sangs rgyas med de//byang chub sems dpa' med do//rang sangs rgyas med do//nyan
95b1('bum): thos med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //gang la tshor ba med pa de la sangs rgyas med do//byang chub sems dpa' med do//
95b2('bum): rang sangs rgyas med do//nyan thos med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //gang la 'du shes med pa de la sangs rgyas med do//
95b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' med do//rang sangs rgyas med do//nyan thos med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //gang la 'du
95b4('bum): byed med pa de la sangs rgyas med do//byang chub sems dpa' med do//rang sangs rgyas med do//nyan thos med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin
95b5('bum): gyis stong ngo //gang la rnam par shes pa med pa de la sangs rgyas med do//byang chub sems dpa' med do//rang sangs rgyas med do//nyan thos med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab
95b6('bum): 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //gang la mig med pa de la sangs rgyas med do//byang chub sems dpa' med do//rang sangs rgyas med do//nyan thos med do//
95b7('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //gang la rna ba med pa de la sangs rgyas med do//byang chub sems dpa' med do//rang sangs rgyas
96a1('bum): med do//nyan thos med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //gang la sna med pa de la sangs rgyas med do//byang chub
96a2('bum): sems dpa' med do//rang sangs rgyas med do//nyan thos med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //gang la lce med pa de la sangs
96a3('bum): rgyas med do//byang chub sems dpa' med do//rang sangs rgyas med do//nyon thos med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //gang
96a4('bum): la lus med pa de la sangs rgyas med do//byang chub sems dpa' med do//rang sangs rgyas med do//nyan thos med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor chos thams
96a5('bum): cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //gang la yod med pa de la sangs rgyas med do//byang chub sems dpa' med do//rang sangs rgyas med do//nyan thos med do//de ci'i
96a6('bum): phyir zhe na/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis sbyong ngo //gang la gzugs med pa de la sangs rgyas med do//byang chub sems dpa' med do//rang sangs
96a7('bum): rgyas med do//nyan thos med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //gang la sgra med pa de la sangs rgyas med do//byang chub
96b1('bum): sems dpa' med do//rang sangs rgyas med do//nyan thos med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //gang la dri med pa de la sangs rgyas
96b2('bum): med do//byang chub sems dpa' med do//rang sangs rgyas med do//nyan thos med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //gang la ro
96b3('bum): med pa de la sangs rgyas med do//byang chub sems dpa' med do//rang sangs rgyas med do//nyan thos med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin
96b4('bum): gyis stong ngo //gang la reg med pa de la sangs rgyas med do//byang chub sems dpa' med do//rang sangs rgyas med do//nyan thos med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor chos
96b5('bum): thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //glang la chos med pa de la sangs rgyas med do//byang chub sems dpa' med do//rang sangs rgyas med do//nyan thos med do//de ci'i
96b6('bum): phyir zhe na/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //gang la mig gi rnam par shes pa med pa de la sangs rgyas med do//byang chub sems dpa' med do//rang
96b7('bum): sangs rgyas med do//nyan thos med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //gang la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa med pa de la sangs rgyas
97a1('bum): med do//byang chub sems dpa' med do//rang sangs rgyas med do//nyan thos med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
97a2('bum): gang la sna'i rnam par shes pa med pa de la sangs rgyas med do//byang chub sems dpa' med do//rang sangs rgyas med do//nyan thos med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor
97a3('bum): chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis skyong ngo //gang la lce'i rnam pararo shes pa med pa de la sangs rgyas med do//byang chub sems dpa' med do//rang sangs rgyas med do//nya
97a4('bum): ngochos med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //gang la lus kyi rnam par shes pa med pa de la sangs rgyas med do//byang chub sems dpa' med
97a5('bum): do//rang sangs rgyas med do//nyan thos med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //gang la yid kyi rnam par shes pa med pa de la sangs
