97a6('bum): rgyas med do//byang chub sems dpa' med do//rang sangs rgyas med do//nyan thos med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //gang
97a7('bum): la mig gi 'dus te reg pa med pa de la sangs rgyas med do//byang chub sems dpa' med do//rang sangs rgyas med do//nyan thos med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor chos
97b1('bum): thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //gang la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa med pa de la sangs rgyas med do//byang chub sems dpa' med do//rang sangs rgyas med do//nyan thos med do//
97b2('bum): da 'i he re ne na/rab 'bor chos tha na/sacad na rang bzhin gyis spong ngo//gang la swa'i 'angs te reg pa med pa de la sangs rgas/med do//bang chub sems dpa' ma/da do//rang sangs
97b3('bum): sa redra do//nyan thos med do//de chu'i phar zhe na/rab 'bor chos thams cad ni rang bzhini gyes spong ngo//gang la lnga'i 'das te reg pa med pa de la sangs rgyas med do//byang drub
97b4('bum): sems dpa' med do//rang sangs rgyas med do//nyan thos med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //gang la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa med
97b5('bum): pa de la sangs rgyas med do//byang chub sems dpa' med do//rang sangs rgyas med do//nyan thos med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor chos thams cad na reng bzhin gyis spong ngo //
97b6('bum): gang la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa med pa de la sangs rgyas med do//byang chub sems dpa' med do//rang sangs rgyas med do//nyan thos med do//de ci'i phyiraro zhe na/rab 'byor chos
97b7('bum): thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //gang la mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa de la sangs rgyas med do//byang chub sems dpa' med do//rang sangs
98a1('bum): rgyas med do//nyan thos med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis skyong ngo //gang la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med
98a2('bum): pa de la sangs rgyas med do//byang chub sems dpa' med do//rang sangs rgyas med do//nyan thos med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis
98a3('bum): skyong ngo //gang la sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa de la sangs rgyas med do//byang chub sems dpa' med do//rang sangs rgyas med do//nyan thos med do//de ci'i
98a4('bum): phyir zhe na/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis sbyong ngo //gang la lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa de la sangs rgyas med do//byang chub sems dpa'
98a5('bum): myod ngo do//rang sangs rgyas med do//nyan thos med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //gang la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
98a6('bum): gyis tshor ba med pa de la sangs rgyas med do//byang chub sems dpa' med do//rang sangs rgyas med do//nyan thos med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor chos thams
98a7('bum): cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //gang la yod kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa de la sangs rgyas med do//byang chub sems dpa' med do//rang sangs rgyas
98b1('bum): med do//nyan thos med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //gang la sa'i khams med pa de la sangs rgyas med do//byang chub sems dpa'
98b2('bum): med do//rang sangs rgyas med do//nyan thos med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //gang la chu'i khams med pa de la sangs rgyas med
98b3('bum): do//byang chub sems dpa' med do//rang sangs rgyas med do//nyan thos med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //gang la me'i khams
98b4('bum): med pa de la sangs rgyas med do//byang chub sems dpa' med do//rang sangs rgyas med do//nyan thos med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong
98b5('bum): ngo //gang la rlung gi khams med pa de la sangs rgyas med do//byang chub sems dpa' med do//rang sangs rgyas med do//nyan thos med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor chos thams
98b6('bum): cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //gang lnga nam mkha'i khams med pa de la sangs rgyas med do//byang chub sems dpa' med do//rang sangs rgyas med do//nyan thos med do//de ci'i
98b7('bum): phyir zhe na/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //gang la rnam par shes pa'i khams med pa de la sangs rgyas med do//byang chub sems dpa' med do//rang sangs
99a1('bum): rgyas med do//nyan thos med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //glang la ma rig pa med pa de la sangs rgyas med do//byang
99a2('bum): chub sems dpa' med do//rang sangs rgyas med do//nyan thos med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //gang la 'du byed med pa de
99a3('bum): la sangs rgyas med do//byang chub sems dpa' med do//rang sangs rgyas med do//nyan thos med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo ///
99a4('bum): gang la rnam par shes pa med pa de la sangs rgyas med do//byang chub sems dpa' med do//rang sangs rgyas med do//nyan thos med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor chos
99a5('bum): thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //gang la ming dang gzugs med pa de la sangs rgyas med do//byang chub sems dpa' med do//rang sangs rgyas med do//nyan thos med
99a6('bum): do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //gang la skye mched drug med pa de la sangs rgyas med do//byang chub sems dpa' med do//
99a7('bum): rang sangs rgyas med do//nyan thos med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //gang la reg pa med pa de la sangs rgyas med do//

99b4('bum): rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //gang la len pa med pa de la sangs rgyas med do//byang chub sems dpa' med do//rang sangs rgyas med do//nyan thos mong ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/
99b5('bum): rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //gang la srid pa med pa de la sangs rgyas med do//byang chub sems dpa' med do//rang sangs rgyas med do//nyan thos
99b6('bum): med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //gang la skye ba med pa de la sangs rgyas med do//byang chub sems dpa' med do//rang sangs
99b7('bum): rgyas med do//nyan thos med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //gang la rga shi med pa de la sangs rgyas med do//byang chub sems
100a1('bum): dpa' med do//rang sangs rgyas med do//nyan thos med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //gang la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu

104a1('bum): med pa de la sangs rgyas med do//byang chub sems dpa' med do//rang sangs rgyas med do//nyan thos med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor chos thams

104a6('bum): stong ngo //gang la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu med pa de la sangs rgyas med do//byang chub sems dpa' med do//rang sangs rgyas med do//nyan thos med do//de ci'i phyir
104a7('bum): zhe na/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //gang la lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu med pa de la sangs rgyas med do//byang chub sems dpa' med
104b1('bum): do//rang sangs rgyas med do//nyan thos med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //gang la phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu med pa de la sangs
104b2('bum): rgyas med do//byang chub sems dpa' med do//rang sangs rgyas med do//nyan thos med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //gang la
104b3('bum): dgra bcom pa med pa de la sangs rgyas med do//byang chub sems dpa' med do//rang sangs rgyas med do//nyan thos med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni
104b4('bum): rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //gang la rang byang chub med pa de la sangs rgyas med do//byang chub sems dpa' med do//rang sangs rgyas med do//nyan thos med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/
104b5('bum): rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //gang la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub med pa de la sangs rgyas med do//byang chub sems dpa' med do//
104b6('bum): rang sangs rgyas med do//nyan thos med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo ////shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
104b7('bum): stong phrag brgya pa//bam po nyis brgya brgyad pa//rab 'byor gzhon yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bar chad du 'gyur ba mang ste/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu
105a1('bum): mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /klog pa dang /lung 'bog pa dang /kha ton byed pa dang /ston pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la
105a2('bum): byed pa de dag la'ang bar chad du 'gyur ba mang ngo //rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/dzam+bu'i gling 'di rin po che gser dang /nor bu dang /mu tig dang /bai DUr+ya dang /dung
105a3('bum): dang /man shel dang /byu ru dang /dngul dang /sa le sgyum gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag ni bar chad du 'gyur ba mang zhing phyir rgol ba mang ba dag go/rab 'byor de
105a4('bum): bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /klog pa dang /lung 'bog pa dang /kha ton byed pa dang /ston pa dang /
105a5('bum): tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag la'ang bdud kyi las mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ro//bar chad mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ro//phyir rgol ba mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ro///
105a6('bum): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni de bzhin te/bde bar gshegs pa de ni de bzhin te/dzam+bu'i gling 'di rin po che gser dang /nor bu dang /mu tig
105a7('bum): dang /bai DUr+ya dang /dung dang /man shel dang /byu ru dang /dngul dang /sa le sbrum gang ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag ni bar chad du 'gyur ba mang zhing slar rgol
105b1('bum): ba mang ba lags so//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /klog pa dang /lung 'bog pa dang /kha ton
105b2('bum): byed pa dang /ston pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag la'ang bdud kyi las mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ro//bar chad mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ro//slar rgol ba mang po
105b3('bum): 'byung bar 'gyur ro//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das skyes bu glen pa gang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /klog pa
105b4('bum): dang /lung 'bog pa dang /kha ton bgyid pa dang /ston pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa dag gi bar chad bgyid pa ni bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs pa ste/bcom ldan
105b5('bum): 'das skyes bu glen pa de dag ni blo chung zhing blo zhan par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das skyes bu glen pa gang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di
105b6('bum): 'dri ba dang /klog pa dang /lung 'bog pa dang /kha ton bgyid pa dang /ston pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag gi bar chad bgyid pa de dag ni blo rgya shin tu chung//
105b7('bum): bar 'gyur te/sangs rgyas kyi chos rlabs po che dag la de dag gi sems mi 'jug go/de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di mi 'dri mi klog/lung mi 'bog
106a1('bum): kha ton mi bgyid/mi sgom/tshul bzhin du yid la mi bgyid de/gzhan 'dri zhing klog pa dang /kha ton bgyid pa dang /ston pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la/
106a2('bum): bgyid pa dag la'ang bar chad bgyid par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo
106a3('bum): gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di mi 'dri mi klog/lung mi 'bog/kha ton mi byed/mi sgom/tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing /gzhan 'dri ba dang /
106a4('bum): klog pa dang /lung 'bog pa dang /kha ton byed pa dang /ston pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dag gi bar chad byed pa de dag ni bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs pa ste/
106a5('bum): theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa dge ba'i rtsa ba mo bskyed pa/dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu chung ba/sngon gyi rgyal ba la dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bsgrubs pa/dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis
106a6('bum): yongs su ma zin pa sha skrag 'byung ste/rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni blo chung zhing blo zhan par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha
106a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa zang mo 'di mi 'dri/mi klog/lung mi 'bog/kha ton mi byed/me sgom/tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing /gzhan 'dri ba dang /klog pa dang /
106b1('bum): lung 'dog pa dang /kha ton byed pa dang /ston pa dang /tshul bzhin du yod la byed pa dgu go byar chung byed pa dag ni tho rgyu shin tu chung bar 'gyur to//sangs rgyas kyi chos rlabs po che
106b2('bum): dag la de dag gi sems mi 'jug go/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /klog pa dang /lung 'bog pa dang /kha ton byed pa dang /ston pa dang /
106b3('bum): tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dag la bdud kyi las 'di dag kyang 'byung mod kyi 'on kyang /rab 'byor rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di
106b4('bum): 'dra zhing klog pa dang /lung 'bog cing kha ton byed pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing /gong du bsum gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /brtson
106b5('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su
106b6('bum): rdzogs par byed pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /gang du nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /phyi skyong po nyid yongs su
106b7('bum): rdzogs par byed pa dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /chen po stong pa nyid yongs su
107a1('bum): rdzogs par byed pa dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /'dus ma
107a2('bum): byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs
107a3('bum): par byed pa dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs
107a4('bum): su rdzogs par byed pa dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /dngos po med
107a5('bum): pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed
107a6('bum): pa dang /gong du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
107a7('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /dbang po rnams yongs su rdzogs por byed pa dang /stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs
107b1('bum): su rdzogs par byed pa dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /gong du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /
107b2('bum): bsam gtan rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /tshad med pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs
107b3('bum): par byed pa dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /rnam par
107b4('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /ting nge
107b5('bum): 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa
107b6('bum): dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par
107b7('bum): byed pa dang /snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su
108a1('bum): rdzogs par byed pa dang /las kyirnam pa shes d+ha ny-id snangs su rmugs pa byud cing //rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid yongs sgyu rmugs par byed na//
108a2('bum): 'byor de ni sangs rgyas kyi mthu yin par shes par bya ste/des rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri'o//klog go//lung 'brog
108a3('bum): go//kha tan byed do//tshul bzhin du yid la byed do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do//gong du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
108a4('bum): pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//tshul khrims
108a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//gong du nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do//phyi stong
108a6('bum): panyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do//phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do//chen po stong pa nyid yongs su
108a7('bum): rdzogs par byed de//don dmo pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do//'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs
108b1('bum): par byed do//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs
108b2('bum): su rdzogs par byed do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do//chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs
108b3('bum): su rdzogs par byed do//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs
108b4('bum): par byed do//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do//gong du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yongs su rdzogaso par byed do//yang dag par spong ba rnams
108b5('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do//dbang po rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do//stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par
108b6('bum): byed do//byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//gong du 'phags pa'i bden pa
108b7('bum): rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do//bsam gtan rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do//tshad med pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
109a1('bum): 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do//rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu
109a2('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//mngon par shes pa rnams
109a3('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do//ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do//gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
109a4('bum): rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do//mi 'jigs pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do//so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do//byams pa
109a5('bum): chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do//snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do//thams
109a6('bum): cad shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par
109a7('bum): byed do//shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong po de dag kyang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes
109b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri ba dang /klog pa dang /lung 'brog pa dang /kha ton bya ba dang /ston pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba'i phyir dgongs pa mdzad do//lho phyogs
109b2('bum): kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag kyang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri ba dang //
109b3('bum): klog pa dang /lung 'bog pa dang /kha ton bya ba dang /ston pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba'i phyir dgongs pa mdzad do//nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ci
109b4('bum): snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag kyang /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri ba dang /klog pa dang /lung 'bog pa dang /kha ton
109b5('bum): bya ba dang /ston pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba'i phyir dgongs pa mdzad do//byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de
109b6('bum): ngag kyang /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri ba dang /klog pa dang /lung 'bog pa dang /kha ton bya ba dang /ston pa dang /tshul
109b7('bum): bzhin du yid la bya ba'i phyir dgongs pa mdzad do//byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag kyang /rigs//
110a1('bum): kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri ba dang /klog pa dang /lung 'bog pa dang /kha ton bya ba dang /ston pa dang /tshul
110a2('bum): bzhin du yid la bya ba'i phyir dgongs pa mdzad do//shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji skad cig bzhugs shing 'tshe skyong ba de dag kyang /
110a3('bum): rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri ba dang /klog pa dang /lung 'bog pa dang /kha ton bya ba dang /ston pa dang /tshul
110a4('bum): bzhin du yid la bya ba'i phyir dgongs pa mdzad do//lho nub kyi phyogs mtshoms kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tshe skyong ba de dag kyang //
110a5('bum): rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri ba dang /klog pa dang /lung 'bog pa dang /kha ton bya ba dang /ston pa dang /tshul
110a6('bum): bzhin du yid la bya ba'i phyir dgongs pa mdzad do//nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag kyang
110a7('bum): rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri ba dang /klog pa dang /lung 'bog pa dang /kha ton bya ba dang /ston pa dang /tshul
110b1('bum): bzhin du yid la bya ba'i phyir dgongs pa mdzad do//'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag kyang /rigs kyi bu dang rigs
110b2('bum): kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri ba dang /klog pa dang /lung 'bog pa dang /kha ton bya ba dang /ston pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba'i phyir
110b3('bum): dgongs pa mdzad do//steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag kyang /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gos
110b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri ba dang /klog pa dang /lung 'jog pa dang /kha ton bya ba dang /smyon pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba'i phyir dgongs pa mdzad de//
110b5('bum): shar phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri zhing
110b6('bum): klog po dang /lung 'bog pa dang /kha ton byed pa dang /ston pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag gi don du brtson par byed cing yongs su 'dzin par byed do//lho
110b7('bum): phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang /rigs kyi bu dpe rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri zhing /
111a1('bum): klog pa dang /lung 'bog pa dang /kha ton byed pa dang /ston pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag gi don du brtson par byed cing yongs su 'dzin par byed
111a2('bum): do//nub phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri
111a3('bum): zhing /klog pa dang /lung 'bog pa dang /kha ton byed pa dang /ston pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag gi don du brtson par byed cing yongs su 'dzin par byed do//byang
111a4('bum): phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri zhing /
111a5('bum): klog pa dang /lung 'bog pa dang /kha ton byed pa dang /ston pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag gi don du brtson par byed cing yongs su 'dzin par byed do//byang
111a6('bum): shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu
111a7('bum): phyin pa 'di 'dri zhing klog pa dang lung 'bog pa dang /kha ton byed pa dang /ston pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag gi don du brtson par byed cing yongs su 'dzin
111b1('bum): par byed do//shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi
111b2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri zhing klog pa dang /lung 'bog pa dang /kha ton byed pa dang /ston pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag gi don du brtson par byed cing yongs su
111b3('bum): 'dzin par byed do//lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes
111b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dro zhing klog pa dang /lung 'bog pa dang /kha ton byed pa dang /ston pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag gi don du brtson par byed cing
111b5('bum): yongs su 'dzin par byed do//nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa gang ji stong pa de dag kyang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi
111b6('bum): bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po 'di 'dra zhing klog pa dang /lung 'bog pa dang /kha ton byed pa dang /ston pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag gi dron du brtson
111b7('bum): par byed cing yongs su 'dzin par byed do//'og gi phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang rigs kyi bu dang rigs
112a1('bum): kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri zhing klog pa dang /lung 'bog pa dang /kha ton byed pa dang /ston pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de
112a2('bum): ngadag gi don du brtson par byed cing yongs su 'dzin par byed do//steng gi phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang //
112a3('bum): rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri zhing /klog pa dang /lung 'bog pa dang /kha ton byed pa dang /ston pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la
112a4('bum): byed pa de dag gi don du brtson par byed cing yongs su 'dzin par byed do//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/bud med la la zhig la bu lnga 'am/bcu 'am nyi shu 'am/sum
112a5('bum): cu'am/bzhi bcu'am/lnga bcu'am/brgya'am/stong zhig yod na/de dag gi ma de tsa nas kyang mi na bar bya ba'i phyir brtson par byed cing /bdag cag gi ma 'di ji
112a6('bum): ltar na nad med par 'gyur/bdag cag gi mo 'di la ji ltar na bar chad du mi 'gyur/bdag cag gi ma 'di ji ltar na ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur/bdag cag gi ma 'di ring
112a7('bum): du 'tsha bar bya na ji ltar bya/bdag cag gi ma 'di lus la mi bde ba'i nyams med par bya na ji ltar bya/'di ni bdag cag skyed skyed pa ste/srog gi sbyin bdag go zhes
112b1('bum): de dag ma de la rim gro legs par bya bas rim gro byed do//de dag ni 'di'i srog gi bar chad du gyur du 'ong ngo //lus nyams chung bar gyur du 'ong ngo //lus la sha sbrang dang /sbrang bu
112b2('bum): dang /sbrul gyis gtse ba'i mi bde bas bab tu 'ong ngo //tsha ba dang /grang ba dang /bkres pa dang /skom pas mi bde bar 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes phu dung legs par bya bas phu
112b3('bum): dud du byed do//de ltar bu de dag ma de la 'di ni bdag cag skyed skyed pa'o//'di ni 'jig rten 'di ston pa'o zhes bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rgyun du rim gro byed cing /bsti
112b4('bum): stang dang /bkur sti cher byed do//rab 'byor de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
112b5('bum): pa 'di la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par gzigs shing dgongs te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bdag cag gi sangs rgyas kyi
112b6('bum): chos thams cad skyong skyed pa'o//'jig rten 'di ston ston pa'o zhes rgyun du gzigs shing dgongs so//shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag
112b7('bum): na/de bzhin gshegos pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
113a1('bum): 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zang mo 'di la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par gzigs shing dgongs so//lho phyogs kyi 'jig/
113a2('bum): rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /
113a3('bum): chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par gzigs shing dgongs
113a4('bum): so//nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig
113a5('bum): bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dri la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag
113a6('bum): tu rgyun mi 'chad par gzigs shing dgongs so//byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
113a7('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /chos ston po'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
113b1('bum): byin pa zab mo 'di la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par gzigs shing dgongs so//byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed
113b2('bum): dog na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang drug par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
113b3('bum): de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par gzigs shing dgongs so//shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig
113b4('bum): rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa ying dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /chos
113b5('bum): ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dri la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par gzigs shing dgongs so//lho
113b6('bum): nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig
113b7('bum): bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyun mi
114a1('bum): 'chad par gzigs shing dgongs so//nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
114a2('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha
114a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa rngub mo 'di la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyu ni mi 'chad par gzigs shing dgongs so//'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma
114a4('bum): snyed dag na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tshe skyong ba dang /chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas
114a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyan mo 'chad par gzigs shing dgongs so//steng gi phyogs
114a6('bum): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag ni/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa ri rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tshe
114a7('bum): skyong ba dang /chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par
114b1('bum): gzigs shing dgongs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams skyed skyed pa'o//rnam pa thams cad
114b2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes 'di'ang ston ston pa'o//de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
114b3('bum): zab mo 'di la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par gzigs shing dgongs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
114b4('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//di las byung ba ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//'di las byung ba ni bzod pa'i pha
114b5('bum): rol tu phyin pa'o//'di las byung ba ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//'di las byung ba ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//'di las byung ba ni nang stong pa nyid do//'di
114b6('bum): las byung ba ni phyi stong pa nyid do//'di las byung ba ni phyi nang stong pa nyid do//'di las byung ba ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do//'di las byung ba ni chen po stong pa nyid do//'di las
114b7('bum): byung ba ni don dam pa stong pa nyid do//'di las byung ba ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid do//'di las byung ba ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do//'di las byung ba ni mtha' las 'das
115a1('bum): pa stong pa nyid do//'di las byung ba ni zlog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do//'di las byung ba ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do//'di las byung ba ni rang bzhin stong/
115a2('bum): pa nyid do//'di las byung ba ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid do//'di las byung ba ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do//'di las byung ba ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid do//'di las
115a3('bum): byung ba ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do//'di las byung ba ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do//'di las byung ba ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do//'di las byung ba ni dran pa
115a4('bum): nye bar bzhag pa rnams so//'di las byung ba ni yang dag par spong ba rnams so//'di las byung ba ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so//'di las byung ba ni dbang po rnams so///
115a5('bum): 'di las byung ba ni stobs rnams so//'di las byung ba ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so//'di las byung ba ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o//'di las byung ba ni
115a6('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so//'di las byung ba ni bsam gtan rnams so//'di las byung ba ni ched med pa rnams so//'di las byung ba ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms
115a7('bum): par 'jug pa rnams so//'di las byung ba ni rnam par thar pa brgyad do//'di las byung ba ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'o//'di las byung ba ni rnam
115b1('bum): par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'o//'di las byung ba ni mngon par shes pa rnams so//'di las byung ba ni ting nge 'dzin rnams so//'di las
115b2('bum): byung ba ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams so//'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so//'di las byung ba ni mi 'jigs pa rnams so//'di las byung ba ni so so yang dag
115b3('bum): par rig pa rnams so//'di las byung ba ni byams pa chen po'o//'di las byung ba ni snying rje chen po'o//'di las byung ba ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so//'di
115b4('bum): las byung ba ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o//'di las byung ba ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o//'di las byung ba ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o//'di las byung ba ni
115b5('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid do//'di las byung ba ni rang byang chub bo//'di las byung ba ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid do//'di las byung ba ni bla na med pa yang dag par
115b6('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo//'di las byung ba ni rgyun du zhugs pa rnams so//'di las byung ba ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams so//'di las byung ba ni phyir mi 'ong ba rnams
115b7('bum): so//'di las byung ba ni dgra bcom pa rnams so//'di las byung ba ni rang sangs rgyas rnams so//'di las byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams so//'di las
116a1('bum): byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
116a2('bum): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la brten te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
116a3('bum): par sangs rgyas so//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu
116a4('bum): 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri zhing klog pa dang /lhung 'bog po dang /kha ton byed pa dang /bsgom pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de
116a5('bum): dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis srungs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par gzigs shing
116a6('bum): dgongs so//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
116a7('bum): sangs rgyas rnams ci nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur bar rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par srung ba mdzad do//
116b1('bum): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das kyis gang 'di skad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
116b2('bum): bskyed pa'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'jig rten ston pa'o zhes bka' stsal pa/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na shos rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas de bzhin gshegs pa
116b3('bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams bskyed pa lags/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas 'jig rten ston pa lags/bcom
116b4('bum): ldan 'das ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas de bzhin go shegs pa bskrun pa lags/'jig rten ni de bzhin gshegs pas gang la gsungs/bcom ldan/
116b5('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bskyed do//mi 'jigs pa bzhi bskyed do//so so yang dag
116b6('bum): par rig pa bzhi bskyed ngo //byams pa chen po bskyed do//snying rje chen po bskyed do//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bskyed do//thams cad shes pa nyid bskyed do///
116b7('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bskyed do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bskyod do//rab 'byor chos de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs par brjod de/rab 'byor de bas
117a1('bum): na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa bskyed do//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i 'jig/
117a2('bum): rten gang lags//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor phung po lnga ni de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten du gsungs so//gsol pa/bcom ldan
117a3('bum): 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mos phung po lnga ni ji ltar bstan pa lags/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ji ltar phung po lnga ston pa
117a4('bum): lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni phung po lnga po 'dri dag 'jig par ston pa ma yin/rab tu 'jig par ston pa ma yin
117a5('bum): te/skye zhes bya bar mi ston to//'gag ces bya bar mi ston to//kun nas nyon mongs zhes bya bar mi ston to//rnam par byang zhes bya bar mi ston to//'phel zhes bya
117a6('bum): bar mi ston to//'grib ces bya bar mi ston to//byung zhes bya bar mi ston to//dor zhes bya bar mi ston to//'das zhes bya bar mi ston to//ma 'ongs zhes bya bar mi
117a7('bum): ston to//da ltar byung zhes bya bar mi ston to//de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la 'jig pa med do//rab tu 'jig pa med do//mtshan ma med pa la 'jig pa med do//rab tu
117b1('bum): 'jig pa med do//smon pa med pa la 'jig pa med do//rab tu 'jig pa med do//mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la 'jig pa 'am rab tu 'jig pa med do//skye ba med pa la 'jig
117b2('bum): pa'am rab tu 'jig pa med do//dngos po med pa la 'jig pa 'am rab tu 'jig pa med do//rang bzhin med pa la 'jig pa 'am rab tu 'jig pa med do//rab 'byor de ltar
117b3('bum): de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten ston par gsungs te/rab 'byor sems can tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa'i sems dang spyod pa
117b4('bum): mkhyen pa de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid la brten cing rab tu mkhyen te/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la ni sems can med do//sems
117b5('bum): can du gdags pa mi dmigs so//gzugs med do//gzugs su gdagos pa mi dmigs so//tshor ba med do//tshor bar gdugs pa mi dmigs so//'du shes med
117b6('bum): do//'du shes su gdags pa mi dmigs so//'du byed med do//'du byed du gdags pa mi dmigs so//rnam par shes pa med do//rnam par shes par gdags pa mi
117b7('bum): dmigs so//mig med do//mig tu gdags pa mi dmigs so//rna ba med do//rna bar gdags pa mi dmigs so//sna med do//snar gdags pa mi dmigs so/lce
118a1('bum): med do//lcer gdagus pa mi dmigs so//lus med do//lus su gdags pa mi dmigs so//yid med do//yid du gdags pa mi dmigs so//gzugs
118a2('bum): med do//gzugs su gdags pa mi dmigs so//sgra med do//sgrar gdags pa mi dmigs so//dri med do//dIr gdags pa mi dmigs so//ro med do//ror gdags
118a3('bum): pa mi dmigs so//reg med do//reg tu gdags pa mi dmigs so//chos med do//chos su gdags pa mi dmigs so//mig gi rnam par shes pa med do//mig
118a4('bum): gi rnam par shes par gdags pa mi dmigs s+ho//rna ba'i rnam par shes pa med do//rna ba'i rnam par shes par gdags pa mi dmigs so//sna'i rnam par shes pa med
118a5('bum): //sna'i rnam par shes par gdugs pa mi dmigs so//lce'i rnam par shes pa med do//lce'i rnam par shes par gdags pa mi dmigs so//lus kyi rnam par shes
118a6('bum): pa med do//lus kyi rnam par shes par gdugs pa mi dmigs so//yid kyi rnam par shes pa med do//yid kyi rnam par shes par gdags pa mi dmigs so//mig
118a7('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa med do//mig gi 'dus te reg par gdags pa mi dmigs so//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa med do//rna ba'i 'dus te reg par gdags pa mi dmigs so//
118b1('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa med do//sna'i 'dus te reg par gdags pa mi dmigs so//lce'i 'dus te reg pa med do//lce'i 'dus te reg par gdags pa mi dmigs so//lus kyi
118b2('bum): 'dus te reg pa med do//lus kyi 'dus te reg par gdags pa mi dmigs so//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa med do//yid kyi 'dus te reg par gdags pa mi dmigs so//mig
118b3('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med do//mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar gdugs pa mi dmigs so//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med do//
118b4('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar gdags pa mi dmigs so//sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med do//sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar gdags
118b5('bum): pa mi dmigs so//lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med do//lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar gdags pa mi dmigs so//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
118b6('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba med do//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar gdags pa mi dmigs so//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med do//yod kyi 'dus te reg
118b7('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar gdags pa mi dmigs so//sa'i khams med do//sa'i khams su gdags pa mi dmigs so//chu'i khams med do//chu'i khams su gdags
119a1('bum): pa mi dmigs so//me'i khams med do//me'i khams su gdwags pa mi dmigs so//rlung gi khams med do//rlung gi khams su gdags pa mi dmigs
119a2('bum): so//nam mkha'i khams med do//nam mkha'i khams su gdags pa mi dmigs so//rnam par shes pa'i khams med do//rnam par shes pa'i khams su gdags pa mi
119a3('bum): dmigs so//ma rig pa med do//ma rig par gdags pa mi dmigs so//'du byed med do//'du byed du gdags pa mi dmigs so//rnam par shes pa med do//rnam
119a4('bum): par shes par gdags pa mi dmigs so//ming dang gzugs med do//ming dang gzugs su gdags pa mi dmigs so//skye mched drug med do//skye mched drug tu
119a5('bum): gdags pa mi dmigs so//reg pa med do//reg par gdags pa mi dmigs so//tshor ba med do//tshor bar gdags pa mi dmigs so//sred po med do//sred
119a6('bum): par gdags pa mi dmigs so//len pa med do//len par gdags pa mi dmyigs so//srid pa med do//srid par gdags pa mi dmigs so//skye ba med do//skye bar
119a7('bum): gdags pa mi dmigs so//rga shi med do//rga shir gdags pa mi dmigs so//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med do//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par gdags pa mi
119b1('bum): dmigs so//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par gdags pa mi dmyigs so//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med do//bzod pa'i pha
119b2('bum): rol tu phyin par gdags pa mi dmigs so//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa me dro do//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin par gdags pa mi dmigs so//bsam gtan gyi
119b3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa med do//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par gdags pa mi dmigs so//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par gdags
119b4('bum): pa mi dmigs so//nang stong pa nyid med do//nang stong pa nyid du gdags pa mi dmigs so//phyi stong pa nyid med do//phyi stong pa nyid du gdags pa mi dmigs so//phyi nang stong
119b5('bum): pa nyid med do//phyi nang stong pa nyid du gdags pa mi dmigs so//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid med do//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du gdags pa mi dmigs so//chen po stong pa
119b6('bum): nyid med do//chen po stong pa nyid du gdags pa mi dramigs so//don dam pa stong pa nyid med do//don dam pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa mi dmigs so//'dus byas stong
119b7('bum): pa nyid med do//'dus byas stong pa nyid du gdags pa mi dmigs so//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid med do//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du gdags pa mi dmigs so//mtha'
120a1('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid med do//mtha' las 'dras pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa mi dmigs so//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid med do//thog ma dang
120a2('bum): tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa mi dmigs so//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid med do//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa mi dmigs so//rang bzhin stong pa
120a3('bum): nyid med do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid du gdags pa mi dmigs so//chos thams cad stong pa nyid med do//chos thams cad stong pa nyid du gdags pa mi dmigs so//rang
120a4('bum): gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid med do//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du gdags pa mi dmigs so//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid med do//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid du gdags
120a5('bum): pa mi dmigs so//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid med do//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa mi dmigs so//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med do//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du gdags
120a6('bum): pa mi dmigs so//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med do//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du gdags pa mi dmigs so//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams
120a7('bum): med do//dran pa nye bar bzhag par gdags pa ma dmigs so//yang dag par spong ba rnams med do//yang dag par spong bar gdags pa mi dmigs so//rdzu 'phrul
120b1('bum): gyi rkang pa rnams med do//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang par gdags pa mi dmigs so//dbang po rnams med do//dbang por gdags pa mi dmigs so//stobs rnams med do//stobs
120b2('bum): su gdags pa mi dmigs so//byang chub kyi yan lag rnams med do//byang chub kyi yan lag tu gdags pa mi dmigs so//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa med
120b3('bum): de//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par gdags pa mi dmigs so//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams med do//'phags pa'i bden par gdags pa mi dmigs so//
120b4('bum): byasam gtan rnams med do//bsam gtan du gdags bya mi dmigs so//tshad med pa rnams med do//tshad med par gdags pa mi dmigs so//gzugs med pa'i
120b5('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams med do//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug par gdags pa mi dmigs so//rnam par thar pa brgyad med do//rnam par thar pa brgyad du
120b6('bum): gdags pa mi dmigs so//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu med do//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgur gdags pa mi dmigs
120b7('bum): so//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa med do//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med
121a1('bum): par gdags pa mi dmigs so//mngon par shes pa rnams med do//mngon par shes par gdags pa mi dmigs so//ting nge 'dzin rnams med
121a2('bum): do//ting nge 'dzin du gdags pa mi dmigs so//gzungs kyi sgo rnams med do//gzungs kyi sgor gdags pa mi dmigs so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
121a3('bum): rnams med do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs su gdags pa mi dmigs so//mi 'jigs pa rnams med do//mi 'jigs par gdags pa mi dmigs so//so
121a4('bum): so yang dag par rig pa rnams med do//so so yang dag par rig par gdags pa mi dmigs so//byams pa chen po med do//byams pa chen por gdags pa mi
121a5('bum): dmigs so//snying rje chen po med do//snying rje chen por gdags pa mi dmigs so//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams med do//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par
121a6('bum): gdags pa mi dmigs so//thams cad shes pa nyid med do//thams cad shes pa nyid du gdags pa mi dmigs so//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid med do//lam gyi
121a7('bum): rnam pa shes pa nyid du gdags pa mi dmigs so//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gdags pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor
121b1('bum): de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi 'jig rten ston pa yin te/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni gzugs ston
121b2('bum): par byed pa ma yin no//tshor ba ston par byed pa ma yin no//'du shes ston par byed pa ma yin no//'du byed ston par byed pa ma yin no//rnam par shes pa ston par byed
121b3('bum): pa ma yin no//mig ston par byed pa mi yin no//rna ba ston par byed pa ma yin no//sna ston par byed pa mo yin no//lce ston par byed pa ma yin no//lus ston par byed pa
121b4('bum): ma yin no//yid ston par byed pa ma yin no//gzugs ston par byed pa ma yin no//sgra ston par byed pa ma yin no//dri ston par byed pa ma yin no//ro ston par byed pa ma
121b5('bum): yin no//reg ston par byed pa ma yin no//chos ston par byed pa ma yin no//mig gi rnam par shes pa ston par byed pa ma yin no//rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ston par byed
121b6('bum): pa ma yin no//sna'i rnam par shes pa ston par byed pa ma yin no//lce'i rnam par shes pa ston par byed pa ma yin no//lus kyi rnam par shes pa ston par byed pa ma yin no//
121b7('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa ston par byed pa ma yin no//mig gi 'dus te reg pa ston par byed pa ma yin no//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ston par byed pa ma yin no//sna'i 'dus te reg
122a1('bum): pa ston par byed pa ma yin no//lce'i 'dus te reg pa ston par byed pa ma yin no//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ston par byed pa ma yin no//yid kyi 'dus te reg
122a2('bum): pabaston par byed pa ma yin no//mig gi 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ston par byed pa ma yin no//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ston par byed pa ma yin no//
122a3('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ston par byed pa ma yin no//lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ston par byed pa ma yin no//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
122a4('bum): gyis tshor ba ston par byed pa ma yin no//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ston par byed pa ma yin no//sa'i khams ston par byed pa ma yin no//chu'i khams
122a5('bum): ston par byed pa ma yin no//me'i khams ston par byed pa ma yin no//rlung gi khams ston par byed pa ma yin no//nam mkha'i khams ston par byed pa ma yin no//
122a6('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams ston par byed pa ma yin no//ma rig pa ston par byed pa ma yin no//'du byed ston par byed pa ma yin no//rnam par shes pa ston par byed
122a7('bum): pa ma yin no//ming dang gzugs ston par byed pa ma yin no//skye mched drug ston par byed pa ma yin no//reg po ston par byed pa ma yin no//tshor ba ston par byed
122b1('bum): pa ma yin no//sred pa ston par byed pa ma yin no//len pa ston par byed pa ma yin no//srid pa ston par byed pa ma yin no//skye ba ston par byed pa ma yin no//rga shri ston
122b2('bum): par byed pa ma yin no//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ston par byed pa ma yin no//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston par byed pa ma yin no//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
122b3('bum): ston por byed pa ma yin no//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston par byed pa ma yin no//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston par byed pa ma yin no//shes rab kyi pha
122b4('bum): rol tu phyin pa ston par byed pa ma yin no//nang stong pa nyid ston par byed pa ma yin no//phyi stong pa nyid ston par byed pa mi yin no//phyi nang stong pa nyid ston par byed pa ma yin no///
122b5('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ston par byed pa ma yin no//chen po stong pa nyid ston par byed pa ma yin no//don dam pa stong pa nyid ston par byed pa ma yin no//'dus byas stong
122b6('bum): pa nyid ston par byed pa ma yin no//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ston par byed pa ma yin no//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ston par byed pa ma yin no//thog ma dang tha ma med/
122b7('bum): pastong pa nyid ston par byed pa ma yin no//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ston par byed pa ma yin no//rang bzhin stong pa nyid ston par byed pa ma yin no//chos thams cad stong pa/
123a1('bum): nyid ston par byed pa ma yin no//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ston par byed pa ma yin no//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ston par byed pa ma yin no//dngos po
123a2('bum): med pa stong pa nyid ston par byed pa ma yin no//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ston par byed pa ma yin no//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ston par byed pa ma yin no//dran
123a3('bum): pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ston par byed pa ma yin no//yang dag par spong ba rnams ston par byed pa ma yin no//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ston par byed pa ma yin no//dbang
123a4('bum): po rnams ston par byed pa ma yin no//stobs rnams ston par byed pa ma yin no//byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ston par byed pa ma yin no//'phags pa'i lam yan lag
123a5('bum): brgyad pa ston par byed pa ma yin no//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ston par byed po ma yin no//bsam gtan rnams ston par byed pa ma yin no//tshad med pa rnams ston
123a6('bum): par byed pa ma yin no//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ston par byed pa ma yin no//rnam par thar pa rnams ston par byed pa ma yin no//mthar gyis gnas
123a7('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ston par byed pa ma yin no//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon po med pa ston par byed pa ma yin no//
123b1('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams ston par byed pa ma yin no//ting nge 'dzin rnams ston par byed pa ma yin no//gzungs kyi sgo rnams ston par byed pa ma yin no//de bzhin gshegs
123b2('bum): pa'i stobs rnams ston par byed pa ma yin no//mi 'jigs pa rnams ston par byed pa ma yin no//so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ston par byed pa ma yin no//byams pa
123b3('bum): chen po ston par byed pa ma yin no//snying rje chen po ston par byed pa ma yin no//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ston par byed pa ma yin no//thams cad shes
123b4('bum): pa nyid ston par byed pa ma yin no//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ston par byed pa ma yin no//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ston par byed pa ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe
123b5('bum): na/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyi dri la med cing mi dmigs na/gzugs yod pa 'am dmigs par
123b6('bum): lta ga la 'gyur/tshor ba yod pa 'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/'du shes yod pa 'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/'du byed yod pa 'am dmigs par
123b7('bum): lta ga la 'gyur/rnam par shes pa yod pa 'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/mig yod pa 'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/rna bo yod pa'am dmigs par
124a1('bum): lta ga la 'gyur/sna yod pa 'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/lce yod pa 'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/lus yod pa 'am dmigs par
124a2('bum): lha ga la 'gyur/yid yod pa'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/gzugs yod pa'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/sgra yod pa 'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur
124a3('bum): dri yod pa 'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/ro yod pa 'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/reg yod pa 'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/chos yod pa 'am
124a4('bum): dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/mig gi rnam par shes pa yod pa 'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yod pa 'am dmigs par lta ga la
124a5('bum): 'gyur/sna'i rnam par shes pa yod pa 'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/lce'i rnam par shes pa yod pa 'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/lus kyi rnam par
124a6('bum): shes pa yod pa 'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/yid kyi rnam par shes pa yod pa'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/mig gi 'dus te reg pa yod pa'am//
124a7('bum): dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yod pa 'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/sna'i 'dus te reg pa yod pa 'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur
124b1('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa yod pa 'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yod pa 'am dmigs par lha ga la 'gyur/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yod pa 'am dmigs/
124b2('bum): par lta ga la 'gyur/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yod pa 'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yod pa 'am dmigs par
124b3('bum): lta ga la 'gyur/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yod pa 'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/lce'i 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yod pa 'am dmigs par lta ga
124b4('bum): la 'gyur/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yod pa 'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yod pa 'am dmigs par lta ga/
124b5('bum): la 'gyur/sa'i khams yod pa 'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/chu'i khams yod pa'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/me'i khams yod pa'am dmigs par lta
124b6('bum): ga la 'gyur/rlung gi khams yod pa 'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/nam mkha'i khams yod pa'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/rnam par shes pa'i khams
124b7('bum): yod pa 'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/ma rig pa yod pa 'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/'du byed yod pa 'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/rnam par shes
125a1('bum): pa yod pa 'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/ming dang gzugs yod pa 'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/skye mched drug yod pa'am dmigs par lta
125a2('bum): ga la 'gyur/reg pa yod pa 'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/tshor ba yod pa 'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/sred pa yod pa 'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/
125a3('bum): len pa yod pa 'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/srid pa yod pa 'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/skye ba yod pa 'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/rga shi yid
125a4('bum): pa 'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa 'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa 'am dmigs
125a5('bum): par lta ga la 'gyur/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa 'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa 'am dmigs par lta ga la
125a6('bum): 'gyur/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa 'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa 'am dmigs par lta gA la 'gyur//
125a7('bum): nang stong pa nyid yod pa 'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/phyi stong pa nyid yod pa 'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/phyi nang stong pa nyid yod pa 'am dmigs par lta
125b1('bum): gal 'gyur/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod pa 'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/chen po stong pa nyid yod pa'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/don dam pa stong pa nyid yang
125b2('bum): 'am dmigs par lta ge la 'gyur/'dus byas stong pa nyid yod pa 'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod pa'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur//
125b3('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod pa 'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod pa 'am dmigs par lha gA la 'gyur/dor ba med pa stong
125b4('bum): pa nyid yod pa 'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod pa 'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod pa 'am dmigs par lta
125b5('bum): ga la 'gyur/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod pa 'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod pa 'am dmigs par lca ga la 'gyur/dngos po
125b6('bum): med pa stong pa nyid yod pa 'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod pa'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod pa
125b7('bum): 'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yod pa 'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/yang dag par spong ba rnams yod pa 'am dmigs par
126a1('bum): lta gA la 'gyur/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod pa 'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/dbang po rnams yod pa 'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/stobs
126a2('bum): rnams yod pa 'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod pa 'am dmigs par lha ga la 'gyur/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod
126a3('bum): pa'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod pa 'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/bsam gtan rnams yod pa 'am dmigs par lta ga la
126a4('bum): 'gyur/tshad med pa rnams yod pa 'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod pa 'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/rnam
126a5('bum): par thar pa rnams yod pa 'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod pa 'am dmigs par lha ga la 'gyur/rnam par thar
126a6('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa yod pa 'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/mngon par shes pa rnams yod pa 'am dmigs par lta ga
126a7('bum): la 'gyur/ting nge 'dzin rnams yod pa 'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod pa'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/de bzhin gshegs pa'i
126b1('bum): stobs rnams yod pa 'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/mi 'jigs pa rnams yod pa 'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod pa 'am dmigs
126b2('bum): par lta ga la 'gyur/byams pa chen po yod pa 'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/snying rje chen po yod pa'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
126b3('bum): rnams yod pa 'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/thams cad shes pa nyid yod pa 'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod pa 'am dmigs par lta
126b4('bum): gre la 'gyur/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod pa 'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur////shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa//bam po
126b5('bum): nyis brgya dgu pa//rab 'byor gzhan yang sems can gang ji snyed cig gdags pas gdags su yod pa/gzugs yod pa 'am gzugs med pa'am/'du shes yod pa 'am
126b6('bum): 'du shes med pa 'am/'du shes yod pa'ang ma yin/'du shes med pa'ang ma yin pa 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang /phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams ngag gi'ang
126b7('bum): rung ste/de dag gi sems bsdus pa dang /spros pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas sems bsdus pa dang spros par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to//rab
127a1('bum): 'byor ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas sems can de dag gi sems bsdus pa dang /spros pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce na/rab
127a2('bum): 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas sems can de dag gi sems bsdus pa dang spros pa ni chos nyid kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to//gsol pa/bcom
127a3('bum): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas sems can de dag gi sems bsdus pa dang spros pa chos nyid gang gis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce na/bcom ldan
127a4('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ni chos nyid gang la chos nyid kyang mi dmigs na/sems bsdus pa dang spros pa lta smos kyang mi smos pa'i chos nyid des/de bzhin
127a5('bum): gshegs pas sems can de dag gi sems bsdus pa dang spros pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to//rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
127a6('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sems can de dag gi sems bsdus pa dang spros pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to//rab 'byor de
127a7('bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sems can de dag gi sems bsdus pa dang spros pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu
127b1('bum): mkhyen ce na/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sems can de dag gi sems bsdus pa dang spros pa ni zad pa'i rnam par
127b2('bum): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to//rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sems can de dag gi sems bsdus
127b3('bum): pa dang spros pa ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i rnam par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to//rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
127b4('bum): sangs rgyas kyis sems can de dag gi sems bsdus pa dang spros pa ni 'gog pa'i rnam par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to//rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra/
127b5('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sems can de dag gi sems bsdus pa dang spros pa ni spong ba'i rnam par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to//rab
127b6('bum): 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sems can de dag gi sems bsdus pa dang spros pa ni zhi ba'i rnam par yang dag pa ji lta ba
127b7('bum): bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to//rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sems can de dag gi sems bsdus pa dang spros pa ni
128a1('bum): dben pa'i rnam par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to//rab 'byor de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
128a2('bum): rgyas ni sems can de dag gi sems bsdus pa dang spros pa yang dag po ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to//rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
128a3('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sems can de dag gi sems 'dod chags dang bcas pa la 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
128a4('bum): du rab tu mkhyen to//'dod tshogs dang bral ba'i sems la 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to//zhe sdang dang bcas
128a5('bum): pa'i sems la zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to//zhe sdang dang bral ba'i sems la zhe sdang dang bral ba'i sems zhes
128a6('bum): bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to//gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems la gti mug dang bces pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab
128a7('bum): tu mkhyen to//gti mug dang bral ba'i sems la gti mug dang bral ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das
128b1('bum): ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sems can de dag gi sems 'dod chags dang bcus pa la 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i
128b2('bum): sems zhes bgyi bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen pa lags/zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems la zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems zhes bgyi bar yang dag pa ji lta ba
128b3('bum): bzhin du rab tu mkhyen pa lags/gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems la gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems zhes bgyi bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen pa lags//
128b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor sems 'dod chags dang bcas pa gang yin pa de ni sems kyi yang dag pa ji lta ba nyid ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab
128b5('bum): 'byor sems ni yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du dmigs su med do//sems las byung ba'i chos rnams kyang dmigs su med na/'dod chags dang bcas pa'am/'dod chags
128b6('bum): dang bral ba'i sems dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/rab 'byor sems zhe sdang dang bcas pa gang yin pa de ni sems kyi yang dag pa ji lta ba nyid ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na//
128b7('bum): rab 'byor sems ni yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du dmigs su med de/sems las byung ba'i chos rnams kyang dmigs su med na/sems zhe sdang dang bcas pa 'am/zhe sdang
129a1('bum): dang bral ba'i sems dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/rab 'byor sems gti mug dang bcas pa gang yin pa de ni sems kyi yang dag pa ji lta ba nyid ma yin no//
129a2('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor sems ni yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du dmigs su med do/sems las byung ba'i chos rnams kyang dmigs su med na/gti mug dang bcas
129a3('bum): pa'am/gti mug dang bral ba'i sems dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'od la brten te/sems can
129a4('bum): de dag gi sems 'dod chags dang bcas pa la 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to//zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i
129a5('bum): sems la zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to//gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems la gti mug dang bcas pa'i
129a6('bum): sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to//rab 'byor ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas sems can de dag gi sems 'dod chags dang bral
129a7('bum): ba la 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce na/rab 'byor sems 'dod chags dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni sems
129b1('bum): kyi 'dod chags dang bcas pa nyid ma yin/'dod chags dang bral ba nyid ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor sems gnyis 'grogs shing phrad pa med de/rab 'byor de ltar
129b2('bum): na de bzhin gshegs pas sems can de dag gi sems 'dod chags dang bral ba la/'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen
129b3('bum): to//rab 'byor ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas sems can de dag gi sems zhe sdang dang bral ba la zhe sdang dang bral ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du
129b4('bum): rab tu mkhyen ce na/rab 'byor sems zhe sdang dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni/sems kyi zhe sdang dang bcas pa nyid ma yin/zhe sdang dang bral ba nyid ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe
129b5('bum): na|rab 'byor sems gnyis 'grogs shing phrad pa med de/rab 'byor de ltar na de bzhin geshegs pas sems can de dag gi sems zhe sdang dang bral ba la zhe sdang dang
129b6('bum): bral ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to//rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas sems can de dag gi sems gti mug dang bral ba la gti
129b7('bum): mug dang bral ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce ni/rab 'byor sems gti mug dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni/sems kyi gti mug dang
130a1('bum): bcas pa nyid ma yin/gti mug dang bral ba nyid ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor sems gnyis 'grogs shing phrad pa med de/rab 'byor de ltar na de
130a2('bum): bzhin gshegs pas sems can de dag gi sems gti mug dang bral ba la gti mug dang bral ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to//rab
130a3('bum): 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la brten te/sems can pha rol dang gang zag pha rol gyi sems rgya tsho ba la//
130a4('bum): sems rgya che zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to//rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten te/sems
130a5('bum): can pha rol dang gang zag pha rol gyi sems rgya che ba la sems rgya che zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce na/rab 'byor 'di la de bzhin gshegs
130a6('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sems can pha rol dang gang zag pha rol gyi sems de rgya che bar mi 'gyur/sems de rgya chung bar mi
130a7('bum): 'gyur/sems de 'phel bar mi 'gyur/sems de 'grib par mi 'gyur/sems de 'ong bar mi 'gyur/sems de 'gro bar mi 'gyur te/sems de dngos po
130b1('bum): med pas rgya che bar 'gyur ba ma yin/rgya chung bar 'gyur pa ma yin/'phel bar 'gyur ba ma yin/'grib par 'gyur ba ma yin/'ong bar 'gyur ba ma yin/'gro bar 'gyur
130b2('bum): ba ma yin no zhes bya bar rab tu mkhyen to//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar sems la gang gis rgya chen por 'gyur ba'am/rgya chung bar 'gyur ba 'am/'phel bar 'gyur
130b3('bum): ba 'am/'grib par 'gyur ba 'am/'ong bar 'gyur ba 'am/'gro bar 'gyur ba'i ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir te/rab 'byor de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
130b4('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten te/sems can pha rol dang /gang zag pha rol gyi sems rgya che ba la sems rgya che
130b5('bum): zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to//rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis shes
130b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten te/sems can pha rol dang /gang zag pha rol gyi sems yangs pa la sems yangs zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
130b7('bum): du rab tu mkhyen to//rab 'byor ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten
131a1('bum): te/sems can pha rol dang /gang zag pha rol gyi sems yangs pa la sems yangs zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce na/rab
131a2('bum): 'byor 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sems can pha rol dang /gang zag pha rol gyi sems de la 'ong ba mi
131a3('bum): gzigs so//'gro ba mi gzigs so//skye ba mi gzigs so//'gag pa mi gzigs so//gnas pa mi gzigs so//gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba mi
131a4('bum): gzigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor sems de la gang 'ong bar 'gyur ba 'am/'gro bar 'gyur ba 'am/skye bar 'gyur ba 'am/'gag par 'gyur ba 'am
131a5('bum): gnas par 'gyur ba 'am/gnas pa los gzhan du 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid med de/rab 'byor de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
131a6('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten te/sems can pha rol dang /gang zag pha rol gyi sems yangs pa la sems yangs
131a7('bum): zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to//rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis
131b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten te/sems can pha rol dang /gang zag pha rol gyi sems tshad med pa la sems tshad med pa'o zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba
131b2('bum): bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to//rab 'byor ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la
131b3('bum): brten te/sems can pha rol dang /gang zag pha rol gyi sems tshad med pa la sems tshad med ces bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce na/rab 'byor
131b4('bum): 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sems can pha rol dang /gang zag pha rol po de dag gi sems de gnas par yang
131b5('bum): dag par rjes su mi gzigs/rnam par gnas par yang dag par rjes su mi gzigs/yongs su gnas par yang dag par rjes su mi gzigs/nye bar gnas par
131b6('bum): yang dag par rjes su mi gzigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor sems kyi rgyud ni rten med cing tshad med pa ste/sems kyi rgyud de dag la gang la gnas par bya ba'i
131b7('bum): rten med pa'i phyir te/rab 'byor de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten te/
132a1('bum): de/sems can pha rol dang /gang zag pha rol gyi sems tshad med pa la sems tshad med ces bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to//rab
132a2('bum): 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten te/sems can pha rol
132a3('bum): dang gang zag pha rol gyi sems bstan du med pa la sems bstan du med ces bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to//rab 'byor ji ltar na de bzhin
132a4('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la brten te/sems can pha rol dang gang zag pa
132a5('bum): rol gyi sems bstan du med pa la sems bstan du med ces bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce na/rab 'byor 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
132a6('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis mtshan nyid med pa'i sems la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/mtshan nyid med pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag
132a7('bum): pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to//rab 'byor de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu
132b1('bum): phyin pa zab mo 'di la brten te/sems can pha rol dang /gang zag pha rol gyi sems bstan du med pa la bstan du med pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab
132b2('bum): tu mkhyen to//rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la brten te//
132b3('bum): sems can pha rol dang /gang zag pha rol gyi sems bltar med pa la bltar med pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to//rab 'byor ji ltar
132b4('bum): na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la brten te/sems can pha rol dang /gang zag
132b5('bum): pha rol gyi sems bltar med pa la bltar med pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce na/rab 'byor 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan snga la
132b6('bum): sems can pha rol dang /gang zag pha rol gyi sems de dag snang bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
132b7('bum): rgyas kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la brten te/sems can pha rol dang /gang zag pha rol gyi sems bltar med pa la bltar med pa'i sems zhes bya bar
133a1('bum): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to//rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis
133a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la brten te/sems can pha rol dang /gang zag pha rol po de dag gi sems 'phro ba dang 'du ba dang bkram pa dang /bcum pa
133a3('bum): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to//rab 'byor ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis shes rab kyi pha rol
133a4('bum): tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la brten te/sems can pha rol dang /gang zag pha rol po de dag gi sems 'phro ba dang /'du ba dang bkram pa dang /bcum pa yang dag pa ji
133a5('bum): lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce na/rab 'byor 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sems can pha rol dang gang zag pa
133a6('bum): rol po de dag gi sems 'phro ba dang /'du ba dang bkram pa dang /bcum pa gang ji snyed cig skye zhing 'byung ba de dag thams cad kyang gzugs la brten/tshor ba la
133a7('bum): brten/'du shes la brten/'du byed la brten/rnam par shes pa la brten pas skye zhing 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar sems can pha rol dang /gang zag pa
133b1('bum): rol po de dag gi sems de dag rab tu mkhyen to//rab 'byor de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
133b2('bum): pa zab mo 'di la brten te/sems can pha rol dang /gang zag pha rol po de dag gi sems 'phro ba dang /'du ba dang /bkram pa dang /bcum pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du
133b3('bum): rab tu mkhyen to//de la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/sems can pha rol dang /gang zag pha rol gyi sems 'phro ba dang /
133b4('bum): 'du ba dang /bkram pa dang /bcum pa rnam pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/bdag dang 'jig rten rtag ces bya ba de nyid bden gyi/gzhan ni don med pa'o zhes bya ba de ni
133b5('bum): gzugs la gnas pa'o//de ni tshor ba la gnas pa'o//de ni 'du shes la gnas pa'o//de ni 'du byed la gnas pa'o//de ni rnam par shes pa la gnas pa'o//bdag dang
133b6('bum): 'jig rten mi rtag ces bya ba de nyid bden gyi/gzhan ni don med pa'o zhes bya ba de ni gzugs la gnas pa'o//de ni tshor ba la gnas pa'o//de ni 'du shes la gnas pa'o///
133b7('bum): de ni 'du byed la gnas pa'o//de ni rnam par shes pa la gnas pa'o//bdag dang 'jig rten rtag kyang rtag la/mi rtag kyang mi rtag ces bya ba de nyid bden gyi/gzhan
