201b1('bum): gtan rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so//rab 'byor tshad med pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag
201b2('bum): tu med gzhal du med pa ste/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so//rab 'byor gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpog tu med
201b3('bum): gzhal du med pa ste/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so//rab 'byor rnam par thar pa brgyad bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/mi mnyam
201b4('bum): pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so//rab 'byor mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/mi mnyam pa
201b5('bum): dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so//rab 'byor rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon po med pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med
201b6('bum): pa ste/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so//rab 'byor mngon par shes pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/mi mnyam pa
201b7('bum): dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so//rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so///
202a1('bum): rab 'byor gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsdam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so//rab 'byor
202a2('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so//rab 'byor mi 'jigs
202a3('bum): pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so//rab 'byor so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
202a4('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so//rab 'byor byams pa chen po bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu
202a5('bum): med gzhal du med pa ste/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so//rab 'byor snying rje chen po bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/mi mnyam
202a6('bum): pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so//rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/mi mnyam pa dang
202a7('bum): mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so//rab 'byor rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi
202b1('bum): dmyigs so//rab 'byor lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so//rab
202b2('bum): 'byor phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so//rab 'byor dgra bcom pa nyid
202b3('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med po ste/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so//rab 'byor rang byang chub bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du
202b4('bum): med pa ste/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so//rab 'byor lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/mi mnyam pa dang
202b5('bum): mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so//rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs/
202b6('bum): so//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa
202b7('bum): lags/ci'i slad du tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du 'du
203a1('bum): shes bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du 'du byed bsam
203a2('bum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mo khyab dpag tu
203a3('bum): ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du mig bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du mo mchis shing /
203a4('bum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du rna ba bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi
203a5('bum): dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du sna bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad
203a6('bum): du lce bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du mi mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du lus bsam gyis mi khyab dpag
203a7('bum): tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du yid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis/
203b1('bum): shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi
203b2('bum): dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du sgra bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchi so shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du dri bsam
203b3('bum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du ro bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal
203b4('bum): du ma mtshos shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du reg bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang
203b5('bum): mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du chos bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad
203b6('bum): du mig gi rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du rna ba'i rnam par
203b7('bum): shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du sna'i rnam par shes pa bsam
204a1('bum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du lce'i rnam par shes pa bsam
204a2('bum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slang du lus kyi rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab
204a3('bum): dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du yid kyi rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu
204a4('bum): ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du mig gi 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis
204a5('bum): gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma
204a6('bum): mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du sA'i 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu mi mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /
204a7('bum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du lce'i 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang
204b1('bum): mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du lus kyi 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs
204b2('bum): pa lags/ci'i slad du yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad
204b3('bum): du mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du
204b4('bum): rnanga'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du
204b5('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du lce'i
204b6('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du lus kyi
204b7('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du yid kyi
205a1('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags//
205a2('bum): ci'i slad du sa'i khams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhol du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du chu'i khams
205a3('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du me'i khams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag
205a4('bum): tu ma mchis gzhol du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du rlung gi khams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal
205a5('bum): du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du nam mkha'i khams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis
205a6('bum): shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du rnam par shes pa'i khams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing
205a7('bum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du ma rig pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
205b1('bum): pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du 'du byed bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i'o
205b2('bum): slad du rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du ming dang gzugs
205b3('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du skye mched drug bsam gyis mi khyab
205b4('bum): dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal
205b5('bum): du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi
205b6('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du sred pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi
205b7('bum): dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du len pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i
206a1('bum): slad du srid pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis grwa zhal du ma mchis shing /mI mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lcags/ci'i slad du skye ba
206a2('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhol du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du rgyu shi bsam gyis mo khyeb
206a3('bum): dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shring /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab
206a4('bum): dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsdam gyis mi khyab
206a5('bum): dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i srad du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin po bsam gyis mi khyab
206a6('bum): dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi
206a7('bum): khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi
206b1('bum): khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lugs/ci'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag
206b2('bum): tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du nang stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma
206b3('bum): mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du phyi stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam
206b4('bum): pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du phyi nang stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi
206b5('bum): dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs
206b6('bum): pa lags/ci'i slad du chen po stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i
206b7('bum): slad du don dam pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du 'dus
207a1('bum): byas stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lcags/ci'i slad du 'dus/
207a2('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du mtha' las
207a3('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du thog ma
207a4('bum): dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa ldugs/ci'i slad du dor ba
207a5('bum): med pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du rang bzhin stong pa
207a6('bum): nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du chos thams cad stong pa nyid
207a7('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsam
207b1('bum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag
207b2('bum): tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lcags/ci'i slad du dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis
207b3('bum): gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis
207b4('bum): shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis
207b5('bum): shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing //
207b6('bum): mi mnyam pa dang munyam pa mi dmigs pa lpags/ci'i slad du yang dag par spong ba rnams bsum gyis mi khyab dngagro tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam
207b7('bum): pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang
208a1('bum): mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du dbang po rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang
208a2('bum): mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du stobs rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs
208a3('bum): pa lags/ci'i slad du byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpog tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa
208a4('bum): lags/ci'i slad du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs
208a5('bum): pa lags/ci'i slad du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpog tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa
208a6('bum): lags/ci'i slad du bsam gtan rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i
208a7('bum): slad du tshad med pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du gzugs
208b1('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du rnam
208b2('bum): par thar pa brgyad bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du mthar gyis gnas
208b3('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du rnam par
208b4('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs
208b5('bum): pa lags/ci'i slad du mngon par shes pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/
208b6('bum): ci'i slad du ting nge 'dzin rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du gzungs
208b7('bum): kyi sgo rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma michis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i
209a1('bum): stobs bcu bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du mi 'jigs
209a2('bum): pa bzhi bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du so so yang dag par rig
209a3('bum): pa bzhi bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du byams pa chen po
209a4('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du snying rje chen po bsam gyis mi
209a5('bum): khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bsam
209a6('bum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bsam
209a7('bum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du len cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
209b1('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa ljags/ci'i slad du phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsam gyis mi
209b2('bum): khyab dpag tu mo mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigasu pA lags/ci'i slad du dgra bcom pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma
209b3('bum): mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du rang byang chub bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma
209b4('bum): mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma
209b5('bum): mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma
209b6('bum): mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags////shos rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa//bam po nyis brgya
209b7('bum): bcu gsum pa//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor gzugs la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshod dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi
210a1('bum): dmigs so//rab 'byor tshor ba la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor 'du shes
210a2('bum): la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor 'du byed la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshod dang mnyam
210a3('bum): pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor rnam par shes pa la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//
210a4('bum): rab 'byor mig la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor rna ba la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad
210a5('bum): dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor sA la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor lce
210a6('bum): la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor lus la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa
210a7('bum): dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor yid la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor gzugs
210b1('bum): la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor sgra la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi
210b2('bum): dmigs so//rab 'byor dri la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor ro la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad
210b3('bum): dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor reg la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshar dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor
210b4('bum): chos la'ang bsam pa drang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor mig gi rnam par shes pa la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /
210b5('bum): tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs
210b6('bum): so//rab 'byor sna'i rnam par shes pa la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor lce'i rnam par shes pa
210b7('bum): la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor lus kyi rnam par shes pa la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang
211a1('bum): mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor yid kyi rnam par shes pa la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam
211a2('bum): pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor mig gi 'dus te reg pa la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor rna ba'i
211a3('bum): 'dus te reg pa la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor sna'i 'dus te reg pa la'ang bsam pa dang dpag
211a4('bum): pa dang /chud dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor lce'i 'dus te reg pa la'ang bsamo pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi
211a5('bum): mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor
211a6('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
211a7('bum): tshor ba la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la'ang
211b1('bum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad
211b2('bum): dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa
211b3('bum): mi dmigs so//rab 'byor lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor
211b4('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor sa'i khams la'ang bsam
211b5('bum): pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor chu'i khams la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshod dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam
211b6('bum): pami dmigs so//rab 'byor me'i khams la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor rlung gi khams la'ang bsam
211b7('bum): pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor nam mkha'i khams la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang
212a1('bum): mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor rnam par shes pa'i khams la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /chad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs
212a2('bum): so//rab 'byor ma rig pa lnga'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor 'du byed la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa
212a3('bum): dang /tshad dngo mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor rnam par shes pa la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi
212a4('bum): dmigs so//rab 'byor ming dang gzugs la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /ched dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor skye mched drug la'ang
212a5('bum): bsam pa dang dpag po dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor rig pa la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /chang dang mnyam pa dang mi
212a6('bum): mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor tshor ba la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor sred pa la'ang
212a7('bum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor len pa la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang
212b1('bum): mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor srid pa la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor skye ba la'ang bsam pa
212b2('bum): dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor rga shi la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam po dang mo mnyam pa mi dmigs
212b3('bum): so//rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
212b4('bum): phyin pa la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /
212b5('bum): tshod dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi
212b6('bum): dmigs so//rab 'byor bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor shes rab kyi
212b7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /chad
213a1('bum): dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor phyi stong pa nyid la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /chad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs
213a2('bum): so//rab 'byor phyi nang stong pa nyid la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshod dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la'ang bsam
213a3('bum): pa dang dpag po dang /tshod dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor chen po stong pa nyid la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa
213a4('bum): mi dmigs so//rab 'byor don dam pa stong pa nyid la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor 'dus byas stong pa nyid
213a5('bum): la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang
213a6('bum): mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la'ang bsgom pa dang dpog pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs
213a7('bum): so//rab 'byor thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /chad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor dor ba med pa
213b1('bum): stong pa nyid la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor rang bzhin stong pa nyid la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad
213b2('bum): dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor chos thams cad stong pa nyid la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//
213b3('bum): rab 'byor rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid
213b4('bum): la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad
213b5('bum): dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs
213b6('bum): so//rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la'ong bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor dran pa nye bar
213b7('bum): bzhag pa rnams la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor yang dag par spong ba rnams la 'ong bsam pa
214a1('bum): dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad
214a2('bum): dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor dbang po rnams la'ang bsdam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so///
214a3('bum): rab 'byor stobs rnams la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la'ang
214a4('bum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa/
214a5('bum): dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi
214a6('bum): mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor bsam gtan rnams la'ang bsam pa drang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor
214a7('bum): tshad med pa rnams la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
214b1('bum): pa rnams la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor rnam par thar pa rnams la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /
214b2('bum): tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug po rnams la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa
214b3('bum): dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang
214b4('bum): mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor mngon par shes pa rnams la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs
214b5('bum): so//rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin rnams la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor gzungs kyi sgo rnams la'ang bsam
214b6('bum): pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad
214b7('bum): dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor mi 'jigs pa rnams la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so///
215a1('bum): rab 'byor mo so yang dag par rig pa rnams la'ang bsam pa dang dadag pa dang /rmad dang mnyam pa dang ma mnyam pa ma dmigs so// /
215a2('bum): byams pa chen po la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /rgyud dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor snying rje chen po la'ang bsam pa dang dpag
215a3('bum): dang /rgyud dang mnyam pA dang myi mnyam pa myi dmigs so//rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad la'ang bsam pa dang dpag padang /rgyud dang mAH
215a4('bum): pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor rkyen du zhugs pa'i 'bros bu la'ang bsam pa dang dngag pa dang /cheng dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa m+bi dwamyigs so//
215a5('bum): rab 'byor lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu lo 'ang bsim pa dang dpag pa dang /rgyud dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor phyir mi 'ong ba'i nga
215a6('bum): bu la'ang bsam pa dong dpag pA dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor dgra bcom pa nyid la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /nga
215a7('bum): dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor rang byang chub la'ang bsam pa dang dpag po dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//
215b1('bum): rab 'byor lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
215b2('bum): la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du gzugs la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang //
215b3('bum): tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags
215b4('bum): ci'i slad du 'du shes la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du 'du byed la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad
215b5('bum): dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa
215b6('bum): lags/ci'i slad du mig la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang munyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du rna ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad
215b7('bum): dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du sna la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags
216a1('bum): ci'i slad du lce la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du lus la bsam pa dang dpag
216a2('bum): pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du yid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs
216a3('bum): pa lags/ci'i slad du gzugs la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du sgra la bsam pa dang dpag
216a4('bum): pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du dri la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs
216a5('bum): pa lags/ci'i slad du rol bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du reg la bsam pa dang dpag pa
216a6('bum): dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du chos la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs/
216a7('bum): pa lags/ci'i slad du mig gi rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du rna ba'i
216b1('bum): rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa drang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du sna'i rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag
216b2('bum): pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du lce'i rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi/
216b3('bum): dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du lus kyi rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad
216b4('bum): du yid kyi rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du mig gi 'dus te reg pa la bsam
216b5('bum): pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa
216b6('bum): drang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du sna'i 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags//
216b7('bum): ci'i slad du lce'i 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la
217a1('bum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang //
217a2('bum): tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam
217a3('bum): pA dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa
217a4('bum): mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la ngosam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa
217a5('bum): lags/ci'i slad du lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i
217a6('bum): srad du lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lpags/ci'i slad du yid kyi
217a7('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du sa'i khams la bsam
217b1('bum): pa dang dpagra pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du chu'i khams la bsamA pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi
217b2('bum): mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du me'i khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /ched dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du rlung
217b3('bum): gi khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du nam mkha'i khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshod
217b4('bum): dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du rnam par shes pa'i khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs
217b5('bum): pa lags/ci'i slad du ma rig pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du 'du byed la bsam pa dang dpag
217b6('bum): pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyamu pa dang mi mnyam pa mi
217b7('bum): dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du ming dang gzugs la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du skye mched drug
218a1('bum): la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du reg pa la bsam pa dang dpagra pa dang /chang
218a2('bum): drang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du tshor ba la bsam pa drang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags
218a3('bum): ci'i slad du sred pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du len pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang
218a4('bum): tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du srid pa la bsdam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa
218a5('bum): lags/ci'i slad du skye ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du rga shi la bsam pa dang dpag
218a6('bum): pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pra mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang
218a7('bum): mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i srid du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs
218b1('bum): pa lags/ci'i slad du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /chud dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
218b2('bum): tu phyin pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tsha dra dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lugs/ci'i slad du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam po dang dpag
218b3('bum): pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mA
218b4('bum): mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du nang stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du phyi
218b5('bum): stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /ched dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du phyi nang stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /
218b6('bum): tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mAnyam pa mi dmigs pa lpags/ci'i slad du stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa drang mi mnyam pa
218b7('bum): mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du chen po stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du don dam
219a1('bum): pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du 'dus byas stong pa nyid la
219a2('bum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad
219a3('bum): dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam
219a4('bum): pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags
219a5('bum): ci'i slad du dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du rang bzhin stong pa nyid la
219a6('bum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du chos thams cad stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang //
219a7('bum): tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi
219b1('bum): mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i
219b2('bum): slad du dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bsam
219b3('bum): pa dang dpag pa dang /tshod dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad
219b4('bum): dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi
219b5('bum): dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du yang dag par spong ba rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du rdzu
219b6('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du dbang po rnams la bsam pa dang dpag bi
219b7('bum): dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du stobs rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi
220a1('bum): dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshod dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmyigs pa
220a2('bum): lags/tswi'i slad du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyang po la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /chang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du
220a3('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du bsam gtan rnams la bas
220a4('bum): pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i srang du tshad med pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa
220a5('bum): dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam
220a6('bum): pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du
220a7('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du rnam pa
220b1('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i
220b2('bum): slad du mngon par shes pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du ting nge 'dzin rnams la
220b3('bum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du gzungs kyi sgo rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam
220b4('bum): pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi
220b5('bum): dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du mi 'jigs pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du so so yang
220b6('bum): dag par rig pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du byams pa chen po la bsam pa dang dpag
220b7('bum): pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du snying rje chen po la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshod dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi
221a1('bum): dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi
221a2('bum): dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad
221a3('bum): du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
221a4('bum): la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du dgra bcom pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad
221a5('bum): dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa legs/ci'i slad du rang byang chub la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa
221a6('bum): lags/ci'i slad du lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpog pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du rnam
221a7('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//
221b1('bum): rab 'byor gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du mod la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir gzugasnga la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /chud dang /
221b2('bum): mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir
221b3('bum): tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor 'du shes kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhol
221b4('bum): du med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir 'du shes la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor 'du
221b5('bum): byed kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir 'du byed la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam
221b6('bum): bI dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i
221b7('bum): phyir rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor mig gi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag
222a1('bum): tu med gzhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir mig la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi
222a2('bum): dmigs so//rab 'byor rna ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir rna ba la bsam pa dang dpag
222a3('bum): pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor sna'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
222a4('bum): pa ste/de'i phyir sna la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor lce'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag
222a5('bum): tu med gzhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir lde la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /ched dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//
222a6('bum): rab 'byor lus kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu meng gzhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir lus la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /
222a7('bum): tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor yid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhol du med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
222b1('bum): pa ste/de'i phyir yid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med
222b2('bum): gzhal du maud la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir gzugs la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor
222b3('bum): sgra'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir sgra la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang
222b4('bum): mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor dri'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir dri la bsam pa dang
222b5('bum): dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor ro'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang
222b6('bum): mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir ro la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor reg gi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab
222b7('bum): dpag tu med gzhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir reg la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//
223a1('bum): rab 'byor chos kyang bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir chos la bsam pa dang dpag
223a2('bum): pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor mig gi rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/
223a3('bum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir mig gi rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor rna
223a4('bum): ba'i rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la bsam pa
223a5('bum): dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor sna'i rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med
223a6('bum): la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir sna'i rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor
223a7('bum): lce'i rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir lce'i rnam par shes pa la bsam pa
223b1('bum): dang dpag pa dang /chad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/
223b2('bum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir lus kyi rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor yid
223b3('bum): kyi rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir yid kyi rnam par shes pa la bsam pa
223b4('bum): dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du
223b5('bum): med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir mig gi 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab
223b6('bum): 'byor rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la bsam
223b7('bum): po dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam po mi dmigs so//rab 'byor sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la//
224a1('bum): ma mnyam pa drang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir sna'i 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /chad dang mnyam pa dang mo mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab
224a2('bum): 'byor lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyi so mo khyab dpag tu meng gzhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir lho'i 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa
224a3('bum): dad dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal
224a4('bum): du med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//
224a5('bum): rab 'byor yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir yid kyi 'dus te regs
224a6('bum): pa la bosam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis
224a7('bum): mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad
224b1('bum): dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/mi mnyam
224b2('bum): pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor
224b3('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshar ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i
224b4('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba la bsgom pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam
224b5('bum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshod dang
224b6('bum): mnyam po dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/mi mnyam
224b7('bum): pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam po dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor/
225a1('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir yid
225a2('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor sa'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam
225a3('bum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir sa'i khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam
225a4('bum): pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor chu'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir chu'i khams la
225a5('bum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor me'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du
225a6('bum): med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir me'i khams la bsam pa dang dpag po dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam po mi dmigs so//rab
225a7('bum): 'byor rlung gi khams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir rlung gi khams la bsam pa dang
225b1('bum): dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor nam mkha'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/mi
225b2('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir nam mkha'i khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor rnam par
225b3('bum): shes pa'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir rnam par shes pa'i khams la bsam
225b4('bum): pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor ma rig pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/mi
225b5('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir ma rig pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor 'du byed kyi ngo bo
225b6('bum): nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir 'du byed la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang
225b7('bum): mi mnyam pa mi dmigos so//rab 'byor rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu mad gzhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i
226a1('bum): phyir rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor ming dang gzugs kyi ngo bo
226a2('bum): nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir ming dang gzugs la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang
226a3('bum): mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor skye mched drug gi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mau khyab dpag tu meng gzhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
226a4('bum): pa ste/de'i phyir skye mched drug la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor reg pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi
226a5('bum): khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs/
226a6('bum): so//rab 'byor tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa
226a7('bum): dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor sred pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med go zhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang
226b1('bum): mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir sred pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /rgyud dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor len pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu
226b2('bum): med gzhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir len pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor
226b3('bum): srid pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir srid pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam
226b4('bum): pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor skye ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du maung la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir skye
226b5('bum): ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor rga shi'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med
226b6('bum): la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir rga shi la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha
226b7('bum): rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam pa dang/
227a1('bum): dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu
227a2('bum): med gzhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam pa dang dpag po dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam
227a3('bum): pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir
227a4('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo
227a5('bum): nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang //
227a6('bum): tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la//
227a7('bum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam po dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//
227b1('bum): rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
227b2('bum): pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du
227b3('bum): med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir nang stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor phyi stong pa
227b4('bum): nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir phyi stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshod dang mnyam
227b5('bum): pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i
227b6('bum): phyir phyi nang stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpog pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam
227b7('bum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa
228a1('bum): dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor chen po stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang /
228a2('bum): mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir chen po stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor don dam pa stong pa nyid
228a3('bum): kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir don dam pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad
228a4('bum): dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang
228a5('bum): mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir 'dus byas stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpog pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor 'dus ma byas stong
228a6('bum): pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyiso mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag
228a7('bum): pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du
228b1('bum): med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//ra //
228b2('bum): 'byor thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir thog ma drang tha ma med
228b3('bum): pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab
228b4('bum): dpag tu med gzhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyamo pa
228b5('bum): mi dmigs so//rab 'byor rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir rang bzhin
228b6('bum): stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam po mi dmigs so//rab 'byor chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab
228b7('bum): dpag tu med gzhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir chos thams cad stong pa nyid lo bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi
229a1('bum): mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/myi mnyam pa dang /
229a2('bum): mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor mi dmigs
229a3('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang
229a4('bum): dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du
229a5('bum): med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//
229a6('bum): rab 'byor ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsamo gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la
229a7('bum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab
229b1('bum): dpag tu med gzhal du med la/mo mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi
229b2('bum): mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i
229b3('bum): phyir dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi ngo bo
229b4('bum): nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir yang dag par spong ba rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang
229b5('bum): mnyam pa drang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
229b6('bum): pa ste/de'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor dbang po rnams kyi ngo bo nyid
229b7('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir dbang po rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang
230a1('bum): mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor stobs rnams kying ba nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang mAnyam
230a2('bum): pa ste/de'i phyir stobs rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi ngo bo
230a3('bum): nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang //
230a4('bum): tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med
230a5('bum): la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi
230a6('bum): dmigs so//rab 'byor 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir
230a7('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor bsam gtan rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam
230b1('bum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir bsam gtan rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam
230b2('bum): pami dmigs so//rab 'byor tshad med pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir tshad myed pa
230b3('bum): rnams la bsnam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs s+ho//rab 'byor gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid
230b4('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir gzugaso med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa
230b5('bum): dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/mi mnyam
230b6('bum): pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor mthar gyis
230b7('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir mthar gyis gnas
231a1('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor rnam par thar pa'i sgo
231a2('bum): skyostong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/del
231a3('bum): phyir rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs
231a4('bum): so//rab 'byor mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ma mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir mngon par
231a5('bum): shes pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mau mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi
231a6('bum): khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir ting nge 'dzin rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi
231a7('bum): mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i
231b1('bum): phyir gzungs kyi sgo rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i ngo bo
231b2('bum): nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang //
231b3('bum): tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang
231b4('bum): mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir mi 'jigs pa bzhi la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor so so yang dag par rig
231b5('bum): pa bzhi'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la bsam pa dang
231b6('bum): dpag pa dang /tshang dang mnyam pa drong mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor byams pa chen po'i ngo bo nyid bsam+bi gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/mi
231b7('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir byams pa chen po la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam po mi dmigs so//rab 'byor snying rje chen
232a1('bum): po'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir snying rje chen po la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang //
232a2('bum): tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid bsom gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la//
232a3('bum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa skye/de'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//
232a4('bum): rab 'byor rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras
232a5('bum): bu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag
232a6('bum): tu med gzhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam
232a7('bum): pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir phyir
232b1('bum): mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor dgra bcom pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag
232b2('bum): tu med gzhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir dgra bcom pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so///
232b3('bum): rab 'byor rang byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir rang byang chub la bsam pa dang dpag
232b4('bum): pa dang //tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/mi mnyam
232b5('bum): pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor rnam pa thams
232b6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bsam
232b7('bum): pa dang dpag pa dang /tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so////shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa//bam po
233a1('bum): nyis brgya bcu bzhi pa//rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/gzugs gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
233a2('bum): pa de la gzugs dmigs su yod dam/tshor ba gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la tshor ba dmigs su yod
233a3('bum): dam/'du shes gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la 'du shes dmigs su yod dam/'du byed gang bsam
233a4('bum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la 'du byed dmigs su yod dam/rnam par shes pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag
233a5('bum): tu med gzhal du med pa ste/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rnam par shes pa dmigs su yod dam/mig gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa
233a6('bum): ste/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la mig dmigs su yod dam/rna ba gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rna
233a7('bum): ba dmigs su yod dam/sna gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la sna dmigs su yod dam/lce gang bsam
233b1('bum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lce dmigs su yod dam/lus gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/
233b2('bum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lus dmigs su yod dam/yid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la yid
233b3('bum): dmigs su yod dam/gzugs gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la gzugs dmigs su yod dam/sgra gang
233b4('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la sgra dmigs su yod dam/dri gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du
233b5('bum): myemed pa ste/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la dri dmigs su yod dam/ro gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la
233b6('bum): ro dmigs su yod dam/reg gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la reg dmigs su yod dam/chos gang
233b7('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la chos dmigs su yod dam/mig gi rnam par shes pa gang bsam gyis mi
234a1('bum): khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la mig gi rnam par shes pa dmigs su yod dam/rna ba'i rnam par shes
234a2('bum): pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dmigs su yod dam/sna'i rnam par shes pa
234a3('bum): gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la sna'i rnam par shes pa dmigs su yod dam/lce'i rnam par shes pa
234a4('bum): gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lce'i rnam par shes pa dmigs su yod dam/lus kyi rnam par
234a5('bum): shes pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lus kyi rnam par shes pa dmigs su yod dam/yid kyi
234a6('bum): rnam par shes pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa dmigs su yod dam//
234a7('bum): mig gi 'dus te reg pa gang bsam gyi so mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa dmigs su yod dam//
234b1('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa glang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dmigs su yod dam/sna'i 'dus/
234b2('bum): te reg pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa dmigs su yod dam/lce'i 'dus te reg pa
234b3('bum): gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa dmigs su yod dam/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa gang
234b4('bum): busam gyis mi khyab dadag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dmigs su yod dam/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gang bsam
234b5('bum): gyis mi khyab dpog tu med gzhal du med pa ste/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dmigs su yod dam/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
234b6('bum): ba gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dmigs su yod dam/rna ba'i
234b7('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam po de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
235a1('bum): dmigs su yod dam/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de lnga
