296a1('bum): kyang yongs su ma dris/yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/nem nur du 'gyur/rmongs par
296a2('bum): 'gyur/sems zhum par 'gyur/sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang bas sngon gyi mthar
296a3('bum): bsam gtan bzhi thos kyang yongs su ma dris/yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/nem nur du 'gyur//
296a4('bum): rmongs par 'gyur/sems zhum par 'gyur/sems kyi rnam pa gzhon du 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis
296a5('bum): sngon gyi mthar tshad med pa bzhi thos kyang yongs su ma dris/yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/nem nur du 'gyur//
296a6('bum): rmongs par 'gyur/sems zhum par 'gyur/sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon
296a7('bum): gyi mthar gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi thos kyang yongs su ma dris/yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan
296b1('bum): pa'i tshe/nem nur du 'gyur/rmongs par 'gyur/sems zhum par 'gyur/sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i
296b2('bum): theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar rnam par thar pa brgyad thos kyang yongs su ma dris/yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zang mo 'di bstan
296b3('bum): pa'i tshe/nem nur du 'gyur/rmongs par 'gyur/sems zhum par 'gyur/sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i
296b4('bum): theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu thos kyang yongs su ma dris/yongs su brtog pa ma byas pa de ni/shes rab kyi pha rol
296b5('bum): tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/nem nur du 'gyur/rmongs par 'gyur/sems zhum par 'gyur/sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gzhan yang gang
296b6('bum): zazug byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa thos kyang yongs su ma dris//
296b7('bum): yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/nem nur du 'gyur/rmongs par 'gyur/sems zhum par 'gyur/sems
297a1('bum): kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar mngon par shes pa lnga thos kyang
297a2('bum): yongs su ma dris/yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/nem nur du 'gyur/rmongs par 'gyur/sems zhum par
297a3('bum): 'gyur/sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar ting nge 'dzin rnams thos kyang yongs
297a4('bum): su ma dris/yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/nem nur du 'gyur/rmongs par 'gyur/sems zhum par
297a5('bum): 'gyur/sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gzhan yang grong zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar gzungs kyi sgo rnams thos
297a6('bum): kyang yongs su ma dris/yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/nam nur du 'gyur/rmongs par 'gyur//
297a7('bum): sems zhum par 'gyur/sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar de bzhin
297b1('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu thos kyang yongs su ma dIs/yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/nem nur du 'gyur/rmongs
297b2('bum): par 'gyur/sems zhum par 'gyur/sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar mi
297b3('bum): 'jigs pa bzhi thos kyang yongs su ma dris/yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/nem nur du 'gyur/rmongs par
297b4('bum): 'gyur/sems zhum par 'gyur/sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar so so /
297b5('bum): yang dag par rig pa bzhi thos kyang yongs su ma dris/yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/nem nur du
297b6('bum): 'gyur/rmongs par 'gyur/sems zhum par 'gyur/sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i thug pa pa gang
297b7('bum): gis sngon gyi mthar byams pa chen po thos kyang yongs su ma dris/yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/nem
298a1('bum): nA duShab+h+yam+b+ha/rmongs par 'gyur/sems zhum par 'gyur/snyoms kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gzhan dang gang \u0f7fbyung chub sang/
298a2('bum): dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar snying rje chen po thos kyang yongs su ma dris/yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa nga ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan
298a3('bum): pa'i tshe/nam nur du 'gyur/rmongs par 'gyur/sems zhum par 'gyur/sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa
298a4('bum): theg pa bya gang gis sprin gyi mthar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dris pa bco brgyad pos kyang yongs su ma dris/yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu na
298a5('bum): bzab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/nem nur du 'gyur/rmongs par 'gyur/sems zhum par 'gyur/sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag
298a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar thams cad shes pa nyid thos kyang yongs su ma dris/yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu
298a7('bum): phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/nem nur du 'gyur/rmongs par 'gyur/sems zhum par 'gyur/sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gzhan yang gang
298b1('bum): zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid thos kyang yongs su ma dris/yongs su brtag bla ma byas pa de ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
298b2('bum): bzang mo 'dri bstan pa'i tshe/nem nur du 'gyur/rmongs par 'gyur/sems zhum par 'gyur/sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub
298b3('bum): sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thos kyang yongs su ma dris/yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/shes rab kyi pha
298b4('bum): rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/nem nur du 'gyur/rmongs par 'gyur/sems zhum par 'gyur/sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gzhan yang
298b5('bum): gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas yongs su ma dris/yongs su brtag pa ma byas te/nyi ma
298b6('bum): gcig gam/gnyis sam/gsum mam/bzhi'am/lngar rjes su ma 'brangs na/gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri/
298b7('bum): zhing rtog pa dang /nyi ma gcig gam/gnyis sam/gsum mam/bzhi 'am/lngar rjes su 'brang bar byed pa'i tshe/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di mi 'phrogs
299a1('bum): par mi 'gyur te/yongs su dri ba dang yang mi ldan par 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de ni de ltar yang 'gyur te/gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol
299a2('bum): tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yongs su ma dris/yongs su ma brtags/rjes su 'brang ba ma byas pa de ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di mnyan pa la de tsam gyis
299a3('bum): dge ba'i bsam pa dang /mos pa skye bar 'gyur te/de ni bar bar mos shing /bar bar mos pa med par 'gyur te/de ni ldam ldem gyi blo des 'phrogs shing /shing bal
299a4('bum): gyi gzegs ma bzhin du 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de ni yun ring po nas/theg pa la zhugs pa ma yin par reg par bya ste/dge
299a5('bum): ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su ma bzung ba'o//yang drag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur ma byas pa'o//rab 'byor gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i
299a6('bum): theg pa pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di'i lung ma mnos/kha ton du ma byas la tshul bzhin du yod la ma byas te/des ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
299a7('bum): pa la ma bslabs so//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma bslabs so//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma bslabs so//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la
299b1('bum): ma bsra bas so//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma bslangs so//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ma bslabs so//nang stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so//phyi stong pa nyid lam
299b2('bum): bslabs so//phyi nang stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so//chen po stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so//don dam pa stong pa nyid lam bslabs
299b3('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la ma bsrabs so//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la ma bslab skye so//bag ma dang tha ma med pa
299b4('bum): stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so//rang bzhin stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so//chos thams cad stong pa nyid la ma bsrubs so//rang
299b5('bum): gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la ma bslabs
299b6('bum): so//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la ma bslabs so//yang dag par spong ba rnams la ma bslabs so//rdzu 'phrul
299b7('bum): gyi rkang pa rnams la ma bslabs so//dbang po rnams la ma bslabs so//stobs rnams la ma bslabs so//byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la ma bslabs so//'phags pa'o//
300a1('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa la ma bslabs so//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la ma bslabs so//bsam gtan rnams la ma duslabs so//tshad med pa rnam
300a2('bum): la ma bslabs so//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la ma bslabs so//rnam par thar pa brgyad la ma bslabs so//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
300a3('bum): 'jug pa dgu la ma bslabs so//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa la ma bslabs so//mngon par shes pa rnams la ma
300a4('bum): bslabs so//ting nge 'dzin rnams la ma bslabs so//gzungs kyi sgo rnams la ma bslabs so//ji bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la ma bslabs so//mi 'jigs
300a5('bum): pa bzhi la ma bslabs so//so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la ma bslabs so//byams pa chen po la ma bslabs so//snying rje chen po la ma bslabs so//sangs rgyas kyi
300a6('bum): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la ma bslabs so//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la ma bslabs so//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la ma bslabs so//phyir mi 'ong ba'i
300a7('bum): 'bras bu la ma bslabs so//dgra bcom pa nyid la ma bslabs so//rang byang chub la ma bslabs so//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la ma bslabs so//rnam pa thams
300b1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid la ma bslabs so//rab 'byor gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs par rig par bya ste/de ni dad pa tsam dang /dga'
300b2('bum): ba tsam dang /mos pa tsam dang ldan par zad do/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zlab mo 'dri 'dri ba 'am/klog pa 'am/lung 'bog pa'am/kha ton du bya ba 'am/tshul bzhin
300b3('bum): du yid la bya bar mi nus so//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di mi 'dre zhing lung mi 'bog pa
300b4('bum): dadeng /kho ton mi byed cing tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed la/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
300b5('bum): pas gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang ///
300b6('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang /nang stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi
300b7('bum): 'dogs pa dang /phyi stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la
301a1('bum): phan mi 'dogs pa dang /chen po stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang /'dus byas
301a2('bum): stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mo
301a3('bum): 'dogs pa dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang /rang bzhin
301a4('bum): stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi
301a5('bum): 'dogs pa dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa
301a6('bum): nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis gzhan la phan
301a7('bum): mi 'dogs pa dang /yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang /dbang po
301b1('bum): rnams kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang /stobs rnams kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang /
301b2('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis gzhan la pan mi 'dogs pa dang /bsam gtan rnams kyis
301b3('bum): gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang /tshad med pa rnams kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa
301b4('bum): dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang /rnam par thar pa'i
301b5('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pas gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang /ting nge 'dzin
301b6('bum): rnams kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus gzhan la phan mi 'dogs
301b7('bum): pa dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang /byams pa chen pos gzhan la phan
302a1('bum): mi 'dogs pa dang /snying rje chen pos gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang /rgyun
302a2('bum): du zhugs pa'i 'bras bus gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus gzhan la phan mi 'drogs pa dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus gzhan la
302a3('bum): pa ni mi 'dogs pa dang /dgra bcom pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang /rang byang chub kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis
302a4('bum): gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun par mi spyod/bsam gtan
302a5('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun par mi spyod/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun par mi spyod/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun par mi spyod/tshul khrims kyi
302a6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun par mi spyod/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun par mi spyod/nang stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod/phyi stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod//
302a7('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod/chen po stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod/dron dam pa stong pa nyid dang mthun par
302b1('bum): mi spyod/'dus byas stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod/mtha' lngas 'das pa stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod/thog ma dang tha
302b2('bum): ma med pa stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod/rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod/chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang
302b3('bum): mthun par mi spyod/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod//
302b4('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang mthun par mi spyod/yang dag par
302b5('bum): spong du rnams dang mthun par mi spyod/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang mthun par mi spyod/dbang po rnams dang mthun par mi spyod/stobs rnams dang mthun par mi spyod/byang
302b6('bum): chub kyi yan lag rnams dang mthun par mi spyod/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang mthun par mi spyod/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang mthun par mi spyod/bsam
302b7('bum): gtan rnams dang mthun par mi spyod/tshad med pa rnams dang mthun par mi spyod/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang mthun par mi spyod/rnam par thar pa
303a1('bum): brgyad dang mthun par mi spyod/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang mthun par mi spyod/rnam par thar pa'i skyo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med
303a2('bum): pa dang /smon pa med pa dang mthun par mi spyod/mngon par shes pa rnams dang mthun par mi spyod/ting nge 'dzin rnams dang mthun par mi spyod/gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang mthun/
303a3('bum): par mi spyod/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang mthun par mi spyod/mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang mthun par mi spyod/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang mthun par mi spyod//
303a4('bum): byams po chen po dang mthun par mi spyod/snying rje chen po dang mthun par mi spyod/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang mthun par mi spyod/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras
303a5('bum): bu dang mthun par mi spyod/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang mthun par mi spyod/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang mthun par mi spyod/dgra bcom pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod//
303a6('bum): rang byang chub drang mthun par mi spyod/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod na/de ni gnas gnyis
303a7('bum): dang /sa gnyis po las sa gcig la gnas par 'gyur te/de ni 'di ltar nyan thos kyi so 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am
303b1('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ma bris ma bstan/kha ton du ma byas/tshul bzhin du yid la ma byas la shes rab kyi pha
303b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa la phan ma btags/byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang mthun par ma spyad pas/
303b3('bum): de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa po'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des gnas gnyis dang /sa gnyis po de las gcig la gnas par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o//shes rab
303b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/le'u sum cu bzhi pa'o////rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/rgya mtsho'i dbus su gru zhig la mi rnams shing ngam/
303b5('bum): shing dum mam/shing leb bam/rgyal ba 'am/ro lA mi 'ju mi 'dzin na/rab 'byor mi de dag ni rgya mtsho chen po'i pha rol gyi 'gram du ma phyin par dus byed par rig par bya'o//
303b6('bum): rab 'byor mi gang rgya mtsho'i dbus su glu zhig pa'i tshe/shing ngam shing dum mam/shing leb bam/rkyal ba 'am/ro la 'ju zhing 'dzin pa de dag ni rgya mtshor dus byed par mi 'gyur/
303b7('bum): te/bde zhing nyam nyes med par rgya mtsho chen po nas pha rol gyi 'gram du phyin par 'gyur te/ma nyes ma nyams par thad la phyin par 'gyur ro//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub
304a1('bum): sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa tsam dang dga' ba tsam dang /mos pa tsam dang ldan pa gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab
304a2('bum): mo 'di mi 'dri mi ston/kha ton du mi byed/tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi 'dri mi ston/kha ton du mi byed/tshul
304a3('bum): bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi 'dri mi ston/kha ton du mi byed/tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang /bzod
304a4('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi 'dri mi ston/kha ton du mi byed/tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi 'dri mi ston/kha ton du mi
304a5('bum): byed/tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi 'dri mi ston/kha ton du mi byed tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang /nang
304a6('bum): stong pa nyid mi 'dri mi ston/kha ton du mi byed/tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang /phyi stong pa nyid mi 'dra mi ston/kha ton du mi byed/tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed
304a7('bum): cing mi brten pa dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid mi 'di mi ston/kha ton du mi byed/tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi 'dri mi ston/kha ton
304b1('bum): du mi byed/tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang /chen po stong pa nyid mi 'dri mi ston/kha ton du mi byed/tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang /don dam
304b2('bum): pa stong pa nyid mi 'dri mi ston/kha ton du mi byed/tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid mi 'dri mi ston/kha ton du mi byed/tshul bzhin/
304b3('bum): du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi 'di mi ston/kha ton du mami byed/tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang /mtha' las 'das
304b4('bum): pa stong pa nyid mi 'dri mi ston/kha ton du mi byed/tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi 'dri mi ston/kha ton du mi byed/tshul
304b5('bum): bzhin du yid la mi byed cing ma brten pa dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi 'dri mi ston/kha ton du mi byed/tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid
304b6('bum): mi 'dri mi ston/kha ton du mi byed/tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang /chos thams tsod stong pa nyid mi 'dra mi ston/kha ton du mi byed/tshul bzhin du yid la mi
304b7('bum): byed cing mi brten pa dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi 'dre mi ston/kha ton du mi byed/tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing ma brtan pa dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi
305a1('bum): 'drim sgon/kha ton du mi byed/tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi 'dra kroR+Sha/kha ton du mi byed/tshul
305a2('bum): bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi 'dri mi ston/kha ton du mi byed/tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang /dngos po med pa'i
305a3('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi 'dri mi ston/kha ton du mi byed tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams mi 'dri mi ston/kha ton du mi byed/tshul
305a4('bum): bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang /yang dag par spong ba rnams mi 'dri mi ston kha ton du mi byed/tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang /rdzu 'phrul
305a5('bum): d+hI rkang pa rnams mi 'dri mi ston/kha ton du mi byed/tshul bzhin du yid la mi bye cing mi brten pa dang /dbang po rnams mi 'dri mi ston/kha ton du mi byed/tshul bzhin du
305a6('bum): yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang /stobs rnams mi 'dri mi ston kha ton du mi byed/tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang /byang chub kyi yon lag rnams mi'i dri
305a7('bum): mi ston/kha ton du mi byed/tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi 'dri mi ston/kha ton du mi byed/tshul bzhin du yid la
305b1('bum): mi byed cing mi brten pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi 'dri mi ston/kha ton du mi byang tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang /bsam gtan rnams mi 'dri mo ston/kha ton du
305b2('bum): mi byed/tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang /tshad med pa rnams mo 'dri mi ston/khwa ton du yo byed/tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mI brten pa dang /gzugs
305b3('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi 'dri mi ston/kha ton du mi byed/tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang /rnam par thar pa rnams mi 'dri mi ston/kha ton du mi byed//
305b4('bum): tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mi 'dri mi ston/kha ton du mi byed/tshul bzhin du yid la mi
305b5('bum): byed cing mi brten pa dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa mi 'dri mi ston/kha ton du mi byed/tshul bzhin du yid lo mi byed cing
305b6('bum): mi brten pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams mi 'dri mi ston/kha ton du mi byed/tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams mi 'dri mi skyon/kha
305b7('bum): tonyon du mi byed/tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi 'dri mi ston/kha ton du mi byed/tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa
306a1('bum): dang /da zhin gshegs pa'i stongs brnam ma na/kha ton du mi byeng /rdul bzhin du yid la mi byang cing mi brten pa dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi mi 'drim
306a2('bum): skyon/kha ton du mi byed/tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi mi 'dri mi ston/kha ton du mi byed/tshul bzhin du yid la
306a3('bum): mi byed cing mi brten pa dang /byams pa chen po mi 'dri mo ston/kha ton du mi byed/tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang /snying rje chen po mi 'dri mi stan/kha
306a4('bum): tonyon du mi byed/tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi 'dri mi ston/kha ton du mi byed/tshul bzhin du yid la mi
306a5('bum): byed cing mi brten pa dang /thams cad shes pa nyid mi 'dri mi ston/kha ton du mi byed/tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mi
306a6('bum): 'dri mi ston/kha ton du mi byed/tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi 'dri mi ston/kha ton du mi byed/tshul bzhin du
306a7('bum): yid la mi byed cing mi brten po de dag ni bar ma dor byang chub las nyams par 'gyur te/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs
306b1('bum): rgyas kyis mngon du byed par 'gyur/rab 'byor gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
306b2('bum): ba'i don du dad pa yod cing /bzod pa dang mos pa dang /lhag pa'i bsam pa dang /dga' ba dang /spro ba dang /mi gtong ba'ang yod cing /brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba de dag ni
306b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri'o//lung 'bog go/kha ton du byed do//tshul bzhin du yid la byed do//rten par byed do//de ltar na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
306b4('bum): kyi bu mo de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dad pa yod/bzod pa yod/mos pa yod/lhag pa'i bsam pa yod/dga' ba yod/spro ba yod/mi gtong
306b5('bum): ba yod/brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba yod pa yin te/de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba dang /
306b6('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba
306b7('bum): dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba dang /nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid
307a1('bum): kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /don dam pa stong pa
307a2('bum): nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /mtha' las 'das pa
307a3('bum): stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung po dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /rang
307a4('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /mi dmigs
307a5('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /dngos po med
307a6('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pas yongs su bzung ba dang /yang dag par spong bas yongs su bzung ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi
307a7('bum): rkang pas yongs su bzung ba dang /dbang pos yongs su bzung ba dang /stobs kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /byang chub kyi yan lag gis yongs su bzung ba dang /'phags
307b1('bum): nga'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs su bzung ba dang /'phags pa'i bden pas yongs su bzung ba dang /bsam gtan gyis yongs su bzung ba dang /tshad med pas yongs su
307b2('bum): bzung ba dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa sa yongs su bzung ba dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
307b3('bum): 'jug pa dgus yongs su bzung ba dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pas yongs su bzung ba dang /mngon par shes pas yongs su
307b4('bum): bzung ba dang /ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su bzung ba dang /gzungs kyi sgos yongs su bzung ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongs su bzung ba dang /mi 'jigs
307b5('bum): pa bzhis yongs su bzung ba dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yongs su bzung ba dang /byams pa chen pos yongs su bzung ba dang /snying rje chen pos yongs su bzung ba dang
307b6('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung
307b7('bum): ba dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/bar ma dor nye zho med par nyan thos kyi sa las 'das/rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das te/sems
308a1('bum): can yongs su smin par byas nas/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
308a2('bum): par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/dper na/bud med dam skyes pa la l-i zhig bum pa ma bsregs shing /so ma btang bas chu bcu par sems na/rab
308a3('bum): 'byor bum pa de ni ring por mi gnas te/myur du 'gyes shing 'jig par rig par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni bum pa de so ma btang ba'i phyir te/de ni tha mar sa nyid du
308a4('bum): 'gyur ro//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag la'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
308a5('bum): rdzogs par 'tshang rgyo ba'i phyir dad pa'ang yod/bzod pa'ang yod/mos pa'ang yod/lhag pa'i bsam pa'ang yod/dga' ba'ang yod/spro ba'ang yod/mi gtong ba'ang yod/
308a6('bum): brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba'ang yod mod kyi/de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung /thabs mkhas pas yongs su ma bzung /bsam gtan gyi pha rol
308a7('bum): tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung /tshul khrims kyi pha rol
308b1('bum): tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung /nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /phyi nang stong
308b2('bum): denyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su mo bzung
308b3('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /thog ma dang tha
308b4('bum): ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /chos thams cad stong pa nyid
308b5('bum): kyis yongs su ma bzung /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs
308b6('bum): su ma bzung /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su ma
308b7('bum): bzung /yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /dbang po rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /stobs rnams kyis
309a1('bum): yongs su ma bzung /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs su ma bzung /'phags
309a2('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /bsam gtan rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /tshad med pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /gzugs med pa'i snyoms
309a3('bum): par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzung /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs su ma
309a4('bum): bzung /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pas yongs su ma bzung /mngon par shes pa lngas yongs su ma bzung /ting nge
309a5('bum): 'dzin rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongs su ma bzung /mi 'jigs pa
309a6('bum): bzhis yongs su ma bzung /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yongs su ma bzung /byams pa chen pos yongs su ma bzung /snying rje chen pos yongs su ma bzung //sangs
309a7('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzung /thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung //
309b1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongs sgyu ma bzung na/byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bar ma dor nya zhor 'gyur bar shes par
309b2('bum): bya'o////shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa//bam po nyis brgya bco brgyad pa//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs
309b3('bum): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis bar ma dor nye zho 'byung ba gang zhe na/'di lta ste/nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na skyes pa 'am
309b4('bum): bud med la la zhig bum pa so legs par btang ngas chu klung ngam/mtsho 'am mtsho'u 'am/khron pa nas chu 'chu na/rab 'byor chu 'chu ba de'i bum pa des ni bde bar khyim du phyin
309b5('bum): par rig par bya'o//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir dad pa'ang yod/bzod pa'ang
309b6('bum): yod/mos pa'ang yod/lhag pa'i bsam pa'ang yod/dga' ba'ang yod/spro ba'ang yod/mi gtong ba'ang yod/brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba'ang yod la de'ang shes rab kyi
309b7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung /thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs
310a1('bum): su bzung /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su
310a2('bum): bzung /nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs
310a3('bum): su bzung /chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /'dus ma byas stong
310a4('bum): pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /dor ba med po stong pa
310a5('bum): nyid kyis yongs su bzung /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs
310a6('bum): su bzung /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /dngos
310a7('bum): bo med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /dran pa nye bar bzhag pas yongs su bzung /yang dag par spong bas yongs su bzung /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pas
310b1('bum): yongs su bzung /dbang pos yongs su bzung /stobs kyis yongs su bzung /byang chub kyi yan lag gis yongs su bzung /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs su
310b2('bum): bzung /'phags pa'i bden pas yongs su bzung /bsam gtan gyis yongs su bzung /tshad med pas yongs su bzung /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pas yongs
310b3('bum): su bzung /rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis yongs su bzung /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs su bzung /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan
310b4('bum): ma med pa dang /smon pa med pas yongs su bzung /mngon par shes pas yongs su bzung /ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su bzung /gzungs kyi sgos yongs su bzung /de
310b5('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongs su bzung /mi 'jigs pa bzhis yongs su bzung /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yongs su bzung /byams pa chen pos
310b6('bum): yongs su bzung /snying rje chen pos yongs su bzung /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongs su bzung /thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /lam
310b7('bum): gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung na/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni 'di lta ste/
311a1('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar bar ma dor nye zhor mi 'gyur te/mnyes ma nyams par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
311a2('bum): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/rgya mtsho'i gru ma bsdams shing /zag klan ma byas par rdzas bcug ste chu la btang na/rab
311a3('bum): 'byor gru de zhig par 'gyur te/gru'ang logs shig/rdzas kyang legs shig tu song nas/de ltar tshong pa de thabs mi mkhas pas/gnod pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur
311a4('bum): zhing /rin po che chen po las yongs su 'phang bar rig par bya'o//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
311a5('bum): pa'i byang chub kyi phyir dad pa'ang yod/bzod pa'ang yod/mos pa'ang yod/lhag pa'i bsam pa'ang yod/dga' ba'ang yod/spro ba'ang yod/mi gtong ba'ang yod/brtson
311a6('bum): 'grus mi 'dor ba'ang yod mod kyi/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung /thabs mkhas pas yongs su ma bzung /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas
311a7('bum): yongs su ma bzung /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas
311b1('bum): yongs su ma bzung /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung /nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis
311b2('bum): yongs su ma bzung /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /'dus byas
311b3('bum): stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong
311b4('bum): pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su
311b5('bum): ma bzung /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /ngo
311b6('bum): bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /yang
311b7('bum): dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /dbang po rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /stobs rnams kyis yongs su
312a1('bum): ma bzung /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /'phags pa'i lam+b+ha yan lag brgyad pas yongs su ma bzung /'phags pa'i bden pa
312a2('bum): rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /bsam gtan rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /tshad med pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
312a3('bum): rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzung /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs su ma bzung /rnam par thar
312a4('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pas yongs su ma bzung /mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis
312a5('bum): yongs su ma bzung /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongs su ma bzung /mi 'jigs pa bzhis yongs su ma
312a6('bum): bzung /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yongs su ma bzung /byams pa chen pos yongs su ma bzung /snying rje chen pos yongs su ma bzung /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
312a7('bum): 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzung /thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /rnam pa thams
312b1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung na/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bar ma dor nye nor 'gyur te/'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rin
312b2('bum): bopo che'i don chen po dang bral zhing rin po che chen po las 'phong bar rig par bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bar ma dor nye zho gang zhe na/'di
312b3('bum): lta ste nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dperarA na/skyes bu mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can la la zhig rgya mtsho chen po'i gru shin tu bsdams
312b4('bum): shing shin tu bstar ba chu la gtong zhing rdzas 'jug na/rab 'byor rgya mtsho'i glu de ni bar mi dor zhig par mi 'gyur te/gru des phyogs gang du bgrod pa der phyin par 'gyur bar
312b5('bum): rig par bya'o//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir dad pa'ang yod/bzod pa'ang
312b6('bum): yod/mos pa'ang yod/lhag pa'i bsam pa'ang yod/dga' ba'ang yod/spro ba'ang yod/mi gtong ba'ang yod/brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba'ang yod la/shes rab kyi
312b7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su gzung /thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
313a1('bum): pas yongs su bzung /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin/
313a2('bum): pas yongs su bzung /nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /stong pa nyid stong po
313a3('bum): nyid kyis yongs su bzung /chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung //
313a4('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /mtha' las 'dres pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /dor
313a5('bum): dang med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
313a6('bum): kyis yongs su bzung /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung
313a7('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung /yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongs su bzung //
313b1('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung /dbang po rnams kyis yongs su bzung /stobs rnams kyis yongs su bzung /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongs su
313b2('bum): bzung /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs su bzung /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung /bsam gtan rnams kyis yongs su bzung //chang
313b3('bum): med pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung /rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis yongs su bzung /mthar gyis
313b4('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs su bzung /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pas yongs su bzung /mngon par
313b5('bum): shes pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung /ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis yongs su bzung /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongs su bzung /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongs
313b6('bum): su bzung /mi 'jigs pa bzhis yongs su bzung /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yongs su bzung /byams pa chen pos yongs su bzung /snying rje chen pos yongs
313b7('bum): su bzung /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongs su bzung /thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung //
314a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung na/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
314a2('bum): byang chub tu bar ma dor nye zhor mi 'gyur bar rig par bya'o//rab 'byor de ni de ltar yang 'gyur te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la bla na med pa yang dag
314a3('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir dad pa'ang yod/bzod pa'ang yod/mos pa'ang yod/lhag pa'i bsam pa'ang yod/dga' ba'ang yod/spro ba'ang yod/mi gtong ba'ang
314a4('bum): yod/brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba'ang yod la/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par gyur/thabs mkhas pas yongs su zin par gyur/bsam gtan gyi pha
314a5('bum): rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par gyur/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par gyur/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par gyur/tshul khrims
314a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par gyur/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par gyur/nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su zin par gyur/phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs
314a7('bum): su zin par gyur/phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su zin par gyur/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su zin par gyur/chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su zin par gyur//
314b1('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su zin par gyur/'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su zin par gyur/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su zin par gyur/mtha' las 'das
314b2('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su zin par gyur/thog ma dang tha mo med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su zin par gyur/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su zin par gyur/rang bzhin stong pa
314b3('bum): nyid kyis yongs su zin par gyur/chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su zin par gyur/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su zin par gyur/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid
314b4('bum): kyis yongs su zin par gyur/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su zin par gyur/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su zin par gyur/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
314b5('bum): kyis yongs su zin par gyur/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su zin par gyur/yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongs su zin par gyur/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis
314b6('bum): yongs su zin par gyur/dbang po rnams kyis yongs su zin par gyur/stobs rnams kyis yongs su zin par gyur/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongs su zin par gyur//
314b7('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs su zin par gyur/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongs su zin par gyur/bsam gtan rnams kyis yongs su zin par
315a1('bum): gyur/tshad med pa rnams kyis yongs su zin par gyur/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su zin par gyur/rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis yongs
315a2('bum): su zin par gyur/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs su zin par gyur/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pas yongs
315a3('bum): su zin par gyur/mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongs su zin par gyur/ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis yongs su zin par gyur/gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongs su zin par gyur/

315a5('bum): byams pa chen pos yongs su zin par gyur/snying rje chen pos yongs su zin par gyur/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongs su zin par gyur/thams cad
315a6('bum): shes pa nyid kyis yongs su zin par gyur/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su zin par gyur/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongs su zin par gyur na/
315a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ra mi ltung ngo //rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper ni/mi na chod kyis lo brgya nyi shu lon pa/rgas/
315b1('bum): pa/dgog tu gyur pa/'khogs pa zhig yod la/de'i lus la rlung ngam/mkhris pa 'am/bad kan nam/'dus pa'i nad kyis btab na/rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/mi de
315b2('bum): gcig pu nyam rangs su khri las ldang nus sam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das de ni khri las ldang nus su lags kyang /rgyang grags gcig
315b3('bum): gam rgyang grags gnyis su'ang mchi bar mi nus te/de rgas pa dang /bro 'tshal bas nyams dmas pa'i slad du/khri las ldang nus su lags kyang mchi mi nus so//bcom ldan
315b4('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir dad pa'ang yod/bzod pa'ang

316a2('bum): sum bzung /chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /'dus ma byas skyong
316a3('bum): pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid

316a6('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang

317a1('bum): 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung ba dang /thabs mkhas pas yongs su ma bzung ba dang //
