424a1('bum): 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni tshor ba po dang 'brel pa ma yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab
424a2('bum): 'byor tshor ba ngo'ang shin tu med la/byang chub sems dpe'i go cha'ang med pas/de'i phyir go cha de ni tshor ba po dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems
424a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gro cha de ni shes pa po dang 'brel pa ma yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor shes pa po'ang shin tu med la/byang chub sems dpa'i go cha la
424a4('bum): med pas/de'i phyir go cha de ni shes pa po dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni mthong ba po dang 'brel pa ma
424a5('bum): yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor mthong ba po'ang shin tu med la/byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/de'i phyir go cha de ni mthong ba po dang 'brel pa ma yin/
424a6('bum): zhes bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po'i go cha de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor sbyin pa'i
424a7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'ang shin tu med la/byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/de'i phyir go tshe de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o//rab 'byor
424b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gro cha de ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
424b2('bum): po'adi shin tu med la/byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/de'i phyir go cha de ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o//rab 'byor byung
424b3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ong shin
424b4('bum): tu med la/byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/de'i phyir go cha de ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
424b5('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang shin tu
424b6('bum): med la/byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/de'i phyir go cha de ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'brel po ma yin zhes bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems
424b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor pasam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang
425a1('bum): shin tu med la/byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/de'i phyir go cha de ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes
425a2('bum): bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor
425a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang shin tu med la/byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/de'i phyir go cha de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'brel pa ma
425a4('bum): yin zhes bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni nang stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor nang stong pa
425a5('bum): nyid kyang shin tu med la/byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/de'i phyir go cha de ni nang stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems
425a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni phyi stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin to/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor phyi stong pa nyid kyang shin tu med la/byang chub sems
425a7('bum): dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/de'i phyir go cha de ni phyi stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni phyi
425b1('bum): rlung stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang shin tu med la/byang chub sems pa'i go cha'ang med pas/de'i phyir go cha de ni/
425b2('bum): phyi nang skyod pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/de
425b3('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor stong pa nyid stong po nyid kyang shin tu med la/byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/de'i phyir go cha de ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa
425b4('bum): ma yin zhes bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni chen po stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor chen po stong pa
425b5('bum): nyid kyang shin tu med la/byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/de'i phyir go cha de ni chen po stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
425b6('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i go tshe de ni don dam pa stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang shin tu med la/byang chub sems
425b7('bum): dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/de'i phyir go cha de ni don dam pa stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa mi yin zhes bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de
426a1('bum): ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang shin tu med la/byang chub sems dpa'i go
426a2('bum): cha'ang med pas/de'i phyir go cha de ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni 'dus
426a3('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang shin tu med la/byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas
426a4('bum): de'i phyir go cha de ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni mtha' las 'das pa
426a5('bum): stong po nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang shin tu med la/byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas//
426a6('bum): de'i phyir go cha de ni mtha' las 'das pa stong po nyid dang 'brel po ma yin zhes bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni thog ma dang
426a7('bum): mchod pa stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang shin tu med la/byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang
426b1('bum): med pas/de'i phyir go cha de ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni dor ba myed
426b2('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang shin tu med la/byang chub sems dpa'i glo cha'ang med pas/de'i phyir
426b3('bum): go cha de ni dor nga med pa stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshon po'i go cha de ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang 'brel
426b4('bum): pa ma yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor rang bzhin snying po nyid kyang shin tu maud la/byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/de'i phyir go cha de ni rang bzhin stong pa
426b5('bum): nyid dang 'brel pa ma yino zhes bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gro cha de ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/de tsa'i
426b6('bum): phyir zhe na/rab 'byor chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang shin tu med la/byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/de'i phyir go cha de ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang
426b7('bum): 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/de ci'i phyir
427a1('bum): zhe na/rab 'byor rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang shin tu med la/byang chub sems dpa'i gro cha'ang med pas/de'i phyir go cha de ni rang gi mtshan nyid skyong
427a2('bum): pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhe so bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/
427a3('bum): rab 'byor mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang shin tu med la/byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/de'i phyir go cha de ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin
427a4('bum): zhes bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor dngos
427a5('bum): po med pa stong pa nyid kyang shin tu med la/byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/de'i phyir go cha de ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o//rab
427a6('bum): 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang shin tu
427a7('bum): mod lo/byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/de'i phyir go cha de ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
427b1('bum): dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang shin tu med la/byang
427b2('bum): chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/de'i phyir go cha de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o////shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
427b3('bum): pa stong phrag brgya pa//bam po nyis brgya nyer bzhi pa//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/de ci'i
427b4('bum): phyir zhe na/rab 'byor dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyang shin tu mdo la/byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/de'i phyir go cha de ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang 'brel pa ma
427b5('bum): yin zhes bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni yang dag par spong ba dang 'brel pa ma yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor yang dag par
427b6('bum): spong ba rnams kyang shin tu maud lo/byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/de'i phyir go cha de ni yang dag par spong ba dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub
427b7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang shin tu med la/byang
428a1('bum): chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/de'i phyir go cha de ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
428a2('bum): dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni dbang po dang 'brel pa ma yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor dbang po rnams kyang shin tu med la/byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas//
428a3('bum): de'i phyir go cha de ni dbang po dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni stobs dang 'brel pa ma yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe
428a4('bum): na/rab 'byor stobs rnams kyang shin tu med la/byang chub sems dpo'i go cha'ang med pas/de'i phyir go cha de ni stobs dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o//rab 'byor
428a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni byang chub kyi yan lag dang 'brel pa ma yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang shin tu
428a6('bum): med la/byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/de'i phyir go cha de ni byang chub kyi yan lag dang 'brel pa mo yin zhes bya'o//rob 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
428a7('bum): dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'phags pa'i lo ma yan lag brgyad pa'ang shin tu
428b1('bum): med la/byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/de'i phyir go chang ni 'phags pa'i lAm yan lag brgyad pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
428b2('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i go chang ni 'phags pa'i bden pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang shin tu mdol/byang chub sems
428b3('bum): dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/de'i phyir gro chu de ni 'phags pa'i bden pa dang 'brel pa ma yon zhes bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go chu de ni bsam
428b4('bum): gtan dang 'brel pa ma yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor bsam gtan rnams kyang shin tu mid la/byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/de'i phyir go cha de ni bsam gtan
428b5('bum): dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni tshad med pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor tshad med
428b6('bum): pa rnams kyang shin tu med la/byang chub sems dbye'i go cha'ang med pas/de'i phyir go cha de ni chang med pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
428b7('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
429a1('bum): kyang shin tu med la/byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/de'i phyir go cha de ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o//
429a2('bum): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni rnam par thar pa brgyad dang 'brel pa ma yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang shin tu
429a3('bum): med la/byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/de'i phyir go cha de ni rnam par thar pa brgyad dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
429a4('bum): chen po'i go cha de na mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang 'brel pa ma yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor mthar gyis gnos pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'ang
429a5('bum): shin tu med la/byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/de'i phyir go cha de ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o//rab 'byor
429a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na//
429a7('bum): rab 'byor rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'ang shin tu med la/byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/de'i phyir go tshe de ni rnam
429b1('bum): par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni mngon par
429b2('bum): shes pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor mngon par shes pa rnams kyang shin tu med la/byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/de'i phyir go cha de ni
429b3('bum): mngon par shes pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gro cha de ni ting nge 'dzin dang 'brel pa ma yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab
429b4('bum): 'byor ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang shin tu med la/byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/de'i phyir go cha de ni ting nge 'dzin dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub
429b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha do ni gzungs kyi sgro dang 'brel pa ma yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang shin tu med la/byang chub sems
429b6('bum): dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/de'i phyir go cha de ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha don de bzhin
429b7('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs dang 'brel pa ma yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de bzhin gshogs pa'i stobs rnams kyang shin tu med la/byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med
430a1('bum): pas/de'i phyir go cha de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gro cha de//
430a2('bum): ni mo 'jigs pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang shin tu med la/byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/de'i phyir go/
430a3('bum): cha de ni mi 'jigs pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni so so yang dag par rig pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te//
430a4('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor so so yang dag pa ro rig pa rnams kyang shin tu med la/byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/de'i phyir go cha de ni so so yang dag par rig
430a5('bum): pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni byams pa chen po dang 'brel pa ma yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor
430a6('bum): byams pa chen po'ang shin tu med la/byang chub sems dpa'i go tsha'ang med pas/de'i phyir go cha de ni byams pa chen po dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub
430a7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni snying rje chen po dang 'brel pa ma yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor snying rje chen po'ang shin tu med la/byang chub sems dpa'
430b1('bum): go cha'ang med pas/de'i phyir go cha da ni snying rje chen po dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
430b2('bum): pa dang 'brel pa ma yin to//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos mi 'dres pa rnams kyang shin tu med la/byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/de'i phyir go cha de
430b3('bum): ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang 'brel pa ma
430b4('bum): yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bros bu'ang shin tu mod la/byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/de'i phyir go cha de ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras
430b5('bum): bu dang 'brel pa mo yin zhes bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang 'brel pa ma yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/
430b6('bum): rab 'byor lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang shin tu med la/byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/de'i phyir go cha de ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang 'brel pa ma
430b7('bum): yin zhes bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang 'brel pa ma yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor phyir mi 'ong ba'i
431a1('bum): 'bras bu'ang shin tu med la/byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/de'i phyir gro cha de ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o//rab 'byor
431a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni dgra bcom pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor dgra bcom pa nyid kyang shin tu med la/byang chub
431a3('bum): sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/de'i phyir go cha de ni dgra bcom pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni rang
431a4('bum): byang chub dang 'brel pa ma yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor rang byang chub kyang shin tu med la/byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/de'i phyir go cha de ni rang byang chub
431a5('bum): dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab
431a6('bum): 'byor lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang shin tu med la/byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/de'i phyir go cha de ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin
431a7('bum): zhes bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor rnam pa
431b1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang shin tu med la/byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/de'i phyir go cha de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o//rab
431b2('bum): 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa gang dag gis/sems can thams cad bdag cag gis yongs su mya ngan las
431b3('bum): 'da' bar bya'o zhes go cha bgos pa de dag gi go cha ni chos thams cad dang 'brel pa ma yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/sems
431b4('bum): can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o zhes go cha 'tshal ba des nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i gnas gnyis su dogs par mi bgyi ste/bcom ldan
431b5('bum): 'das sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o zhes go cha 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi
431b6('bum): sar lhung ba'i gnas dang skabs ma mchis te/de ni gnas ma mchis so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sa mtshams bcad de/sems can
431b7('bum): gyi don du go cha 'tshal ba ma legs so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor khyod kyis don gyi dbang gang zhig mthong na/de skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems
432a1('bum): dpa' chen po de ltar go cha bgos shing /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa des nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i gnas gnyis su//
432a2('bum): dogs par mi bya'o zhes smras/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sems can nyi tshe nyung zad zhig gi slad du go cha 'tshal ba ma
432a3('bum): lags/ye shes nyung zad nyi tshe zhig gi slad du go cha 'tshal ba ma lags te/de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/sems
432a4('bum): can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i slad du go cha 'tshal to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
432a5('bum): kyi slad du go cha 'tshal to//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni sems can nyung
432a6('bum): zad nyi tshe'i don du go cha bgos pa ma yin/ye shes cung zad nyi tshe'i don du go cha bgos pa ma yin gyi rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni sems can thams
432a7('bum): cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi don du go cha bgos so//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni shin
432b1('bum): tu zad pa ste/da ni sus kyang bsgom par mi bgyi/ci'ang bsgom par mi bgyi/grang du'ang bsgom par mi bgyi'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu
432b2('bum): phyin pa zab mo 'dri la gang bsgom pa 'am/gang bsgom par bgyi ba 'am/gang gis bsgom par bgyi ba'i chos gang yang yongs su grub pa dmigs su ma mchis te/bcom
432b3('bum): ljon 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni nam mkha' bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni chos thams
432b4('bum): cad bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni ma mchis pa bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol
432b5('bum): tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni bsgom pa rnam par bsgom
432b6('bum): pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de gang bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa yin/gsol pa/bcom ldan
432b7('bum): 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni gzugs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
433a1('bum): bsgom pa 'di ni tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'dri lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'du shes bsgom pa rnam
433a2('bum): par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'du byed bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes
433a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni
433a4('bum): mig bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rna ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das
433a5('bum): 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni sne bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di/
433a6('bum): ni lce bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni lus bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom/
433a7('bum): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni yid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol
433b1('bum): tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni gzugs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'dri ni sgra bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//
433b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'dri ni dri bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
433b3('bum): bsgom pa 'di ni ro bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni reg bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//btsom
433b4('bum): ldan+da 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni chos bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa
433b5('bum): 'di ni mig gi rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa bsgom
433b6('bum): pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni sde'i rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das
433b7('bum): 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni lce'i rnam par shes po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
434a1('bum): bsgom pa 'di ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di
434a2('bum): ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa bsgom
434a3('bum): pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'dri lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom
434a4('bum): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi
434a5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi phyi rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni
434a6('bum): lus kyi 'dos te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa
434a7('bum): rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni mig gi'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom/
434b1('bum): pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan
434b2('bum): 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes
434b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni lho'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shis rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
434b4('bum): bsgom pa 'di ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'od ni yid
434b5('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni sa'i khams bsgom pa
434b6('bum): rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni chu'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta
434b7('bum): ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni me'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa
435a1('bum): 'di ni rlung gi khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes ra kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni nam mkha'i khams
435a2('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rnam par shes pa'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom
435a3('bum): pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni me rig pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lnga ste/shes rab
435a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'du byed bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rnam par
435a5('bum): shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni ming dang gzugs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o///
435a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni skye mched drug bsgomo pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab
435a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di na rig pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni tshor ba bsgom
435b1('bum): pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni sred pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes
435b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni len pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni srid pa bsgom pa
435b3('bum): rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni skye ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes
435b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rga shi bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni bdag bsgom pa
435b5('bum): rnam par bsgom po'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni sems can bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'dri lta ste/
435b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni srog bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'dri lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'gro ba
435b7('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni gso ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di
436a1('bum): lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni skyes bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
436a2('bum): pa 'di ni gang zag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni shed can bsgom pa rnam par bsgom
436a3('bum): pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni shed bdag bsgom pa rnam por bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab
436a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni byed pa po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni tshor ba po bsgom pa
436a5('bum): rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'dri lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni shes pa po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
436a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni mthong ba po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni spyan
436a7('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa
436b1('bum): rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta
436b2('bum): ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
436b3('bum): pa 'di ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
436b4('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta
436b5('bum): ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni phyi stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni phyi nang
436b6('bum): stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//
436b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni chen po stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu
437a1('bum): phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni don dam pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni
437a2('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam
437a3('bum): par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan
437a4('bum): 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab
437a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rang
437a6('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom
437a7('bum): pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
437b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni
437b2('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom
437b3('bum): pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di
437b4('bum): lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni dran pa nyo bar bzhag pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
437b5('bum): pa 'di ni yang dag par spong ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bsgom pa rnam
437b6('bum): par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni dbang po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes
437b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni stobs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom po'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni byang chub kyi yan
438a1('bum): lag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom
438a2('bum): pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan
438a3('bum): 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni bsam gtan bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
438a4('bum): bsgom pa 'di ni tshad med pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
438a5('bum): 'jug pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//
438a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das
438a7('bum): 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//
438b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni mngon par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol
438b2('bum): tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'dri lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni gzungs kyi sgo bsgom pa rnam
438b3('bum): par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan
438b4('bum): 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni mi 'jigs pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
438b5('bum): bsgom pa 'di ni so so yang dag par rig po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni byams pa chen po
438b6('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni snying rje chen po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das
438b7('bum): 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi
439a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
439a2('bum): pa 'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras
439a3('bum): bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni dgra bcom pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom
439a4('bum): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rang byang chub bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol
439a5('bum): tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'dri ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rnam
439a6('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes
439a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni gzugs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'od ni tshor ba bsgom pa
439b1('bum): rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'dri ni 'du shes bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab
439b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'du byed bsgom pa rnam par bsgom po'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rnam par shis pa bsgom
439b3('bum): pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni mig bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi
439b4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rna ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni sngo bsgom pa rnam par bsgom
439b5('bum): pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni lce bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
439b6('bum): pa 'di ni lus bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni yid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di//
439b7('bum): lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni gzugs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/
440a1('bum): sgra bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni dri bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta
440a2('bum): ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni ro bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni reg bsgom pa
440a3('bum): rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni chos bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha
440a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni mig gi rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rna ba'i rnam par
440a5('bum): shes po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni sna'i rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab
440a6('bum): 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni lce'i rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
440a7('bum): pa bsgom pa 'di ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni yid kyi rnam par shes
440b1('bum): pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di
440b2('bum): lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa
440b3('bum): 'di ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par
440b4('bum): bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes
440b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni mig
440b6('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
440b7('bum): gyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom pa
441a1('bum): 8/rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//
441a2('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab
441a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di
441a4('bum): ni sa'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni chu'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor
441a5('bum): 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di no me'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom po'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rlung
441a6('bum): gi khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni nem mkha'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor
441a7('bum): 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rnam par shes pa'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
441b1('bum): bsgom pa 'di ni ma rig pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'du byed bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di
441b2('bum): lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni
441b3('bum): ming dang gzugs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni skye mched drug bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di
441b4('bum): lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni tshor po bsgom
441b5('bum): pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni sred pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu
441b6('bum): phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni len pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni srid pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor
441b7('bum): 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni skye ba bsgom po rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rga shi bsgom
442a1('bum): pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni bdag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom bya'o//rab
442a2('bum): 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni sems can bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
442a3('bum): bsgom pa 'di ni sgrog bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'grob bsgom pa rnam par bsgom
442a4('bum): pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa posgom pa 'di ni gso ba bsgom pa rnam por bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'dri lta ste/shes rab kyi pha
442a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni skyes bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni gang zag bsgom pa rnam
442a6('bum): par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni shed can bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'dri lta ste/shes
442a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni shing bdag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni byed pa po
442b1('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni tsho ra ba po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/
442b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni shes pa po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lnga ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni mthong
442b3('bum): ba po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//
442b4('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab
442b5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/
442b6('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
442b7('bum): pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom po'o///
443a1('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni nang stong pa nyid dasgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes
443a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni phyi stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni phyi
443a3('bum): nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni stong pa nyid stong po nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom
443a4('bum): pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni chen po stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab
443a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni don dam pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni
443a6('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bsgom pa
443a7('bum): rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni mtha' las 'ongs pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam por bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor
443b1('bum): 'di lta ste/shas rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
443b2('bum): bsgom pa 'di ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsgom
443b3('bum): pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di
443b4('bum): lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
443b5('bum): pa 'di ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bsgom
443b6('bum): pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/
443b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
444a1('bum): pa bsgom pa 'di ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni yang
444a2('bum): dag par spong ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom
444a3('bum): pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lnga ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni dbang po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu
444a4('bum): phyin pa bsgom po 'di ni stobs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa rnam
444a5('bum): par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'phags pa'i lam yon lag brgyad pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab
444a6('bum): 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu
444a7('bum): phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni bsam gtan bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni tshad med pa bsgom pa rnam par
444b1('bum): bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/
444b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni mthar
444b3('bum): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
444b4('bum): dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni mngon par shes pa
444b5('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta skye/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni ting nge 'dzin bsgom po rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/
444b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni gzungs kyi sgo bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs
444b7('bum): pa'i stobs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po bsgom pa 'di ni mi 'jigs pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor
445a1('bum): 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni so so yang dag par rig pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol
445a2('bum): tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni byams pa chen po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom po 'di ni snying rje chen po bsgom pa rnam
445a3('bum): par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/
445a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni
445a5('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsgom pa rnam
445a6('bum): par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni dgra bcom pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi
445a7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rang byang chub bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa
445b1('bum): nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//de nas yang
445b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab
445b3('bum): mo 'di la mngon par chags pa mang ngam zhes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o///
445b4('bum): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la byang chub sems
445b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags pa med dam
445b6('bum): zhes brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la byang chub sems dpa' snyoms dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i
445b7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpo' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub
446a1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la byang chub
446a2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags pa ming
446a3('bum): dam zhes sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nang stong
446a4('bum): pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes nang stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
446a5('bum): sems dpa' chen po phyi stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes phyi stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o//rab 'byor
446a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyi nang stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes phyi nang stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su
446a7('bum): brtag par bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la byang chub
446b1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chen po stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes
446b2('bum): chen po stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpo' chen po yongs su brtog par bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don dam pa stong pa nyid
446b3('bum): la mngon par chags pa med dam+ba zhes don dam pa stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
446b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po 'dus byas stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes 'dus byas stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa'o sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par
446b5('bum): bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid lo mngon par chags pa med dam zhes 'dus mu byas stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa'
446b6('bum): sems dpa' tshon po yongs su brtag par bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes
446b7('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thog ma dang tha
447a1('bum): ma med pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su
447a2('bum): brtag par bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la byang chub
447a3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang bzhin stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam
447a4('bum): zhes rang bzhin stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams
447a5('bum): cad stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes chos thams cad stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o//rab 'byor
447a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par tshogs pa med dam zhes rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems
447a7('bum): dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chagos pa med dam zhes mi
447b1('bum): dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la/
447b2('bum): mngon par chags pa med dam zhes dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
447b3('bum): dpa' chen po ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtog par bya'o//rab 'byor
447b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la byang chub sems
447b5('bum): dada' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes dran
447b6('bum): pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dag par spong ba
447b7('bum): rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes yang dag par spong ba rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems
448a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems
448a2('bum): dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbang po rnams la mngon par chags pa med dmo zhes dbang po rnams la
448a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stobs rnams la mngon par chags pa myed
448a4('bum): dom zhes stobs rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi yan
448a5('bum): lag rnams la mngon par tshogs pa med dam zhes byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o//rab 'byor byang
448a6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags po'i lam yan lag brgyad pa lo mngon par chags pa med dam zhes 'phags pa'i lam yan log brgyad pa lo byong
448a7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la mngon par
448b1('bum): chags pa med dam zhes 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
448b2('bum): po bsam gtan rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes bsam gtan rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o//rab 'byor byang
448b3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes tshad med pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su
448b4('bum): brtag par bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes gzugs//
448b5('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug po rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
448b6('bum): po rnam par thar pa rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes rnam par thar pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o//rab
448b7('bum): 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes mthar gyis gnas pa'i
449a1('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
449a2('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan mo med pa dang /smon pa med pa la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes rnam par thor po'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang //
449a3('bum): smon pa med pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa rnams la
449a4('bum): mngon par chags pa med dam zhes mngon par shes pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
449a5('bum): dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes ting nge 'dzin rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o//rab 'byor
449a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes gzungs kyi sgo rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs
449a7('bum): su brtag par bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes de bzhin gshegs pa'i
449b1('bum): stobs rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'jigs pa rnams la mngon par
449b2('bum): chags pa med damr-i zhes mi 'jigs pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po so
449b3('bum): so yang dag par rig pa rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o//
449b4('bum): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa chen po la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes byams pa chen po la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs
449b5('bum): su brtog por bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes snying rje chen po la byang chub sems dpa' sems
449b6('bum): dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes sangs
449b7('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad shes
450a1('bum): pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes thams cad shes pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o//rab 'byor/
450a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa'
450a3('bum): sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med
450a4('bum): dmya zhes rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la byang chub sem sngo dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o///shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
450a5('bum): pa stong phrag brgya pa//bram po nyis brgya nyer lta pa//phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di
450a6('bum): la spyad pa'i tshe/pha rol gyis smras pa dang /pha rol gyis bstan pa la snying por mi lta 'am/phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/shes rab
450a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/pha rol gyi ngang pas mi 'gro 'am/phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/shes rab kyi pha
450b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems bskyed pas 'phrogs pa ma yin nam/zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems bskyed pas 'phrogs pa ma
450b2('bum): yin nom/gti mug dang bcos pa'i sems bskyed pas 'phrogs pa ma yin na mo/phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/shes rab kyi pha rol tu
450b3('bum): phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
450b4('bum): po dang bral bar ma gyur tam/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tama?/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/shes rab kyi phyi
450b5('bum): rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam zhes yongs su brtag par bya ste/gal te phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/shes rab kyi pha rol tu
450b6('bum): phyin pa thob mo 'di 'i chad pa'i tshe/mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur la/zhum pa dang yongs su zhum par mi 'gyur zhing /de'i yid phyir nur bar mi 'gyur te/shes
450b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos par dga' la/thos nas kyang 'dzin cing 'chang la/klog cing kun chub par byed de/tshul bzhin du yid la byed la/de bzhin
451a1('bum): nyid du nan tan du byed na/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ni sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yongs su
451a2('bum): dris shing yongs su brtag pa byas pa dang /bzung shing bcangs te/kun chub par byas pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byas par rig par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/drin
451a3('bum): 'di ltar phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/shes rlob kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'tshod pa'i tshe/mi 'jigs mi drang skrag par mi
451a4('bum): 'gyur lo/zhum par mi 'gyur/yongs su zhum par mi 'gyur zhing /de'i yid phyir mi ldog la/thos nas kyang gong du 'dzin cing 'chang la/klog cing kun chub par
451a5('bum): byed de/tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
451a6('bum): thob mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/mi 'jigs mI dngang skrag par mi 'gyur zhing /zhum par mi 'gyur/yongs su zhum par mi 'gyur na/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
451a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po des/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ji ltar brtag par bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
451b1('bum): sems dpa' chen po des/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di brtag par bya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan
451b2('bum): 'das ji ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa
451b3('bum): lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor stong pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
451b4('bum): pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/rab 'byor mtshan ma med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
451b5('bum): 'di la rtog pa yin/rab 'byor smon pa med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/
451b6('bum): rab 'byor nam mkha' la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog po yin/rab 'byor skyo ba med pa
451b7('bum): la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di lo rtog pa yin/rab 'byor 'gag pa med po la gzhol ba'i
452a1('bum): bsam pas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/rab 'byor kun nas nyon mongs pa med
452a2('bum): pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/rab 'byor rnam par byung ba med pa la
452a3('bum): gzhol ba'i bsam pas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/rab 'byor de bzhin nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam
452a4('bum): bas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/byang
452a5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/rab 'byor yang dag pa'i mtha' lo gzhol ba'i bsam pas/byang chub
452a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid lnga gzhol ba'i bsam pas/byang chub sems
452a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/rab 'byor bsom gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gzhol ba'i bsgom pas/byang
452b1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dri la rtog pa yin/rab 'byor mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/byang chub sems
452b2('bum): dada' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/rab 'byor rmi lam la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

452b4('bum): byin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/rab 'byor sgra brnyan la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog
452b5('bum): pa yin/rab 'byor smig rgyu la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/rab 'byor sgyu ma
452b6('bum): la gzhol ba'i bsgom pas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/rab 'byor sprul pa la gzhol ba'i bsam
452b7('bum): pas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ngo ltar stong pa nyid la gzhol ba'i
453a1('bum): bsam pas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/mtshan ma med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam
453a2('bum): pas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/smon pa med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/byang chub sems

453a5('bum): tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/'gag pa ma mchis pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab
453a6('bum): mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang /rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
453a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/de bzhin nyid lo gzhol ba'i bsam pas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin//
453b1('bum): pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/chos kyi dbyings la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/yang
453b2('bum): dag pa'i mtha' la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dri la rtog par 'gyur/mnyam pa nyid la gzhol ba'i

453b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis po la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/byang chub
453b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/rmi lam la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
453b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/gzugs brnyan la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
453b7('bum): pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/sgra brnyan la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur//
454a1('bum): smig rgya la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/sgyu mu la
454a2('bum): gzhol ba'i bsam pas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/sprul pa la gzhol ba'i
454a3('bum): bsam pas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur na/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
454a4('bum): sems dpa' tshon pa gzugs la rtog pa lags sam/tshor ba la rtog pa lags som/'du shes la rtog pa lags sam/'du byed la rtog pa logs sam/rnam par
454a5('bum): shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/mig la rtog pa lags sam/rna ba la rtog pa lags sam/sna la rtog pa lags sam/lce la rtog pa lags sam/lus
