454a7('bum): lags sam/reg la rtog pa lags sam/chos la rtog pa lags sam/mig gi rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la rtog
454b1('bum): pa lags sam/sna'i rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/lce'i rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/lus kyi rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/yid kyi
454b2('bum): rnam par shes pa li rtog pa lags sam/mig gi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/sna'i 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa
454b3('bum): lags sam/lce'i 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/mig gi
454b4('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog
454b5('bum): pa lags sam/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/yid kyi 'dus te reg
454b6('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/sa'i khams la rtog pa lags sam/chu'i khams la rtog pa lags sam/me'i khams la rtog pa lags sam/rlung gi
454b7('bum): khams la rtog pa lags sam/nam mkha'i khams la rtog pa lags sam/rnam par shes pa'i khams la rtog pa lags sam/ma rig pa la rtog pa lags sam//
455a1('bum): 'du byed la rtog pa lags sam/rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/ming dang gzugs la rtog pa lags sam/skye mched drug la rtog pa lags/
455a2('bum): sam/reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/sred pa la rtog pa lags sam/len pa la rtog pa lags sam/srid pa la rtog pa lags
455a3('bum): sam/skye ba la rtog pa lags sam/rga shi la rtog pa lags sam/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa lags sam/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa
455a4('bum): lags som/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa lags sam/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa lags sam/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog
455a5('bum): pa lags sam/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa lags sam/nang stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/phyi stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/phyi nang
455a6('bum): stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/chen po stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/don dam pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa
455a7('bum): legs sam/'dus byas stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags
455b1('bum): sam/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/rang bzhin stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/chos thams
455b2('bum): cad stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags snum/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/dngos po med pa stong pa
455b3('bum): nyid la rtog pa legs sam/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa legs sam/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la
455b4('bum): rtog pa lags sam/yang dag par spong bya rnams la rtog pa lags sam/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/dbang po rnams la rtog pa lags sam+ba/stobs
455b5('bum): rnams la rtog pa lags sam/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la rtog pa lags sam/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la rtog pa lags sam/'phags pa'i bden
455b6('bum): pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/bsam gtan rnams la rtog pa lags sam/tshad med pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
455b7('bum): la rtog pa lags sam/rnam par thar pa rnams la rtog pa logs sam/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/rnam par thar pa'i sgo
456a1('bum): stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa la rtog pa lags sam/mngon par shes pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ting nge 'dzin rnams
456a2('bum): la rtog pa lags sam/gzungs kyi sgo rnams la rtog pa legs sam/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la rtog pa lags sam/mi 'jigs pa rnams la rtog
456a3('bum): pa logs sam/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/byams pa chen po la rtog pa lags sam/snying rje chen po la rtog pa lags sam/sangs
456a4('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/thams cad shes pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/rnam
456a5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/gzugs la rtog
456a6('bum): pa ma yin no//tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no//'du shes la rtog pa ma yin no//'du byed la rtog pa ma yin no//rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no//mig la rtog pa
456a7('bum): ma yin no//rna ba la rtog pa ma yin no//sna la rtog pa ma yin no//lce la rtog pa ma yin no//lus la rtog pa ma yin no//yid la rtog pa ma yin no//gzugs la rtog
456b1('bum): pa ma yin no//sgra la rtog pa ma yin no//dri la rtog pa ma yin no//ro la rtog pa ma yin no//reg la rtog pa ma yin no//chos la rtog pa ma yin no//mig gi rnam par shes pa la
456b2('bum): rtog pa ma yin no//rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no//sna'i rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no//lce'i rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no//lus kyi rnam
456b3('bum): par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no//yid kyi rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no//mig gi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin
456b4('bum): no//sna'i 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no//lce'i 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la rtog
456b5('bum): pra ma yin no//mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsho rA ba la rtog pa ma yin no//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no//sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
456b6('bum): gyis tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no//lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no//yid kyi
456b7('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no//so'i khams la rtog pa ma yin no//chu'i khams la rtog pa ma yin no//me'i khams la rtog pa ma yin no//rlung
457a1('bum): gi khams la rtog pa ma yin no//nam mkha'i khams la rtog pa ma yin no//rnam par shes pa'i khams la rtog pa ma yin no//ma rig pa la rtog pa
457a2('bum): ma yin no//'du byed la rtog pa ma yin no//rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no//ming dang gzugs la rtog pa ma yin no//skye mched drug la rtog pa ma yin
457a3('bum): no//reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no//tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no//sred pa la rtog pa ma yin no//len pa la rtog pa ma yin no//srid po la rtog pa ma yin no//skye ba la
457a4('bum): rtog pa ma yin no//rga shi la rtog pa ma yin no//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa ma yin no//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa ma yin no//bzod pa'i
457a5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa ma yin no//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa ma yin no//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin po la rtog pa ma yin no//shes rab kyi pha
457a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa ma yin no//nang stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no//phyi stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no//phyi nang stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no//stong pa nyid
457a7('bum): stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no//chen po stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no//don dam pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no//'dus byas stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no///
457b1('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no//thog ma dang bla ma med pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no//dor ba med pa stong /
457b2('bum): nyid la rtog pa ma yin no//rang bzhin stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no//chos thams cad stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no//
457b3('bum): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
457b4('bum): nyid la rtog pa ma yin no//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no//yang dag par spong ba rnams la rtog pa ma yin no//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin
457b5('bum): no//dbang po rnams la rtog pa ma yin no//stobs rnams la rtog pa ma yin no//byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la rtog pa ma yin no//'phags pa'i lamA yan lag brgyad pa la
457b6('bum): rtogu pa ma yin no//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no//bsam gtan rnams la rtog pa ma yin no//tshad med pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no//gzugs mang
457b7('bum): po'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no//rnam par thar pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no//
458a1('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa la rtog pa ma yin no//mngon par shes pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no//
458a2('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams lnga rtog pa ma yin no//gzungs kyi sgo rnams la rtog pa ma yin no//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la rtog pa ma yin no//mi 'jigs pa
458a3('bum): rnams la rtog pa ma yin no//so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no//byams pa chen po la rtog pa ma yin no//snying rje chen po la rtog pa ma yin no//
458a4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no//thams cad shes pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no//
458a5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa de ni sus kyang ma byas/rnam
458a6('bum): par ma byas/gang nas kyang ma 'ongs/gang du'ang ma srong /phyogs na'ang mi gnas/yul na'ang mi gnas/grang na'ang mi gnas pa ste/de la grangs mi dmigs so///
458a7('bum): 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'ang mi dmigs so//gang la grangs mi dmigs shing /'gro ba dang 'ong ba mi dmigs pa de ni gang gis kyang mngon par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus te/
458b1('bum): gzugs kyis ma yin no//tshor bas ma yin no//'du shes kyis ma yin no//'du byed kyis ma yin no//rnam par shes pas ma yin no//mig gis ma yin no//rna bas ma yin no//
458b2('bum): smas ma yin no//lces ma yin no//lus kyis ma yin no//yid kyis ma yin no//gzugs kyis ma yin no//sgras ma yin no//dris ma yin no//ros ma yin no//reg gis ma
458b3('bum): yin no//chos kyis ma yin no//mig gi rnam par shes pas ma yin no//rna ba'i rnam par shes pas ma yin no//sna'i rnam par shes pas ma yin no//lce'i rnam par shes
458b4('bum): pas ma yin no//lus kyi rnam par shes pas ma yin no//yid kyi rnam par shes pas ma yin no//mig gi 'dus te reg pas ma yin no//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pas ma yin no//
458b5('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pas ma yin no//lce'i 'dus te reg pas ma yin no//lus kyi 'dus te reg pas ma yin no//yid kyi 'dus te reg pas ma yin no//mig gi 'dus te reg
458b6('bum): pi'i rkyen gyis tshor bas ma yin no//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher bas ma yin no//sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher bas ma yin no//lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
458b7('bum): gyis tshor bas ma yin no//lus kyi 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas ma yin no//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas ma yin no//sa'i khams kyis ma yin no//
459a1('bum): chu'i khams kyis ma yin no//me'i khams kyis ma yin no//rlung gi khams kyis ma yin no//nam mkha'i khams kyis ma yin no//rnam par shes
459a2('bum): pa'i khams kyis ma yin no//ma rig pas ma yin no//'du byed kyis ma yin no//rnam par shes pas ma yin no//ming dang gzugs kyis ma yin no//skye mched drug
459a3('bum): gis ma yin no//reg pas ma yin no//tshor bas ma yin no//sred pas ma yin no//len pas ma yin no//srid pas ma yin no//skye bas ma yin no//rga shis ma yin
459a4('bum): no//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas ma yin no//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma yin no//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas ma yin no//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
459a5('bum): phyin pas ma yin no//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma yin no//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma yin no//nang stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no//phyi stong pa nyid kyis
459a6('bum): mi yin no//phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no//chen po stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no//don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no//
459a7('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid
459b1('bum): kyis ma yin no//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no//chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis
459b2('bum): ma yin no//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
459b3('bum): stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no//dran pa nye bar bzhug pa rnams kyis ma yin no//yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis ma yin no//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis ma yin no//dbang
459b4('bum): po rnams kyis ma yin no//stobs rnams kyis ma yin no//byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis ma yin no//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas ma yin no//'phags
459b5('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams kyis ma yin no//bsam gtan rnams kyiso ma yin no//tshad med pa rnams kyis ma yin no//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis ma
459b6('bum): yin no//rnam par thar pa rnams kyis ma yin no//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dru gus ma yin no//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma
459b7('bum): med pa dang /smon pa med pas ma yin no//mngon par shes pa rnams kyis ma yin no//ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis ma yin no//gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis ma yin no//de bzhin
460a1('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyis ma yin no//mi 'jigs pa rnams kyis ma yin no//so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis ma yin no//
460a2('bum): byams pa chen pos mya yin no//snying rje chen pos ma yin no//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi sa ma yin no//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bus ma
460a3('bum): yon no/lan cig phyir 'ong bri'i 'bras bus ma yin no//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras dus ma yin no//dgra bcom po nyid kyis ma yin no//ri byang chub kyi sa myi yin no//
460a4('bum): thams cad shes pa nyid kyis ma yin no//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis ma yin no//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/
460a5('bum): gzugs nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//'du shes nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
460a6('bum): do//'du byed nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//mig nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad
460a7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid do//rna ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//sna nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid do//lce nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
460b1('bum): nyid do//lus nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//yid nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//gzugs nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid//
460b2('bum): do//sgra nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//dri nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//ro nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//reg nyid kyang
460b3('bum): rnam thams cad ma khyen pa nyid do//chos nyid kyang rnam pa rnams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//myig ga rnam par shes pa nyid// rnam pa rnam so cing mkhyen pa nyid do//
460b4('bum): ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//lce'i rnam par shes pa
460b5('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams
460b6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid do//mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//sna'i
460b7('bum): 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//lce'i 'dus te rog pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//lus kyi 'dus te rig pa nyid kyang rnam
461a1('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid
461a2('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//sna'i 'dus te reg po'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
461a3('bum): nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
461a4('bum): tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//sa'i khyams nyid kyang rnam
461a5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//chu'i khams nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//me'i khams nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//rlung gi khams
461a6('bum): nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//rnam par shes pa'i khamos nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad
461a7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid do//ma rig pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//'du byed nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams
461b1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid do//ming dang gzugs nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//skye mched drug nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//reg pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad
461b2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid do//tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//srid pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//len po nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//sprid
461b3('bum): pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//skye ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//rga shi nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid
461b4('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad
461b5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid do//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//
461b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//nang stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//phyi stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
461b7('bum): pa nyid do//phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//chen po stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams
462a1('bum): cang mkhyen pa nyid do//don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//'dus ma
462a2('bum): byas stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//mtha' las 'das pa stong po nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam
462a3('bum): po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong po nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//chos thams
462a4('bum): cad stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams
462a5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid do//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//dngos po med pa'i
462a6('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams
462a7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid do//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//dbang po nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//stobs nyid kyang rnam pa
462b1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyud pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
462b2('bum): do//'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//bsamo gtan nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//tshad med pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad
462b3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid do//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug po nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//rnam par thar pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//mthar
462b4('bum): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa nyid kyang rnam
462b5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//mngon par shes pa nyid kyang rnam po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//gzungs kyi sgo
462b6('bum): nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//mi 'jigs pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad
462b7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid do//so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//byams pa chen po nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//snying rje chen po
463a1('bum): sprupa /nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab
463a2('bum): 'byor de ni 'di ltar gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//tshor ba'i de
463a3('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam
463a4('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de
463a5('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni dri
463a6('bum): drazhin nyid gcig pa'o//mig gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//rna ba'i de bzhin
463a7('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//sna'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams
463b1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//lha'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni
463b2('bum): de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//lus kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//yid kyi de bzhin
463b3('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams
463b4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dro ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//sgra'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa
463b5('bum): de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//dri'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//ro'i de bzhin nyid
463b6('bum): gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//reg gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
463b7('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//chos kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid
464a1('bum): gcig pa'o//mig gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid
464a2('bum): gcig pa'o//rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//spyi'i
464a3('bum): rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//lce'i rnam par shes pa'i de
464a4('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhini nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang
464a5('bum): yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa
464a6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
464a7('bum): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhini nyid

464b6('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de

465a2('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid kyi de
465a3('bum): nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin
465a4('bum): gcig pa'o//chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//me'i khams
465a5('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin po de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam
465a6('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//num mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
465a7('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
465b1('bum): gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//'du
465b2('bum): byed kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
465b3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
465b4('bum): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni
465b5('bum): de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid
465b6('bum): glagrang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//sred pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
465b7('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//len pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig
466a1('bum): pa'o//srid pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//skye ba'i de bzhin nyid
466a2('bum): gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//rga shi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen/
466a3('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
466a4('bum): gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa
466a5('bum): de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid
466a6('bum): gcig pa'o//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o///
466a7('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//shes rab
466b1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin
466b2('bum): pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
466b3('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin po de ni de
466b4('bum): bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//chen po
466b5('bum): stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
466b6('bum): gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa
466b7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
467a1('bum): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad
467a2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
467a3('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin
467a4('bum): nyid grang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni//
467a5('bum): de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid
467a6('bum): gcig pa'o//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o///
467a7('bum): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//dngos po med pa
467b1('bum): stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang
467b2('bum): yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang //
467b3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad
467b4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin
467b5('bum): nyi gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid grong yin pa de ni de
467b6('bum): bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//dbang po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dri bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//stobs
467b7('bum): rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi de bzhin
468a1('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i
468a2('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//'phags pa'i badren pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang
468a3('bum): yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//bsam gtan rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa
468a4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//tshad med pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
468a5('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid grong yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cod mkhyen pa
468a6('bum): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//rnam par thar pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin
468a7('bum): nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
468b1('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa
468b2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid grang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
468b3('bum): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid glang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang
468b4('bum): yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid
468b5('bum): gcig pa'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o///
468b6('bum): mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//so so yang dag par rig pa rnams/
468b7('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang //
469a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams
469a2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dri bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad
469a3('bum): mkhyen po nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/le'u sum cu bdurU pa'o//
469a4('bum): shos rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa//bam po nyis brgya nyer drug pa//de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams lha
469a5('bum): rdzas kyi tsan+dan gyi phye ma dang /lha rdzas kyi me tog ut+pal dang /pad+mo dang /ku mu da dang /puN+Da rI ka mang po khyer te/bcom ldan 'das glang nai ba de logs su 'thor bar
469a6('bum): gyur to//gtor nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der drong ste/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//'khad nas
469a7('bum): 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de bzhin
469b1('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di las 'di skad du/gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
469b2('bum): pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs so//tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o//'du shes nyid rnam pa
469b3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'du shes so//'du byed nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'du byed
469b4('bum): do//rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o//mig nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa
469b5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mig go/rna ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'o//sna nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam
469b6('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'o//lce nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'o//lus nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam
469b7('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus so//yid nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid do//gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/
470a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs so//sgra nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang smra'o//dri nyid rnam pa thams cad
470a2('bum): mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dri'o//ro nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ro'o//reg nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
470a3('bum): pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang reg go/chos nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chos so//mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid
470a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o//rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa
470a5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o//sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'i rnam par
470a6('bum): shes pa'o//lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o//lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid
470a7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o//yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste//
470b1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o//mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus
470b2('bum): te reg pa'o//rnga bo'i 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna bo'i 'dus te reg pa'o//sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams
470b3('bum): cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o//lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
470b4('bum): kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o//yid kyi 'dus te
470b5('bum): reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o//mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams
470b6('bum): cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
470b7('bum): pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o//sna'i 'dus te rerig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa
471a1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o//lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa
471a2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad
471a3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
471a4('bum): pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o//sa'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sa'i khams so//chu'i khams
471a5('bum): nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chu'i khams so//me'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
471a6('bum): pa nyid kyang me'i khams so//rlung gi khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rlung gi khams so//nam mkha'i khams nyid rnam
471a7('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang na mo mkha'i khams so//rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams
471b1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so//ma rig pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ma rig pa'o//'du byed nyid rnam pa thams
471b2('bum): cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'du byed do//rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes
471b3('bum): pa'o//ming dang gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ming dang gzugs so//skye mched drug nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste//
471b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye mched drug go/reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rig pa'o//tshor ba nyid rnam po thams
471b5('bum): cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o//sred pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sred pa'o//len pa nyid rnam
471b6('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang len pa'o//srid pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang srid pa'o//
471b7('bum): skye ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye ba'o//rga shi nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang
472a1('bum): rga shi'o//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa skye/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//tshul khrims
472a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa
472a3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa
472a4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang
472a5('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
472a6('bum): nang stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do//phyi stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam po thams
472a7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid do//phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang phyi nang stong po nyid do//stong pa nyid stong pa
472b1('bum): nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do//chen po stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
472b2('bum): pa nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid do//don dam pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do//'dus byas stong pa nyid rnam pa
472b3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid do//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
472b4('bum): nyid kyang 'dus mo byas stong pa nyid do//mtha' los 'das pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do//
472b5('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid rnam pa
472b6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
472b7('bum): kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//chos thams cad stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid do//rang gi mtshan
473a1('bum): nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams
473a2('bum): cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid do//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
473a3('bum): nyid kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do//dngos po med pa'i
473a4('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa nyid rnam pa thams
473a5('bum): cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar bzhug pa rnams so//yang dag par spong ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad
473a6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams so//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
473a7('bum): so//dbang po nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dbang po rnams so//stobs nyid rnam po thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams
473b1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang stobs rnams so//byang chub kyi yan lag nyid rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so//
473b2('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'phagaso pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o//'phags pa'i bden
473b3('bum): pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so//bsam gtan nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams
473b4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so//tshad med pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshad med pa rnams so//gzugs med pa'i
473b5('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so//rnam par thar pa nyid rnam pa
473b6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa rnams so//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam
473b7('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon po med pa nyid
474a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'o//mngon par
474a2('bum): shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so//ting nge 'dzin nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam
474a3('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tIng nge 'dzin rnams so//gzungs kyi sgo nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so//
474a4('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang de bzhin ga shegs pa'o stobs rnams so//mi 'jigs pa nyid rnam
474a5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mi 'jigs pa rnams so//so so yang dag par rig pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa khams
474a6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so//byams pa chen po nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang byams pa chen po'i
474a7('bum): snying rje chen po nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang snying rje chen po'o//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
474b1('bum): ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so//gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
474b2('bum): gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dri bzhin nyid gang
474b3('bum): yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
474b4('bum): gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin
474b5('bum): nyid gang yin pa dri ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
474b6('bum): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byer med do//mig gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
474b7('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//rna ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de
475a1('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//sna'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad
475a2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//lce'i de bzhin nyid glang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams
475a3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//lus kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa
475a4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//yid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
475a5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
475a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//sgra'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam
475a7('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//dri'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam
475b1('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni dri bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//ro'i dri bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams/
475b2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//reg gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams
