475b4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhini ny-id glang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byor med do//mig gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa drung /
475b5('bum): rnam po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid grang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa skye/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid
475b6('bum): gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//sna'i rnam par shes
475b7('bum): pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//
476a1('bum): lce'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis
476a2('bum): su med cing gnyis su byar med do//lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni dri bzhin
476a3('bum): nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
476a4('bum): gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
476a5('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid grang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa
476a6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin
476a7('bum): pa dang /rnam po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i de
476b1('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byur med do//lus kyi
476b2('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar
476b3('bum): med do//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med
476b4('bum): cing gnyis su byar med do//mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gong yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de
476b5('bum): bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
476b6('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
476b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
477a1('bum): ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su
477a2('bum): byar med do//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin /
477a3('bum): gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
477a4('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gtsog pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
477a5('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams
477a6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//me'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam
477a7('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de na de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin
477b1('bum): pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid
477b2('bum): gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//rnam par shes pa'i
477b3('bum): khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med
477b4('bum): do//ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar
477b5('bum): med do//'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar
477b6('bum): med do//rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni dri bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing
477b7('bum): gnyis su byar med do//ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste//
478a1('bum): gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dri
478a2('bum): ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byor med do//reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin/
478a3('bum): pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
478a4('bum): bang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byer med do//sred pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de
478a5('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//len pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
478a6('bum): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de na de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//srid pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad
478a7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med de//skye ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams
478b1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//rga shi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams
478b2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pu ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa
478b3('bum): dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
478b4('bum): pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin po dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa da ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//bzod
478b5('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su
478b6('bum): byar med do//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis
478b7('bum): su med cing gnyis su byar med do//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de
479a1('bum): bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad
479a2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang //
479a3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
479a4('bum): gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//phyi nang stong
479a5('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar
479a6('bum): med do//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid grang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su
479a7('bum): med cing gnyis su byar med do//chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid
479b1('bum): gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de
479b2('bum): bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid glang
479b3('bum): yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
479b4('bum): de bzhin nyid glang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams
479b5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang
479b6('bum): yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid grang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi
479b7('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//rang bzhin
480a1('bum): stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med
480a2('bum): cing gnyis su byar med do//chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid
480a3('bum): gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin
480a4('bum): nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad
480a5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin/
480a6('bum): pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhini nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi
480a7('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//
480b1('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing
480b2('bum): gnyis su byar med do//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste//
480b3('bum): gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin
480b4('bum): nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi dri bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa
480b5('bum): de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//dbang po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang
480b6('bum): yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin
480b7('bum): nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad
481a1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin
481a2('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//'phags pa'i bden
481a3('bum): pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do///
481a4('bum): bsam gtan rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar
481a5('bum): med do//tshad med pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis
481a6('bum): su byar med do//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gong yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid
481a7('bum): gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//rnam par thar pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa
481b1('bum): de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
481b2('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa
481b3('bum): med pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//
481b4('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis
481b5('bum): su byar med do//ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su
481b6('bum): med cing gnyis su byar med do//gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa
481b7('bum): ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang
482a1('bum): yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams
482a2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid
482a3('bum): gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//byams pa chen
482a4('bum): po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//
482a5('bum): snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa da ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar
482a6('bum): med do//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa s+ho//
482a7('bum): gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin
482b1('bum): nyid gcig bla ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
482b2('bum): gang yini pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar mod do//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cod mkhyen pa nyid kyi de
482b3('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
482b4('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su medo cing gnyis su byar med do//rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa
482b5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dri ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin
482b6('bum): nyid gang yin po dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//rgyun du zhugs pa'i de
482b7('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa den de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//lan cig
483a1('bum): phyir 'ong ba'i dri bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med
483a2('bum): cing gnyis su byar med do//phyir mi 'ong ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/
483a3('bum): gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//dgra bcom pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid
483a4('bum): gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//rang sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni
483a5('bum): de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//byang chub sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin
483a6('bum): nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
483a7('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de na de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do zhes ston pa ni 'di lta ste/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub shes
483b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zad cing blta dka' la/khong du chud par dka' zhing brtag tu ma mchis la rtog ge'i spyod yul ma lags pa ste/zhi zhing phra ba zhib mo mkhas shing rtogs
483b2('bum): pas rig par bgyi ba ste/'jig rten thams cad kyis yid ches par dka' ba'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu
483b3('bum): de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//lha'i bu dag de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/lha'i bu dag gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
483b4('bum): nyid kyang gzugs so//tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o//'du shes nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam
483b5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'du shes so//'du byed nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa s+ho/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'du byed do//rnam par shes pa nyid rnam
483b6('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o//mig nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang
483b7('bum): mig go/rna ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'o//sna nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
484a1('bum): nyid kyang sna'o//lho nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'o//lus nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams
484a2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus so//yid nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid do//gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam
484a3('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs so//sgra nyid rnam po thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sgra'o//dri nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste//
484a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dri'o//ro nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ro'o//reg nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/
484a5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang reg go/chos nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chos so//mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid
484a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o//rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam
484a7('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o//sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'i rnam
484b1('bum): par shes pa'o//lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams nad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o//lus kyi rnam par shes
484b2('bum): pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o//yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa
484b3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yod kyi rnam par shes pa'o//mgo gi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg
484b4('bum): pa'o//rna ba'i 'dus te rig pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o//sna'i 'dus te reg po nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
484b5('bum): ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o//lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te
484b6('bum): reg pa'o//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te rig pa'o//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams
484b7('bum): byad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te rig pa'o//mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam
485a1('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/
485a2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o//sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams
485a3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o//lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
485a4('bum): kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o//lus kyi 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus kyi
485a5('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te
485a6('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o//sa'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sa'i khams so//chu'i khams nyid rnam pa thams
485a7('bum): cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chu'i khams so//me'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang me'i
485b1('bum): khams so//rlung gi khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rlung gi khams so//nam mkha'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
485b2('bum): pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so//rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam
485b3('bum): par shes pa'i khams so//ma rig pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ma rig pa'o//'du byed nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste//
485b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'du byed do//rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o//ming
485b5('bum): dang gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ming dang gzugs so//skye mched drug nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa
485b6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye mched drug go/reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang reg pa'o//tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams
485b7('bum): cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o//sred pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sred pa'o//len pa
486a1('bum): nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang len pa'o//srid pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams
486a2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang srid pa'o//skye ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye ba'o//rga shi nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
486a3('bum): pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rga shi'o//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sbyin
486a4('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
486a5('bum): phyin pa'o//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//brtson 'grus kyi
486a6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
486a7('bum): nyid rnam po thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bsom gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams
486b1('bum): cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//nang stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang
486b2('bum): nang stong pa nyid do//phyi stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid do//phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/
486b3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do///
486b4('bum): chen po stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid do//don dam pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams
486b5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do//'dus byas stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid do///
486b6('bum): 'dus mi byas stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams
486b7('bum): cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams
487a1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang
487a2('bum): dror ba med pa stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//chos thams cad stong pa
487a3('bum): nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid do//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/
487a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang
487a5('bum): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid do//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do//ngo bo nyid
487a6('bum): stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
487a7('bum): pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cod
487b1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams so//yang dag par spong ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams
487b2('bum): so//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so//dbang po nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
487b3('bum): pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dbang po rnams so//stobs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang stobs rnams so//
487b4('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid
487b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o//'phags pa'i bden pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste//
487b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so//bsam gtan nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bsam
487b7('bum): gtan rnams so//tshad med pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshad med pa rnams so//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
488a1('bum): nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so//rnam par thar pa nyid rnam pa
488a2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa rnams so//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
488a3('bum): pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med po dang /
488a4('bum): smon pa med pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'o///
488a5('bum): mimangon par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so//ting nge 'dzin nyid rnam pa thams cad
488a6('bum): mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams so//gzungs kyi sgo nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
488a7('bum): kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i
488b1('bum): stobs rnams so//mi 'jigs pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mi 'jigs pa rnams so//so so yang dag par rig pa nyid
488b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so//byams pa chen po nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam
488b3('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang byams pa chen po'o//snying rje chen po nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang snying rje chen po'o//sangs
488b4('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres po rnams so///
488b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa//bam po nyis brgya nyer bdun pa//gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de
488b6('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
488b7('bum): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad
489a1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa
489a2('bum): dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//rnam par shes pa'i de
489a3('bum): bzhin nyid glang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gagrang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//
489a4('bum): myig gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gtsug pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med
489a5('bum): do//rna ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cid mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de na de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing ginyis su
489a6('bum): byar med do//sna'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dri bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis
489a7('bum): su byar med do//lce'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing
489b1('bum): gnyis su byar med do//lus kyi dri bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing
489b2('bum): gnyis su byer med do//yid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med

489b4('bum): gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//sgra'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa
489b5('bum): ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//dri'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gi drug
489b6('bum): pA s+ye/gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byur med do//ro'i de bzhin nyid klung yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid

494b1('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//

494b4('bum): su med cing gnyis su byar med do//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig
494b5('bum): pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang
494b6('bum): yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
494b7('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam
495a1('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi de
495a2('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//dbang po rnams
495a3('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//stobs
495a4('bum): rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//
495a5('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing
495a6('bum): gagonyis su byar med do//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin
495a7('bum): gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhi
495b1('bum): gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//bsam gtan rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi/
495b2('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//tshad med pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad
495b3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin
495b4('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//rnam par thar pa rnams
495b5('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//mthar
495b6('bum): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste//
495b7('bum): gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad
496a1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byan med do//mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid
496a2('bum): gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi
496a3('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//gzungs kyi
496a4('bum): sgro rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med
496a5('bum): de//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste//gnyis
496a6('bum): su med cing gnyis su byar med do//mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig/
496a7('bum): pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin/
496b1('bum): pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
496b2('bum): gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
496b3('bum): gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad
496b4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
496b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de
496b6('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//phyir mi 'ong
496b7('bum): ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//
497a1('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med//
497a2('bum): cing gnyis su byar med do//rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa du ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis
497a3('bum): su med cing gnyis su byar med do//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni dra
497a4('bum): bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//rgyun du zhugs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rngom pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
497a5('bum): grang yin pa dri ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
497a6('bum): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//phyir mi 'ong ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad
497a7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//dgra bcom pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa
497b1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//rang sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa
497b2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//byang chub sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa
497b3('bum): dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su bya ro med do//sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin
497b4('bum): pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//lha'i bu dag don gyi dbang de gzigs/
497b5('bum): pas/de bzhin gshegs pa phrin las chung ba la thugs gzhol te/chos bstan pa la gzhol ba ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar 'di lta ste/de bzhin gshegs pa
497b6('bum): rnams kyi chos byang chub 'di ni zab cing blta dka' la/khong du chud par dka' zhing brtag tu med la/rtog ge'i spyod yul mo yin te/zhi zhing phra ba zhib mos mkhas shing rtogs
497b7('bum): pas rig par bya ba/'jig rten thams cad kyis yid ches par dka' ba ste/de ni sus kyang mngon par sangs mo rgyas/nam yang mngon par sangs ma rgyas/gar yang mngon
498a1('bum): par sangs ma rgyas te/gang la gnyis su kun nas rgyu ba med pa de ni chos rnams kyi zab pa nyid do//lha'i bu dag nam mkha' zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//
498a2('bum): lha'i bu dag de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag chos kyi dbyings brab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag yang dag pa'i mtha' zab pa'i phyir chos
498a3('bum): 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag busam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag mtha' yas mu med pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'dri zab bo//lha'i bu dag 'ong
498a4('bum): ba dang 'gro ba med pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag mi skye mo 'gag pa dang /mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa med pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag
498a5('bum): kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /rnam par byang ba med pa dang /mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa med pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'dri zab bo//lha'i bu dag mngon par 'du bya
498a6('bum): ba med pa dang /mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa med pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lho'i bu dag bdag zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag sems can zab
498a7('bum): pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dge srog zab pa'i phyir chos 'od zab bo//lha'i bu dag 'gro ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'od zab bo//lha'i bu dag gso ba zab pa'i phyir chos
498b1('bum): 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag skyes bu zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag gang zag zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag shed can zab pa'i phyir chos 'dra zab bo//lha'i bu
498b2('bum): dag shed bdag zab pa'i phyir chos 'dri zab bo//lha'i bu dag byed pa po zab pa'i phyir chos 'dri zab bo//lha'i bu dag tshor ba po zab pa'i phyir chos 'di thob bo//lha'i bu dag shes pa
498b3('bum): po zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag mthong ba po zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag gzugs zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag tshor ba zab pa'i phyir chos
498b4('bum): 'dri zab bo//lha'i bu dag 'du shes zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lho'i bu dag 'du byed zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'dri zab bo//
498b5('bum): lha'i bu dag mig zab pa'i phyir chos 'dri zab bo//lha'i bu dag rna ba zab pa'i phyir ches 'dri zab bo//lha'i bu dag sna zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag lce zab pa'i phyir chos
498b6('bum): 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag lus zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag yid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag gzugs zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag
498b7('bum): sgra zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag dri zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dog ro zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag reg zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i
499a1('bum): bu dag chos zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag mig gi rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag rna ba'i rnam par shes pa zab pa'i
499a2('bum): phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag sde'i rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag lce'i rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag lus kyi
499a3('bum): rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag yid kyi rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag mig gi 'dus te reg pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di
499a4('bum): zab bo//lha'i bu dag rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag sna'i 'dus te reg pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag lce'i 'dus te reg pa
499a5('bum): zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'od zab bo//lha'i
499a6('bum): bu dag mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu
499a7('bum): dag sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag lus
499b1('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag yod kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'dri zab bo//lha'i bu dag sa'i
499b2('bum): khams zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lho'i bu dag chu'i khams zab pa'i phyir chos 'dri zab bo//lha'i bu dag me'i khams zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag rlung
499b3('bum): gi khams thub pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag nam mkha'i khams zab pa'i phyir chos 'ad zab bo//lha'i bu dag rnam par shes pa'i khams zab pa'i phyir chos 'di
499b4('bum): zab bo//lha'i bu dag mo rig pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'od zab bo//lha'i bu dag 'du byed zab pa'i phyir chos 'dri zab bo//lha'i bu dag rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab
499b5('bum): bo//lha'i bu dag ming dang gzugs zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag skye mched drug zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag reg pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di
499b6('bum): zab bo//lha'i bu dag tshor ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag sred pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag len pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab
499b7('bum): bo//lha'i bu dag srid pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag skye ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag rga shi zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i
500a1('bum): bu dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thub pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//
500a2('bum): lha'i bu dag bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu
500a3('bum): dag bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag
500a4('bum): nang stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir choso 'dri zab bo//lha'i bu dag phyi stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'dri zab bo//lha'i bu dag phyi nang stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos
500a5('bum): 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag stong pa nyid stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag chen po stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu
500a6('bum): dag don dam pa stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag 'dus byas stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir cho sa 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag 'dus ma byas
500a7('bum): stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag thog ma dang tha ma
500b1('bum): med pa stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag dor ba med pa stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag rang bzhin stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos
500b2('bum): 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag chos thams cad stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i
500b3('bum): bu dag mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lho'i bu dag dngos po med pa stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag ngo bo nyid stong pa
500b4('bum): nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag dran pa nye bar bzhag pa zab pa'i phyir chos
500b5('bum): 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dge yang dag par spong ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag dbang po zab
500b6('bum): pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag stobs zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag byang chub kyi yan lag zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag 'phags pa'i lam
500b7('bum): yan lag brgyad pa zab pa'i phyir tshe sa 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag 'phags pa'i bden pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag bsam gtan zab pa'i phyir chos 'di
501a1('bum): zab bo//lha'i bu dag tshad med pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//
501a2('bum): lha'i bu dag rnam par thar pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'dri zab bo//lha'i bu dag rnam par
501a3('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag mngon par shes pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu
501a4('bum): dag ting nge 'dzin zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag gzungs kyi sgro zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs zab pa'i phyir
501a5('bum): chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag mi 'jigs pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu drag so so yang dag par rig pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag
501a6('bum): byams pa chen po zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag snying rje chen po zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa zab pa'i phyir
501a7('bum): chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zab pa'i phyir chos 'di thob
501b1('bum): bo//lha'i bu dag phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag dgra bcom pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag rung byang chub zab pa'i
501b2('bum): phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo///
501b3('bum): lha'i bu rnams kyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten thams cad kyis yid ches par dka' ba'i chos bstan pa ni ngo mtshar to//de ci'i phyir zhe na/bcom ldan 'das
501b4('bum): chos 'di ni gzugs gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/tshor ba gzung ba'i slad du ma lpags/mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags//
501b5('bum): 'du shes gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/'du byed gzung ba'i slad du ma legs/mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma legs/rnam
501b6('bum): par shes pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/mig gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/rna ba
501b7('bum): gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/sna gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/lce gzung ba'i slad du
502a1('bum): ma lags/mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/lus gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/yid
502a2('bum): gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/gzugs gzung ba'i slad du ma lpags/mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/sgra gzung ba'i
502a3('bum): slang du ma lags/mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/dri gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ro gzung ba'i slad du ma legs//
502a4('bum): mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma la ge sa/reg gzung ba'i slad du ma legs/mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ches gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/mi
502a5('bum): gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa mA lags/mig gi rnam par shes pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa gzung
502a6('bum): ba'i slad du ma lags/mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/sna'i rnam par shes pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/lce'i
502a7('bum): rnam par shes pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/lus kyi rnam par shes pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/mi gzung ba'i
502b1('bum): slad du bstan pa ma lags/yid kyi rnam par shes pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/mig gi 'dus te reg pa gzung ba'i slad du ma
502b2('bum): lags/mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/sna'i 'dus te reg pa gzung
502b3('bum): ba'i slad du ma lags/mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/lce'i 'dus te reg pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma legs/lus kyi 'dus
502b4('bum): te reg pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/
502b5('bum): mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba gzung
502b6('bum): ba'i slad du ma lags/mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma legs/sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma
502b7('bum): lags/lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba
503a1('bum): gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/mi
503a2('bum): gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/sa'i khams gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/chu'i khams gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/mi

503b4('bum): ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung

503b6('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/mi gzung
503b7('bum): ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/nang stong pa nyid gzung ba'i slad du ma
504a1('bum): lags/mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/phyi stong pa nyid gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/phyi nang stong pa
504a2('bum): nyid gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/mi gzung ba'i slad du bstun po ma lags/
504a3('bum): chen po stong pa nyid gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa mi lags/don dam pa stong pa nyid gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/mi gri zung ba'i slad du bstan
504a4('bum): bla ma lags/'dus byas stong pa nyid gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma legs/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gzung ba'i slad du ma lags
504a5('bum): mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/mtha' lus 'das pa stong pa nyid gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/thog ma dang tha ma

504a7('bum): bstan pa ma lags/rang bzhin stong pa nyid gzung ba'i slad du ma legs/mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa me lags/chos thams cad stong pa nyid gzung ba'i slad dus
504b1('bum): lags/mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/mi dmigs pa
504b2('bum): stong pa nyid gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa
504b3('bum): mi lags/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/

504b5('bum): gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams gzung ba'i slad du ma legs/mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/dbang
504b6('bum): po rnams gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma legs/stobs rnams gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lag ste/byung
504b7('bum): chub kyi yan lag rnams gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa mi lags/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/mi gzung
505a1('bum): ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa mA lags/bsam gtan rnams

505a4('bum): ba'i slad du ma lags/mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/mi gzung ba'i slad

505a6('bum): mA legs/mngon par shes pa rnams gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ting nge 'dzin rnams gzung ba'i slad du ma legs//

505b1('bum): pa'i stobs rnams gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/mi 'jigs pa rnams gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/mi gzung ba'i slad

505b3('bum): lags/mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/snying rje chen po gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams
